name: Chaos
summary: A dark-fantasy style Action RPG set in a third person view. Wield melee and magic abilities to defeat the enemies in the world and conquer the looming and impending evil.

name: Choco Pixel X
summary: Choco Pixel X is a minimalist colorful puzzle which goal is to get the toy car to the finish using 4 directions in space and avoiding traps.

name: Chromalition
summary: Chromalition is a third-person skating platformer where you play as a graffiti artist who can become graffiti and bring graffiti to life. Find and complete graffiti murals around the city, unlock new abilities, and take down Company Corp!

name: Choco Pixel S
summary: Choco Pixel S is a minimalist colorful puzzle which goal is to get the toy car to the finish using 4 directions in space and avoiding traps.

name: Chill Z
summary: Chill is a relaxing, minimalist maze game.

name: Charlie the Roach
summary: A hilarious take on an old roach named Charlie who needs to platform his way through various environments to free his friends from an evil one.

name: Chevalier Historie
summary: The fate of a captured princess lies in the hands of a single woman. Using the power of the spirits and a variety of items, the female knight Jeanne must explore the kingdom that's been thrown into chaos to save Princess Lily in this classic-style action RPG.

name: Chronicle of Daneya
summary: Chronicle of Daneya - is a medieval fantasy where player has to write the history of the realm, make difficult and sometimes deadly decisions and put his signature under every word he wrote.

name: Challenge Speedball
summary: Challlenge Speedball is a cooperative multiplayer game based on the competition paintball variation called Speedball.

name: Child Arms
summary: A 2D arcade sword-fighter, Child Arms takes you to an alternate 16th century where the youth take center stage. Select one of 8 fighters from a variety of cultures and ethnicities and test your skills against challengers as they explore their world for the first time.

name: Chess Brain: Dark Troops
summary: This game develops the ability to predict movement in Chess, using a playful and immersive concept. The dark troops march in a single sound. They are more organized and smarter

name: Chaos Kart
summary: Chaos Kart is the first team-based racing brawler game from Baka Bros Entertainment. Master your favorite powerful champions with unique abilities and personalities. Make epic plays, secure kills, and battle your way to the finish line.

name: Choco Pixel 4
summary: Choco Pixel 4 is a minimalist colorful puzzle which goal is to get the toy car to the finish using 4 directions in space and avoiding traps.

name: Cheap Game
summary: Cheap Game is simply an endless runner with pixel graphics and lots of interesting mechanics that can be combined to obtain surprising effects. In this game you run and kill monsters.

name: Childhood Gone: Shadowed Wand
summary: (Ever heard of this haunted game ...?) This is a top-down pixel adventure-rpg(horror) game! Explore freely! Get around by using magic such as: floating, water walking, and quakes! Combat the MONSTER LORDS and save the Kingdom! (That is... if the 'ghosts' want you to.)

name: Choco Chef
summary: Create strands of delicious molten chocolate. Combine all sorts of pralines together and lead them to the collector.

name: Choco Pixel 6
summary: Choco Pixel 6 is a minimalist colorful puzzle which goal is to get the toy car to the finish using 4 directions in space and avoiding traps.

name: Choco Pixel 5
summary: Choco Pixel 5 is a minimalist colorful puzzle which goal is to get the toy car to the finish using 4 directions in space and avoiding traps.

name: Chesnakisnak
summary: A first-person choose-your-own adventure set in an anachronistic city.

name: Chinese mother in law
summary: This is a story about betrothal gifts

name: Christmas Rhythm
summary: This is a Chiptune Rhythm game for Christmas aficionados everywhere! Six merry songs with two difficulty settings

name: Chaos Road
summary: Chaos Road is an action-packed 3D shmup race shooter where you can drive different cars and rid the city of crime with an arsenal of weapons. Take the fast lane on traffic, attack and smash cars rivals on the road to revenge the city!

name: Chronicles of Elmyra
summary: The young wizardess Faira has been commissioned to investigate strange deadly nightmares. Start this new adventure exploring the world of Elmyra. Will she be able to complete her mission?

name: Chess Destroyer
summary: Do you love chess and want to play it with some new rules but the same moves? Then this game is for you!

name: Choco Pixel 7
summary: Choco Pixel 7 is a minimalist colorful puzzle which goal is to get the toy car to the finish using 4 directions in space and avoiding traps.

name: Charge Blade Hero
summary: A fast paced 2D hack and slash, adventure game. Attack, Dodge, and Charge Up to maintain your weapon's durability as you take on waves of enemies.

name: Choice of Life: Samosbor
summary: You're just a simple inhabitant of the endless Gigastructure. The best you'll get is seven shifts at a machine and a bowl of feed concentrate, and that for good service to the party.... Is that it? Or do you have a choice?

name: Checkered Flag
summary:
Checkered Flag for the Lynx is a racing game employing open-wheel racing cars (either Formula 1 or Indy-style depending on whether the box or the instructions are believed). The game features 18 tracks located in the American countryside or cities. Game modes include Practice, Single Heat and a 8-race Tournament. The start position can be set randomly or determined in a qualifying lap and the length of a race can be set between 1 and 50 laps. Also customizable are color of the car and the gender of the driver, both having only cosmetic effect.

Gameplay is Pole Position style, with the own car seen from behind, a perspective view of the track, and cars and roadside obstacles displayed as sprites. A graphical representation of the track, lap times, speed meter and rear view mirrors are always in display. One button accelerates, another brakes. Left and right on the joypad steers while up and down shifts gears if manual transmission (either 4 or 7 gears) has been selected beforehand. Crashing into other cars sends the own car into a spin while hitting roadside obstacles (trees, bushes, rocks or animals) reduces speed to zero.

The game can be played by up to six players via a ComLynx connection. If fewer players race, remaining slots can be filled by AI-controlled drivers for a maximum of 10 cars per race.

name: Chess on Ice
summary: A casual sports simulation game built around using physics to throw and control throwing your rocks towards a target. Play with up to three other friends in local multiplayer, or by yourself in the 20+ stage challenge mode!

name: Chess
summary:
A chess program for the Sinclair Spectrum with 48K RAM written in fast and efficient machine-code. The chessboard and chess peices are displayed in high resolution graphics.
Ten levels of Spectrum ability: level 2 will probably beat you!

name: Chainsaw Dance
summary:
Uh oh! It seems you are on a date with the Chainsaw Man!
He dismembers everything, and besides, you hardly understand what he is saying. Will you survive this date?

name: Chihiro Himukai Always Walks Away
summary: Chihiro Himukai Always Walks Away is a sweet visual novel about two people finding each other after slipping apart.

name: Chain Break
summary:
Developed almost entirely by one of 1985 Alternativo's most active members, Manu Segura, Chain Break is a highly addictive endless runner arcade game that will make us break a sweat to overcome each and every one of its increasingly difficult levels.
The project began at the end of March 2017, born as a parallel task to the realization of another of the main games of 1985 Alternativo.

name: Chernobyl Inferno
summary: Go in search of your brother, who got lost in the catacombs of Chernobyl, among aggressive inhabitants mutilated by radiation.

name: Chess Valley
summary: Play chess in a way you've never played. Face a board like a labyrinth and try to cross it with the king to join his army.

name: Chacal
summary: Run, hit, and dodge bullets with Chacal! From the southern reaches to the capital of Argentina, achieve the best Score, and defeat the evil President Francisco to free the nation from his subjugation!

name: Cheese Killer
summary: Cheesy Killer is a beat 'em up with the possibility of a cooperative passage in which you will constantly try to pick up coins from the corpses of enemies before your friend.

name: Chaos of Fallen City
summary: Chaos of Fallen City is a deck building game with rougelike elements. The rich characters and cards will bring infinite replay value to the game. Leading to the chaotic forbidden city, use the combination of cards and the power of talents and magic weapons to suppress this evil that is just around the corner!

name: Chromatic Fantasy
summary: Charming and challenging puzzle game, in which fantasy creatures are trying to escape the dungeon imprisonment. Interactions between characters and obstacles are determined by their color.

name: Chasing Tails: A Promise in the Snow
summary: Trying to get away from trouble, June moves to a small town... to find even more trouble! A yuri comedy/horror visual novel, featuring a haunted house, fox-girls, and GxG love.

name: Cheat or Die
summary: Cheat or Die is a small puzzle game where you have to manage a full class of teenagers. Help Mathilde successfully pass her exams by any means possible without getting caught by the angry Supervisor !

name: Chess Knights: Eldritch Hunter
summary: Choose your hero and enter the dungeon in this otherworldly puzzle game.

name: Chasing Tail
summary: A peaceful fantasy of creatures big and small in all shapes and sizes. But a quiet danger threatens the tranquility of life, and could potentially throw the balance into chaos. Who will stick by your side? What bonds will hold true to the end? Will love help you prevail or will hate end us all?

name: Child of Light: Dark Aurora Pack
summary: Child of Light: Dark Aurora, a DLC pack for Child of Light, contains an exclusive skin for Aurora and provides her improvements of Magic Power, Defense and Magic resistance. Also included in the bonus content a pack of Rough oculi: 3 Blue, 3 Green and 2 Red.

name: Chill X
summary: Chill is a relaxing, minimalist maze game.

name: Cherry VX
summary: Cherry VX is a futuristic adult entertainment suite featuring gorgeous models and unmatched interaction. Finally, the technology has come far enough for truly compelling intimate experiences with cybernetic humans. Time to live out your cyberpunk fantasies!

name: Changeling Tale
summary: Fantasy and reality collide in Changeling Tale, a story-rich visual novel about finding one's "true" self... and true love! Help a young man returning from war rebuild his life, kindle new romances, and reveal a secret that will forever transform the lives of those closest to him - literally!

name: Chaos Combat Chess
summary: Welcome to Chaos Combat Chess, a competitive 8v8 auto chess battle royale!

name: Chaos Groove
summary: CHAOS GROOVE! Classic fast-paced, over-the-top fighting action, featured with upgraded HD 2D Sprites, online play (RollBack Netcode), ground-breaking effects, and a dynamic system that earns points for unlockable goodies. Fight like a hero, play like a legend!

name: Children's Jigsaw Puzzles
summary: This puzzle game helps your kids develop matching and fine motor skills. Your children will just love these wonderfully hand-drawn pictures and will improve their spatial skills while having fun!

name: Children's Jigsaw Puzzles: Fairy Tale
summary: This puzzle game helps your kids develop matching and fine motor skills. Your children will just love these wonderfully Fairy Tale pictures and will improve their spatial skills while having fun!

name: Children's Jigsaw Puzzles: A Warm Story
summary: This puzzle game helps your kids develop matching and fine motor skills. Your children will just love these wonderfully artwork pictures and will improve their spatial skills while having fun!

name: Children's Jigsaw Puzzles: Magic Kindergarten
summary: This puzzle game helps your kids develop matching and fine motor skills. Your children will just love these wonderfully Magic Kindergarten pictures and will improve their spatial skills while having fun!

name: Chloe Puzzle Game
summary: Each level looks simple and playful with one motive: to get Chloe and Bunny to their red Targets; but the puzzles in them are unique and have a set of varying difficulties. The puzzles challenge your strategy, sokoban skills, experimenting how mechanical toys work, tactical thinking, improvising and much more. The difficulty increases with the level number and each level comes with 1 hint. Got stuck? Take the hint, find your way to the Target!

name: Chrs 143
summary: Discover the physics of a mysterious 2D tile-based universe, including ballistics, fluid mechanics, thermodynamics, chemical and nuclear reactions. Use automation bricks, build structures, machines, vehicles, produce power, solve puzzles, pierce the fog and defeat Chrs!

name: Chicken Utopia

A fire-breathing chicken explores vast bizarre lands, opening secret doors, and helping out residents, in an effort to rescue the chicks to restore the magic of chicken utopia.

name: Check x Mate
summary: A fantasy visual novel set in a magical world of chess. Gameplay consists mainly of decision making and chess puzzles that represent what is happening in the story. There is a beginner difficulty for those new to chess and expert difficulty for those who seek more of a challenge.

name: Church of Stratum
summary: Church of Stratum is a First-person Horror-like exploration game about investigating the now abandoned bunker of a religious cult. Solve puzzles and interact with the world using physics.

name: Chubmen's Strange Case File: Chapter of Corridor
summary: Chubmen's Strange Case File: Chapter Of Corridor is an action game that supports 2 players via screen share. Control several characters to dodge, attack, and fight with ghosts in the corridor building.

name: Chain of Eroticism
summary: Rei Takanashi find a job at a male revue club "Eden". After a while he comes to live together with one of his coworkers. His new life with a man begins in this red light district...

name: Chess Puzzles: 100 by Emma
summary: Free DLC for "Chess Puzzles"! Get 100 new levels created by Emma for free!

name: Chess Puzzles: 100 by Tyrone
summary: Free DLC for "Chess Puzzles"! Get 100 new levels created by Tyrone for free!

name: Chess Puzzles: 100 by Liam
summary: Free DLC for "Chess Puzzles"! Get 100 new levels created by Liam for free!

name: Chromancy
summary: Chromancy is a shoot 'em up that tests your wits and reflexes at the same time! Using the ability to change color between red, green and blue, you will face enemies, dodge obstacles, solve puzzles and fight bosses through 50 fun and challenging levels. Can you master the power of RGB and beat this game?

name: Chess++

name: Chessformer

name: Chess Brain
summary: Chess Brain is a chess puzzle game. Draw the correct path and don't let the King get killed by the opposite pieces! Every second all the pieces will move!

name: Chessmates

name: Chicken Holmes: The Mystery of Bartolomeu
summary: Use your most valuable chicken detective skills to solve the Bartolomeu's mystery. In this point'n click game you explore a kidnapper house guided by a series of ink marks of poor Rubens, the Butcher of the city. Judite gathered the information and just disappeared. Now, fend for yourself!

name: Chupacabras: Night Hunt
summary: Hunt the chupacabras alone or with your friends, explore the map and find the weapons to kill the monster.

name: Christmas Adventures: A Winter Night's Dream
summary: Shiny snowflakes, jingling bells and magic in the air... All this might not happen, because dark forces want to destroy our Christmas celebrations... again. We need your help!

name: Chetz!

name: Chicken Cannon!
summary: A 3D physics-based rage game. Reach the end of a colorful low poly open world by shooting the chicken from one cannon to another! Compete with the community to get the best time (if you ever manage to finish the game).

name: Chess Gambit
summary: Chess Gambit transports you to a low-poly environment where castles, tough soldiers, battle-hardened knights and loyal bishops are the true stars. Use your best strategies to open a path and conquer the castle of your opponent's king!

name: Checkers for Kids
summary: Checkers for Kids is a traditional and inspiring board game which attracts the attention of younger audience. There are lots of unique toys you can choose to play with and customize even further with your favorite addons. Black and white is too boring for you? Change up your playground however you want. And if you are tired and want to relax, just play with your pet fish which will cheer for you during your games against family and friends! If there's no one around to compete with, no need to worry: a skillful AI player will gladly play with you. To make it more accessible for players all over the world, the game offers a lot of settings to test all possible modes of checkers. Grab your favorite toy and improve your logic thinking while having fun!

name: Cheese Board
summary: A family-friendly game of skill for mobile devices. You move a yellow ball, a giant "ball of cheese", over a play-field full of traps and obstacles. The ball is moved by rolling and tilting your device. Follow the path to earn extra points - or take the shortcut and get your cheese home the easy way. Avoid holes, traps and obstacles. It's a game similar to popular labyrinth marble maze games, and yet it's different!

name: Championship Soccer '94
summary:
Championship Soccer '94 is based on the computer game Sensible Soccer: European Champions. The gameplay is identical: a fast-paced, top-down soccer game with emphasis on fast passes and simple control system.

Players can choose between 40 national, 64 club or 64 custom (fantasy) teams and can assemble their own tournaments (cup or league) with them. The number of participating teams and some of the rules can be customized. The main difference to the original is the reduced number of pre-set tournaments: for national teams World cup qualifiers and the new Maastricht Cup (a knockout tournament) and for club teams the European Superleague and EUFA Cup. Custom teams only have the Booby League and Turkey Tournament available anymore. Another important difference is that the athletes and tournaments no longer use original names, e.g. EUFA instead of UEFA.

The SEGA CD version uses its increased storage capacity for additional sound and some rendered movies, e.g. a flight over a stadium before starting a match.

Like the computer version, the only major change compared to the predecessor are the additional eleven national teams and updated team rosters. It also features the World Cup 1994 as pre-set tournament (with the original groups) instead of World Cup qualifiers. Otherwise it keeps the same pre-set tournament options and the option to create own tournaments (cup or league) with the 51 national, 64 club and 64 custom (fantasy) teams.

The Genesis version features original names which are slightly changed in the European SNES version (e.g. Klonsmann instead of Klinsmann). In the US version, the names have no resemblance to original athletes.

name: Chariot Land
summary: A 3D chariot shooting game The enemy invades, and you fight alone in your chariot.

name: Chess Kingdom
summary: This is a casual game where players wear helmets and become generals, leading their soldiers to fight with the enemy.

name: Child of Light: Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:
- Game
- Poster
- Artbook
- Bonus DLC

name: Chou Hatsumei Boy Kanipan: Hirameki Wonderland
Chicken Defender
summary: Test your skills in this 2.5D, low-poly tower defense game. Your objective is to protect a chicken coop from the attacks of the cunning foxes using different items and power-ups. The possibility of modifying your approach before each wave leads to the existence of multiple winning strategies.

name: Chance of the Dead
summary: Five years after her demise, Janet Burdie is granted a "night out" to make her greatest wish come true: Submitting her signature cake to the famous C3 baking competition!

name: Charlie Foxtrot & The Galaxy of Tomorrow
summary:
A rebel clone meets a zany galaxy in this high-intensity sci-fi parody. Hundreds of animations, spectacular humour, full sound-track and a bunny's lair worth of easter eggs make this game a must play!

You play Charlie Foxtrot, a clone who rebels against conformity. Undertaking an intergalactic quest so that he can assert his autonomy, Charlie travels to strange planets inhabited by dozens of parodied sci-fi characters. The humour is somewhere between Space Quest and Red Dwarf, but the adventure is beyond comparison.

name: Chimeras: What Wishes May Come - Collector's Edition
summary: Always Read the Fine Print

name: Chinese Frontiers
summary: Build the Great Wall and lead your village to glory in this immersive building and management simulator! Explore medieval China, develop your settlement, manage NPCs, and construct monumental structures. Your choices will shape the fate of an empire and leave a mark in history!

name: Chuckle Phrase Builder
summary: World of LOL is an online multiplayer game where the objective is to build the funniest sentence with bits of dark or wacky humour. Political correctness has no place in World of LOL !

name: Child of Abyss
summary: Child of Abyss is a 2D rougelike strategy card game where you play as the child who is trying bring its beloved dog back from the dead.

name: ChronoTecture: The Eprologue
summary: ChronoTecture: The Eprologue is an indie FPS adventure game created by an architectural designer. Discover a surreal world and story about Cats, Time-Travel, Life, Death, and Dreams. Featuring gameplay with futuristic archery, time-control, exploration, and platforming.

name: Chinese Bull
summary: Chinese Bull is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Chromatic Labyrinth
summary: Chromatic Labyrinth is a first person shooter with roguelike elements. The game features a random level generator and collectable items with passive effects.

name: Chimeras: Cursed and Forgotten - Collector's Edition
summary: You're off to Scotland in Chimeras: Cursed and Forgotten - Collector's Edition, a riveting hidden object puzzle adventure. Uncover more family secrets and enjoy additional Collector's Edition exclusives including collectible Tarot Cards, morphing objects, and more!

name: Change the World
summary: Human belief has the power to change reality. For millennia, alien races have been visiting Earth, gaining supernatural abilities and fantastic wealth by exploiting this remarkable power. But humans are advancing, and many aliens now find themselves leaving Earth with nothing but debts and regrets.

name: ChuSingura46+1 S: Chapter 4 & 5
summary: ChuSingura46+1 S: Chapter 4 & 5 is the second DLC package for ChuSingura46+1 S, an adventure themed erotic visual novel. This DLC contains the last two chapters, "Revenge Blooms, Settling Old Scores" and "Of Loyalty and Heroism".

name: ChuSingura46+1 S: Chapter 2 & 3
summary: The second DLC package from ChuSingura46+1 S which contains chapter two, Edo radicals which is the story of Horibe Yasubee and her comrades in Edo. And we also have Harbinger of spring which is the story of Ohishi Chikara.

name: Christmas Griddlers
summary:
Christmas Griddlers is many great prizes on this magic night.

The most magical night of the year. It's coming... RIGHT NOW! Today you have a unique opportunity to feel the atmosphere of great Christmas time! Start your jolly adventure with Christmas Griddlers.

name: Check-In
summary: Check-In is a mix between word games and trivia, packed as an online game show hosted by a streamer while its viewers compete for the win.

name: Charlie II: Expansion Pack
summary: This expansion pack adds a complete set of extra levels to Charlie II.

name: Chronicles of Ash
summary: Chronicles of Ash is a turn based, management, simulation game set in the fantasy world of Askara where you take the role of a retired veteran hero that decided to open an adventuring guild to train the next generation of heroes.

name: Christmas Elf
summary: Christmas Elf will help you to fully decorate your Windows desktop for Christmas. The app offers many ways to decorate for the holidays, including lights and garlands, different types of snow, Christmas trees, festive tunes, and beautiful wallpapers.

name: Choice of the Vampire: St. Louis, Unreal City
summary: A monster roams the Missouri countryside, hunting vampires. Will the vampire court of St. Louis tear itself apart even before he comes for their heartsblood? And how can this unreal city look to the future when the specters of the past refuse to stay dead?

name: Chronicle of Ekan
summary: Chronicle of Ekan is a shareware RPG with Final Fantasy-esque gameplay (turn-based combat). It features an emotive science fantasy storyline and an interesting card magic system.

name: ChibiClubTD
summary: Chibiclub TD is a Mazing Tower Defence game.Using 50 Towers must stop 40 waves of Chibi's from entering the S54 a very trendy nightclub. For reasons! Very Unique Concept in Tower Defence. Rewarding for New TD players and Veterans alike.

name: Chicken Invaders 4: Easter Edition
summary: New problems are hatching this Easter! Can you fight off an army of invading Easter Bunnies?

name: Christmas Stories: The Christmas Tree Forest - Collector's Edition
summary: Only you can save Christmas!

name: Chimeras: Cherished Serpent - Collector's Edition
summary: A series of deaths plague a small town, but who or what caused them?

name: Christmas Stories: The Gift of the Magi - Collector's Edition
summary: Help your little sister get a second chance this Christmas after she gets on the naughty list.

name: Chicken Duty
summary: You've agreed to watch over the neighbor's chicken while they're away, and now you must lead it to safety as quick as possible!

name: Child of Light: The Golem's Plight Pack
summary: The Golem's Plight Coffer contains the Golem quest, which unlocks another powerful ally to fight alonside Aurora. Also included in the pack are the unique, powerful Erin's Stone and a pack of smaller Rough oculi: 3 Blue, 3 Red and 3 Green.

name: Chronotopia: Second Skin
summary: Chronotopia: Second Skin is a unique rewriting of the Donkeyskin fairytale, a darker variation of Cinderella. Follow Kionna into a painful but ultimately rewarding search for her true self.

name: Choplifter HD: Arrowhead Chopper
summary: An advanced-radar equipped helicopter, the Arrowhead gives you the rescue head-count without having to fly to a pickup!

name: Chigau!!!
summary: Mistake romance meta novel game. Catch the heroine.

name: Chroma Quaternion: Experience & RP x2
summary: All characters' experience and RP gained increases by 100%.

name: Chroma Quaternion: Experience x3
summary: All characters' experience gained increases by 200%.

name: Chat Millions: Stream Quiz Game
summary: Play the classic 4-choice quiz with a new twist, and see if your twitch chat has what it takes to win the millions.

name: ChromaBeat
summary: Rhythm-based matching madness! Lineup holograms of matching colors in time with the beat in this exciting and smutty science-punk puzzler!

name: ChineseZodiac
summary: The game is a first-person single-player shooting game. The lower right corner will randomly list the targets that need to be killed.The quantity of ammunition is limited and the target needs to be killed within a specified period of time.

name: Chinbu's Adventure: Ice World
summary: Continue Chinbu's Adventure in a brand new world covered with ice and snow!

name: Cherry Blossom Fleet
summary: cherry blossom fleet is a 2D shooting game set in the Japanese Navy of World War II.

name: Charlie: The Legend
summary: Equip yourself with the best weapons and get ready to face your worst fears... Charlie: The Legend aspires to become a must have for all those who enjoy multiplayer horror games. Charlie is an asymmetrical multiplayer horror video game in which 4 Survivors must face a diabolical doll possessed by a demon. It's up to you! Play as Charlie and defeat the other players or take on Charlie as a survivor.

name: Chroma
summary: Set out on a mission to stop the attacks of the tyrannical machines. Fight your way through a dystopian city and stop them. You are the city's only hope...

name: Charge Champs
summary: Charge Champs is a 2D platform fighter with a unique combat system where players charge their character to temporarily unlock abilities and gain an advantage over their opponents.

name: Champoo Club
summary: Champoo Club is a challenging action game with arena fighting, involving sword, missile and cute characters.

name: Chickenman
summary: Be Chickenman and punch those sheep! Old fashioned arcady fun!

name: Christmas Movie Bingo
summary: Prepare to take your Christmas movie night to the next level of fun with Chrismas Movie Bingo. See if you can spot enough Chrismas film tropes to get 5-in-a-row!

name: Checkers
summary: This cancelled first-party Astrocade game was released in very limited quantities by New Image in late 1985.

name: Chocobo GP
summary: Get set for a new racing experience in Chocobo GP, featuring a roster of dozens of Chocobo characters, complete with their own unique abilities and variants. Choose your favorite Chocobo series character, and race through familiar tracks set in the Final Fantasy universe. It won't be easy crossing the finish line first. Find magic stones called Magicites (including Fire, Water, and more) throughout the track and equip them to take out the competition. Engine customization options will be available, as well as local and online multiplayer. Up to 64 players can compete in a bracket-style tournament to determine the racing champion.

name: Chorus: Day One Edition
summary:
Take control of Nara, once the Circle's deadliest warrior, now their most wanted fugitive, on a quest to destroy the dark cult that created her. Unlock devastating weapons and mind-bending abilities in Chorus, a true evolution of the space-combat shooter. Along with Forsaken, her sentient starfighter, explore ancient temples, engage in exhilarating zero-g combat, and venture beyond our waking reality.

Chorus: Day One Edition includes a copy of the base game and the Elder Armor Skin Set. Resplendent in gold and purple livery, reserved only for the most exalted members of the Circle, the Elder Armor harks back to Nara's military past. This cosmetic pack can be applied to Forsaken as well as all three of the starting weapons; the Gatling Gun, Missile Launcher and Laser Cannon.

name: Chronicles of Sarval: Bridges of Koni
summary: After the appearance of a mysterious wizard, the bridges of Koni were bewitched. The king summons Sarval's wizards to help him. You are Helm, a wizard willing to solve the problem. Based on graph theory, the player needs to find the path that only passes through each bridge once.

name: Chill Corner
summary: This is just an idle game for chillout and relaxing.

name: Chess
summary: "Chess" is a turn based combat game.

name: Chronicles of Etia: A Samhain Story
summary: Episode one of a four-part prequel. A story of magic, mayhem and fairies. A perfect game to get into the Halloween spirit. If you enjoy RPGs from the SNES period then this may be the game for you, as my big inspirations for the game were Lufia and Breath of Fire.

name: Choo-Choo Charles
summary: Navigate an island in an old train, upgrade it over time, and use it to fight an evil sentient train that terrorizes your home. Charles is hungry; don't be his next meal.

name: Check, please!: Restaurant Simulator
summary: Check, please! is a restaurant tycoon/simulator game. It puts you in charge of making your restaurant the best dining destination in town. Build and decorate, manage staff, keep your facilities clean, serve delicious food, and more.

name: Chameleon Run+
summary: Chameleon Run+ is a unique, fast and challenging autorunner with a colorful twist. Jump, switch and run through expertly crafted levels that will have you running back for more. Your goal is to switch your color to match the ground as you run and jump from platform to platform. Sounds easy right? Well think again!

name: Chicken Cha Cha Cha
summary:
The award-winning memory-training board game for up to four kids! Kids aged 4 and up race animated chickens around a meadow, all while training their visual memory. Who will be the first to collect all tail feathers and cackle in triumph? Parents are invited to play and test their memory skills, too! The goal of the game: To adorn yourself with borrowed plumes. Try to match the card that's next in your way with a card in the middle of the game board to advance. If your chicken catches up to the next player, you are able to steal her feathers! Collect all feathers to win the game. The fast-paced brainteasing chicken rally is a exciting classic for kids of all ages.
The colorful, merry chickens take this board game classic and bring it to the iPad with intuitive controls suitable for children. The screens are full of details to explore and easily accessible for even the youngest kids, thanks to numerous tests done with children during development of the app. Parents can customize the difficulty and limit the number of games allowed in a play session. Once the play session is over, night comes and the chicken go to bed. Easy, child-oriented, kid-safe - like the "real" board game. Chicken Cha Cha Cha helps to train visual memory and concentration - essentials skills in child development.

name: Chess Puzzle Adventure
summary:
The King and Queen have been captured and only you can save them. Journey though 100 levels of puzzles based on chess principles. Use your chess skills to outsmart the enemy as you make your way through multiple settings. Along the way, you will encounter new challenges that will further test your chess prowess. Are you ready?
New to chess? The tutorial will introduce how the different chess pieces attack and you can always tap the Chart button if you need a quick reminder.

name: Chop Chop Tennis
summary:
Chop Chop Tennis is a unique action tennis game. Chop Chop Tennis is certainly the most frantic, intuitive and enjoyable tennis game ever created for your iDevice! Play as one of the 8 original characters and enhance your experience with the Ultimate Pack
available in the Chop Chop Shop. 10 new characters, 5 new tennis courts! Are you up to the challenge?

name: Chill IV
summary: Chill is a relaxing, minimalist maze game.

name: Chicken with Dynamites
summary:
It seems easy to do all 3 at first try but you will find otherwise as the level progresses.
Free the imprisoned chicks by blowing up their cages to complete a level. Don't forget to eat all the corns too before rescuing the last chick and keep your health at 100% for a perfect game score. Avoid all the snipers and entities that can send you to chicken heaven (or someone's dinner plate).
The game looks easy to play but your strategy skills will be challenged on higher levels.

name: Chimeraland
summary:
ChimeraLand is an open-world survival game with strong RPG elements set in a prehistoric, mythical world.
You need to gather resources, craft items, grow crops, and research technologies. Start from building a survival shelter to constructing a massive base in outer space!

name: Champions and Challengers
summary: Challenge the Dice Lord to the ultimate Adventure Time game! Prepare thyself for legendary freakin’ battles in Champions & Challengers!

name: Chezzle
summary: An endless, thought provoking, meditative Chess puzzler with a twist. Clear the board by chaining together moves. By becoming the piece that you capture, you'll need to plan ahead and try chain together moves to clear the board. The game has been carefully crafted with healing and meditation in mind. Chezzle features over 18 relaxing soundtracks, as well as rain effects to boot. Get lost in the world of Chezzle, a thought provoking experience.

name: Charlie Charlie the Challenge and Game
summary: The story of Charlie is only just beginning to surface. The tale goes that a little boy named Charlie has died and his soul has remained trapped on Earth. Charlie's spirit can be summoned by crossing two pens or pencils to create a grid (with sectors labelled "yes" and "no") and then asking questions of "Charlie". The upper pencil is then expected to rotate to indicate the answer to such questions. But, the main question everyone asks is "can we play Charlie Charlie."

name: Chooche
summary:
Young gamers and those young at heart Chooche brings you incredibly entertaining and ultra-addictive way to spend your time and squash a few virtual chickens in the process!
Put your skills to the test by trying to place the whole chickens flock on the road for some squashing! With simple tilt or touch controls that anyone can play and develop timing and coordination skills in the process. Each level presents more of a challenge, successful gamers are rewarded with several hidden bonus levels and bonus points.

name: Chalk Up!
summary: Chalk Up! is a fast-paced anagrams/word game. With its two dictionaries, two ways of playing, and its three game modes, you'll be able to have fun for hours while you'll be checking your brain speed and your word knowledge.

name: Chest Quest
summary:
Turn your living room or backyard into a world of treasure hunting, and yourself into a fearless pirate. Run around breaking the floors and ground open in your quest for fame and glory.
Your adventure starts on Skull Island, digging for coins. Once you have enough coins, you can buy yourself a treasure map from the local merchant. Each map leads you to a unique exotic relic - can you collect them all?
After collecting all the relics on an island, you are ready to set sail for the next. Each new island offers its own exciting theme and the further you explore the harder it gets.
What are you waiting for? Set your sails, grab your shovel and get ready to dig! Chest Quest is an immersive and exciting adventure for the whole family.

name: Chess Boss
summary: In the world of chess there are millions of players,

name: Chess Cards: Mate! Unlimited
summary:
Chess Cards Game is a strategy game with full information (meaning you know the cards of your opponent), played with a set of just 20 cards and simple rules.
But don't be misled!

Despite simple rules the game is challenging and requires smart thinking and forseeing the moves of the other player. What's more, it is a game where the winning depends on your skills and not your luck!

Each match consists of two rounds and the players exchange the cards after the first round. In this way the match result doesn't depend on the luck of the initial draw, but on the strategic skills of the players.

You may choose between two beautiful sets of cards, with chess and classic theme, displayed in native resolution on devices ranging from iPhone 4S to XS Max and iPad Pro. Gentle sound effects will also enhance your game experience.

name: Christmas Solitaire
summary: We kept Christmas Solitaire true to the spirit of the classic card game (also known as Klondike or Patience), and crafted a carefully designed app with sharp and clean visuals. If you love Solitaire classic, Spider Solitaire, FreeCell solitaire, Mahjong, Pyramid solitaire or any other free solitaire patience card games, don't miss out on the best solitaire for your phone and tablet! Just give the game a try, and we promise Solitaire by Jose Varela will be the most beautiful and user friendly solitaire game you've ever played.

name: Chicken Blaster
summary: Things have gone completely haywire for our humble poultry-farming friend! Crazy chickens have infiltrated his once anonymous and boring life -- and now all of his chickens are going mad! Chickens on rockets! Chickens on water skis! Chickens jumping on trampolines! In Chicken Blaster, it's time to put those crazy chickens in their place. Blast them off the farm with an arsenal of weapons -- but keep an eye on those egg-wielding birds determined to defend their new insane way of life.

name: Children of Morta: Ancient Spirits
summary: Ancient Spirits is the new DLC for Children of Morta, an action-adventure fantasy RPG. Ancient Spirits introduces a number of things: a new playable fighter character with two unique forms called Yajouj'Majouj (available only in Family Trials mode), new skins for each character, and an in-game package featuring new relics, charms and graces.

name: Children of Morta: Complete Edition
summary:
Children of Morta is a narrative driven hack and slash roguelike. Take on the role of a member of the Bergson family, the Guardians of Mount Morta, as you fight desperately against the Corruption. Experience not only what it means to be a hero, but to be part of a family that bears the weight of the mountain together.

Children of Morta: Complete Edition includes:
- Children of Morta base game
- Family Trials
- New difficulty settings
- New Game+ Mode
- A new playable character: Apan
- New items packs
- Ancient Spirits DLC
- Paws & Claws - DLC
- Family Fireside Fables

name: Chaos Control
summary:
The year is 2071, the aggressive Kesh Rhan aliens have already destroyed the human colonies on Mars and Pluto, and now plan to wipe out all humans from Earth as well. You play as Jessica Darkhill, lieutenant and most skilled pilot of the Orbital Defence Forces. The counter-attack you are about to launch is the last hope to save the Earth of chaos.

Chaos Control is a fast-paced shoot'em up featuring 3d pre-rendered environments, which means you cannot actually control the spaceship you are flying in, but are merely in charge of aiming at the various enemies appearing on screen.

Saturn version improves the load times of the original along with the pyrotechnic effects in this on the rails FMV shooter set in a futuristic space scenario.

name: Chicken Rune
summary: Arcade arena survival game influenced by Geometry Wars and Binding Of Isaac. Don't chicken out !

name: Chubby & Flubby
summary: Play as either Chubby or Flubby, and be the first to reach the top of the hole.

name: ChefSquad
summary: In ChefSquad, a Twitch only online experience, chat plays as the cooks, while the streamer plays as the all-seeing, all-controlling head chef. Work together to get orders out quickly or you'll fail the day. Unlock new foods, challenges and more as you progress through the 6-8 hour campaign together as a community!

name: Cherry
summary: multi screen first person action

name: Chaotic Thinking
summary: Let's picture chaos in a cool way along with Rosenrips' music.

name: Chain Champs
summary: Chain Champs is a two-player, gravity based, fast-paced brawler!

name: Chair Up!
summary: Sit on a swivel chair, kick out, and push yourself back!

name: Chaos Sisters
summary: Beat'em up of devils beating up heroes: Free demo available!

name: Cheating Fate
summary: Go against the odds. Survive the night. Cheat your fate.

name: Cheating Death
summary: Short horror game where you must survive the night filing paperwork

name: Chicken Hike
summary: Draw a single, continuous line to solve each puzzle.

name: Chamber of the Greblicks
summary: In this top-down puzzle game, explore the chamber and try to find a way to escape with your life.

name: Chasing Birds
summary: Become the king of the dog park! Chasing Birds is a relaxing, exploration game with no set objective. Explore the dog park by running around, barking, chasing birds or just take some time to lay down and relax.

name: Chip-Boi
summary: Chip-Boi is a puzzle platformer with a twist. The theme is "cheat to win".

name: Chichen-Itza
summary: Explore Chichen-Itza and collect various treasures while avoiding enemies that become invisible and be sure to light torches before the light goes out completely and kills you.

name: Chess
summary: Chess allows you to play a game of chess against either the computer or another player. All the rules of chess are included and the winner is the player that makes the other players King unable to move without being taken. Against the computer you are able to play as white or black and the computer has 10 skill levels (0-9) with zero being the easiest. You are also able to watch the computer play itself. There is also an Editor mode that allows you to set the board up with the pieces in any position you chose and you can attempt to get a mate in two or five moves as well.

name: Chaos of the Periodic Table
summary:
This game is an educational RPG that puts chemistry at centre stage of the game mechanics. Collect and gather elements form compounds and molecules and battle your way through a dystopian future.

In this game you will learn some chemistry concepts and develop/deepen your knowledge of the periodic table. Perfect for light-hearted study and/or just hack and slash your way to victory.

name: Chair F*cking Simulator
summary: Use our innovative patented funky fresh ChairF*cker simulation tech to meet the chair of your wildest dreams.

name: Chocolate Roll For Two
summary: Make the best chocolate roll and defeat reality.

name: Chuck Ball Idol
summary: Made for GMTK Game Jam 2019

name: Chibi Yandere Complete Edition
summary: Chibi Yandere Complete Edition

name: Checkmates
summary: Play matchmaker for your chess pieces

name: Chaincards
summary: Chaincards is a JRPG where you play as Chain, a young wizard whose goal is to find out his master’s magic notes to reveal the secrets behind his mysterious death

name: Chaseway
summary: A short top-down puzzle game about trains.

name: ChromeRivals
summary: ChromeRivals is a free to play MMO space shooter game

name: Chairades
summary: A physics-simulation game about building chairs.

name: Challenge Dream Cat
summary: Control the cute cat to move forward. Break through the Various traps and terrain to get a treat. This game is a 3D casual run game that anyone can enjoy.

name: Cheeky Chickens
summary:
70+ fun levels of pig-popping pleasure!

These cheeky chickens are tired of being the main course. It's time for these pigs to pop on a plate.

name: Chicken Nuggets
summary: Chicken Nuggets is a roll a ball puzzle game set in the countryside as an adorable round chicken. Solve puzzles on a journey that will take your far from your coop!

name: Chronotura
summary: Chronotura is an isometric platformer about solving puzzles using a watch that allows you to travel through time. But watch out! It gets trickier the more you advance.

name: Chinese Takeout!
summary: Help Kung Pow take down the Kung Fu Hustlers!

name: Chromavaders
summary: 80's-style arcade puzzle shooter mashup.

name: Check-In
summary: Manage the Covid-19 Crisis

name: Chesskoban
summary: Relaxing puzzle game for chess lovers and beginners using a combination of sokoban and chess mechanics.

name: Chronokicker 202K
summary: Chronokicker 202K is a two-player versus/brawler game that will melt your face through the fabric of time.

name: Chicku
summary: Local multiplayer platformer in which the players have to escape the evil Barrington farm.

name: Chicken Defense
summary: Save your chickens from jealous farmers by running around with it while placing towers.

name: Chigun
summary: Chigun is a free for all platformer, pitting a pair of pistol wielding chickens against each other. Collect bullets by pecking them up from around the battlefield then ricochet them off the blocks to blast your poultry opponent into giblets.

name: Chiiku Drill Pocket Monsters Diamond & Pearl: Moji Kazu Chie Asobi
summary: Chiiku Drill Pocket Monsters Diamond & Pearl: Moji Kazu Chie Asobi is an educational game based on the Pokemon series. More than 60 Pokemon will appear!

name: Chesstris 2000
summary: A 90s / 00s style block pushing game!

name: Chill Out
summary: A puzzle game that puts you in charge of the weather

name: Chess of the SOL
summary: The most unusual and fast chess for two in the style of the Middle Ages!

name: Christmas Fever!
summary: Classic 2D platformer with powerups. Holidays are approaching, so get in the Christmas mood by playing Christmas Fever! Help santa collect coins to buy gifts for Christmas!

name: Choices
summary: A small exploration on how the world might feel to someone outside of the gender binary

name: Chain Fury
summary: Connect enemies together with chain-combo action!

name: Cheshire in a Chatroom
summary: Drawing chatroom simulator

name: Cherry Rescue!
summary: Barry sets out to save his sister!

name: Chicken's Run
summary: Gather an army of chickens to battle hordes of dinos. Fun category winner at Brackeys Jam

name: Christmas Cookie
summary: Christmas Games = Holiday Fun! Help Santa match delicious Christmas cookies!

name: Christmas Wonderland 6
summary:
Christmas Wonderland 6 is an indie adventure game crammed full of gorgeous HOG scenes & superb mini puzzles, guaranteeing hours of fabulous fun for players of all ages. Find presents, and get game rewards and achievements as you play along.

Go to Springfield's Amazing Fun Park and win the helicopter ride of a lifetime. Go mall shopping and visit Mike and Emmas' Grandparents. Meet Elves and Rudolph at Santa's North Pole Workshops. Find oodles of Christmas Bonuses & Gold Reindeer, then Fly with Santa on Christmas Eve.

name: Chronicles of Etia: A Yuletide Story
summary: This is the second game from the Chronicles of Etia: A Samhain Story. It is a story that happens at Yule and is a story of magic, mystery and evil fairies. A story to get you into the festive spirit.

name: Chamber
summary: Chamber, an entry for Ludum Dare 47, is an indie action-adventure horror game. Choose which rooms to add to a dangerous temple while exploring its secrets and trying to escape.

name: Charge!
summary: Charge! is an 8-bit game about a viking rampage! Rampage across England with your battle-axe in this retro endless runner.

name: Check in the Back
summary: Work Lost-and-Found at a convention!

name: Chop
summary: A local multiplayer fighting game with a unique twist.

name: Chrono Alice
summary:
Included in the Story Me app.

Alice is a high schooler living in the "Showa" period, who meets a boy named Sho in the library, and the two instantly fall for each other. However, you find out that he's a high schooler from the "Reiwa" period. As "time" itself acts as a barrier for the two lovers, Alice also finds out that the library is struggling to stay open......

name: Chimps on a Blimp
summary:
GHXYK2, Swee Neezy, PilotRedSun, Penneh2006, GHXXXYK2, wolfpupy and Nick Flanagan present the 20th century’s hardest dirigible escape game:

Grow a brain to solve puzzles
Celebrate the Titanic of the dust bowl era.
How will the search for Amelia Earhart ever end?
Air Bud? Air Foe? Air Force One?
The Red Baron can spot any plane on the horizon.

But he couldn’t see this coming.

name: Chalkboard
summary: Explore an Escher inspired playground with nothing but a piece of chalk and your sense of adventure

name: Chick 'N Sword
summary: Loot, upgrade and teleport with the Chicken Sword!

name: Chicken Attack
summary:
Chicken Attack is a single player, 3-D, top-down, isometric game based loosely on the classic Breakout. It is the sequel to the game Chicken's Revenge.

The game features a hen who's out to rescue her chickens which have been captured and imprisoned. To secure their release our heroine fires a ball, 'Breakout style', at everything in her path. This clears the ground uncovers treasure which increases the score, pressure plates that allow her to advance and power-ups that may either help or hinder. All of which, if used carefully, will ultimately enable her to free the chicks. When the last chick has been freed the level is complete.

There are three types of game play, normal, easy and timed, in all the objective is to release the chicks and score points.

The game is entirely mouse controlled.

name: Chicken Butt
summary: Help Mayo the chicken get to space so he can finally fly

name: Chroma Tower
summary: Short platformer game made in godot

name: Charge Cycles
summary: Everyone needs a good recharge once in a while

name: Christmas at Marisol Bay
summary: Continue your journey with the Marisol Bay family in this Christmas side story!

name: Chimes: A Kinetic Novel
summary: Chimes is a 3 minute kinetic novel set in a zombie apocalypse

name: Chronomancy: Watchmaker's Curse
summary: Chronomancy: Watchmaker's Curse is a turn-based bullet hell game. Dodge tons of projectiles and plan your moves ahead to clear a path through every stage! Steal time from enemies to prevent your own lifetime from running out. Live on your last few seconds. Find your way through ever-changing floors in a level that's different every time!

name: Chronodog: Earth Defender
summary: Can you save the world in only one second?

name: Chimney Prowler
summary: Christmas horror with a twist

name: Chainitaire
summary: Solitaire game about making long chains of cards.

name: Chaos Mansion
summary:
Chaos Mansion is a point & click escape room puzzle game.

You will play the role of a sect´s prisoner. Waking up in a cell you must find the way to escape before the adepts come back and use you as a sacrifice to summon the mighty Cthulhu. Find the way to get out while discovering little narrative pills to know more about that crazy sect.

name: Channel 83
summary: Channel 83 is a last gen entertainment experience.

name: Chronobreak
summary: Time traveling, Will Smith and evil cyborgs- what more could you want?

name: Chill Pill
summary:
Grandma needs to chill in Chill Pill, an indie action arcade game. Take some chill pills, but make sure you put them in the right container. Now, remember: pink pills go in the pink container. Green pills go in the green container.

Got it? Chill.

name: Chronomina
summary: Time is running out, you must manage your time carefully while complete your duties.

name: Chrysalis
summary:
Defend your Chrysalis from growing hordes of monsters in this hybrid game that combines elements of tower defense, survival, and roguelike RPGs. Explore procedurally generated levels, possess and control animals, and grow deadly gardens. How far can you get before the next wave of monsters attacks?

In Chrysalis, you play the role of an incorporeal Wisp tasked with defending a magical Chrysalis from the forces of disease, dark magic, and death. The Wisp cannot physically interact with the world, but it can draw power from the natural world and inhabit animals and plants. Using these powers, the Wisp must explore the world and use what it finds to defend the Chrysalis at all costs.

name: Christmas Horror
summary:
Merry Christmas!

Santa Claus is ready to take over your soul and gain a few more years of life. He only needs two days to get all the resources he needs for the ritual, so this is your time to escape!

You can escape on your own or finish off Santa, it's up to you, but we don't know how to finish him off yet... Just make sure he don't catch you or he will just make your life difficult.

Technical details:
Christmas Horror is a short horror FPS (first-person-shooter) game where you must find a way to escape Santa's house using the scattered items around. You have two ways of escaping and even a way to finish santa forever! As a child, you have severe limitations such as carryng only 1 item per time and of course, being slowly than Santa. The game has no save system, so you just have one chance to escape.

Good Luck and remember, be a nice child and maybe he forgives you.

name: Chameneon
summary:
Run, jump and dodge! Chameneon is a 2D Runner with unique physics that create a great challenge!

Switch the neon colors and surf your way to the end. A powerful virus has infected the Cyber Space and now is up to you to control a manual message called CHAMENEON.

Collect the Neon Disks to show everyone who's boss. With simple gameplay and tons of stages to go throgh, you will be tested to the limit!

So what are you waiting for? It's your time to shiny!

name: Chameleon Twist 2
summary: Chameleon Twist 2 is the direct sequel to Chameleon Twist. The original Japanese version kept the original design for the main characters, whereas the international release changed them to more realistic-looking chameleons.

name: Chamber.Repeat();
summary: Chamber.Repeat(); is a small 2D puzzle game where the level always changes. Just like Andy Warhol's "Campbell Soup's", some elements shift and change while you have to reach the finish over and over again, getting more difficult with more and more chamber elements.

name: Choro 2021
summary: Choro 2021 is a mobile game released for Android and iOS on 5 December 2021. The game follows a cowboy in a dystopian Venezuela that has to fight malandros, soldiers, zombies and witches, while finding references of the country, such as an empanada, a Toronto or a Riko Malt. In the first released level, the protagonist has to cross Mission Zamora and fight the witch Bruja Maruja. Developed by Venezuelan filmmaker Carl Zitelmann and based in an homonymous novel, Choro 2021 is an action and adventure metroidvania, with a design similar to Contra, Mega Man, Castlevania and Ninja Gaiden.

name: Chess and Dungeons
summary: Chess with elements of Dungeons & Dragons 5e.

name: Chigau!!!+
summary: Mirai Minato, a boy student who attends Mokuyo High School, is woken up by a noisy childhood friend who takes care of him as usual.

name: Chigau!!!+: Premium Edition
summary:
Mirai Minato, a boy student who attends Mokuyo High School, is woken up by a noisy childhood friend who takes care of him as usual.

This edition includes the following PS4 Game:
- Chigau!!!+
- B2 Tapestry
- Original Soundtrack
- Original Acrylic Key Chain

name: Christmas Massacre
summary: Larry's Christmas tree has been telling him to kill. But whose side is the tree really on? And can he trust what he's hearing? CHRISTMAS MASSACRE is an 80's inspired stealth slasher game with low-poly, PS1-style graphics. Sneak, stalk and murder your prey without being caught. You must kill without being seen to complete each level.

name: Christmas Wonderland 12
summary: Christmas Wonderland 12 is an indie adventure game. Enjoy magnificent Christmas festivities in Springfield. Help Santa at the North Pole. Visit Robot Toy Workshops, an Ice Palace, Petting Zoo & Grotto. See Dancer's new baby Reindeer.

name: Christmas Racing
summary: Christmas Racing is an action-packed racing game and your focus is to be the first and surpass your opponent. The terrain is treacherous, so you need to pay attention to your speed and really do everything you can to improve. This is the ultimate holiday-themed race where you must use all your skills and become a great driver. There are multiple cars to choose from and you will be impressed with the numerous gameplay mechanics and ideas. Check it out today and see if you can defeat all other drivers!

name: Cham the Cat Adventure
summary: The first in the fictional "GAME BUDDY" portable game series! Dedicated to the game boys and girls of the past. A retro-style action game!

name: Child vs. Clowns
summary: Child vs Clowns - Top Down View with elements of the Bomberman game.

name: Chilli Con Valley
summary: Chilli con Valley! Help the Bean reach its chilli con Carne pot as fast as possible. Jump over Obstacles and dangerous objects just like lava and knives. Who doesn't want to help a poor little bean? Chilli con valley is a game for people with a lot of persistence and a mentally strong head.

name: Christmas Panic
summary: Christmas Panic is a Christmas, trash arena shooter where you have to face alone, a crowd of elf slaves working in a factory for the production of sex toys.

name: Chess: Clash of Kings
summary: Our app is ideal for everyone. It contains 10 different levels of difficulty, over 400 challenges and a diverse set of boards and pawns to make the game even more enjoyable.

name: Charm
summary: A flash fiction about truth, lies, and tips.

name: Christmas Break 2
summary: Christmas Break 2 is an arcade game that lets the user knock out Christmas items with a unique Candy Cane paddle and Snow Globe ball. Unique Animated levels, Mini-Bosses and Powerups to collect as you progress through the levels. Thirty Levels to compete in and battle mini bosses on your way to victory. Single player fun and arcade style entertainment.

name: Chef Word Ardee
summary: Bon Appetit! Join Chef Word Ardee in helping him find and put together letters to form words. Lots of word puzzles to play, find hidden words and earn hints to help you solve the puzzle.

name: Chimeras: What Wishes May Come
summary: Always Read the Fine Print. Elephant Games returns with a brand-new tale of despair and deception with Chimeras: What Wishes May Come!

name: Chimeras: Mark of Death
summary: The past can be deadly! Chimeras: Mark of Death is a thrilling hidden-object puzzle adventure game.

name: Chimeras: Price of Greed
summary: A fortune is on the line in a mansion full of supernatural secrets!

name: Christmas Stories: Puss in Boots
summary: Why would anyone stop Christmas?

name: Christmas Stories: The Christmas Tree Forest
summary: Only you can save Christmas!

name: Christmas Stories: Yulemen
summary: A Christmas Calamity Hits Iceland!

name: Christmas Stories: Alice's Adventures
summary: Meet familiar characters in new places and return joy to the world in Christmas Stories: Alice's Adventures, an enchanting hidden-object puzzle adventure game!

name: Chaos Adrift
summary: After accepting a suicide mission to end the Galactic World War, you drift, out of fuel and with no hope of being saved, how long will you survive?

name: Child of Lothian
summary: In Child of Lothian, you play as an orphan robbed of her childhood as her family is put on trial by malicious witch hunters. You are left on the streets to escape their persecution inside the bustling 18th century Edinburgh.

name: Christmas Run
summary: ChristmasRun is a runner style arcade game where the user leaps and dashes through obstacles to get to the finish line. Play and survive through 12 levels as Santa Claus to bring a Merry Christmas to all!

name: Chemistry and Physics
summary:
When you agreed to meet him, you thought it would all end amicably. That you could go away and close this chapter of your life. Instead, you're now running from him. Bad news: no cell phone reception. You can't call for help. You're stuck. Good news: this is familiar territory. This is your lab. Can you get out of this alive?

A short and violent story written for Ectocomp 2013.

name: Chromarena
summary: Chromarena is a 2D top-down twin-stick arena shooter. Combine offense and defense to tear through hordes of color-coded enemies to unlock new guns and set high scores. Form short and medium-term plans, dodge attacks with fully responsive controls, and get into a flow state.

name: Chaos Chain
summary: Chaos Chain is a dark cyberpunk roleplaying game set in a bleak dystopian future. Assume the role of a desperate dweller of Slade City, a sprawling urban nightmare of grimy asphalt and broken dreams where crime and disorder run rampant. - Stay Alert. Stay Armed. Stay Alive. Don't lose your humanity.

name: Cheftastic: Buffet Blast
summary: Cheftastic: Buffet Blast is a new exciting top-down arcade shooter! Take back the Isle of Verdura from swarms of mutant vegetables and climb your way to the top of the leaderboard!

name: Chemistris
summary: Chemistris is a tetris-like game based on chemistry equations. Let's play chemistry! Play fire, play water, play every elements in the universe!

name: Christmas Stories: Yulemen - Collector's Edition
summary: A Christmas Calamity Hits Iceland!

name: Chronicles of Deeps
summary: Chronicles of Deeps is Sci-fi FPS where you need to control submarines to get through story. In 2070, an event happened which left the whole world under the ocean. People separated on fractions and started to fight for resources. In 2112, some things happened which you should discover in this game.

name: Chaos Uproar
summary: Chaos Uproar is an FPS Single player game. An Action and Adventure packed dark atmospheric game with only basic moves and shooting skills. Analyze your enemies and plan you own move to defeat them. Powered with AI and horror ambience, this game will drip the sweat out your forehead.

name: Chicken Empire: Weasel in Shadows
summary: Turn-based stealth strategy game, where you try to infiltrate the Chicken Empire bases looking for clues that will help find your friend, the Frog who has been missing since the last chicken raid. Throughout your journey, you will uncover many secrets, and maybe even more than you wanted to know!

name: Cheeky Princess
summary: Princess Ida is a proud student of the Royal Academy of Heroes but her father returned from the war and decided to arrange his daughter's personal life. How will his gamble turn out?

name: Chimes
summary: Chimes is a silly PvP game with a fully controllable character and goofy Ragdoll physics.

name: Chesskoban Bishop
summary: Relaxing puzzle game for chess lovers and beginners using a combination of sokoban and chess mechanics. Capture enemy bishops to complete levels.

name: Choice: Texas
summary: Choice: Texas is an educational interactive fiction game addressing reproductive healthcare access in the state of Texas. Play as one of five Texas women attempting to navigate the state's reproductive healthcare system. Although billed as interactive fiction, Choice: Texas is based on extensive research into healthcare access, legal restrictions, geography, and demographics, and is reflective of the real circumstances facing women in the state.

name: Chronomaster
summary: You are Korda, the Chronomaster. You must re-start time and right the wrongs of a war-plagued past in this epic quest for vengeance. Journey through man-made "pocket universes" full of cyborgs, pirates and witches who provide deadly puzzles. It's up to you to return justice to the stars.

name: ChaoticNightmare
summary: "FerryGate" focuses on the experience of walking in horror scenes. Players will carry cameras to explore special places in areas blocked by the government, record videos, and avoid the supernatural creatures' kill

name: ChessCraft
summary: Never play the same game of chess again! ChessCraft is a chess AI sandbox. Create your own chess boards, rules, and pieces. Play against the computer or your friends online, or win loot by playing one of 80 built-in chess boards in adventure mode.

name: Chinese Driving Test Simulator
summary: Are you ready to take on the challenge of the Chinese driving test? For which it will test your skill of driving, knowledge of vehicle and traffic rules. The Chinese Driving Test Simulator will show you a complete, realistic Chinese driving test experience.

name: Chick Boy Adventures
summary: Chick Boy Adventures - Immerse yourself in the fantasy world of dreams of an unprecedented sweet tooth and collect all the goodies before someone else eats them! Collect sweets in the vast nooks and crannies of your mind and get as far as possible on this extraordinary adventure.

name: Child of Hope
summary: In this old-school RPG, you are the Child of Hope.

name: Chibi Girl vs. Evil Zombie Dead
summary: Suddenly there was a zombie apocalypse. All the adults turned into zombies! Chibi Girl is looking for her mother and tries to save the world.

name: Chaos Brigade
summary: Chaos Brigade is an arcade platform-shooter space odyssey where you control a team of six space exterminators and lead them in the ultimate space cleanse. Wipe out the enemies with your arsenal, but don't overdo or you'll risk destroying the spaceships you are meant to save in the first place!

name: Cheat Day
summary: Your wife is captured by demons! You must find the passwords to the doors to release demons so they free your wife. Try to survive and crack the puzzles to find the passwords.

name: Chibi Dash
summary: Chibi Dash is a fully procedural endless Running adventure. Explore unique Magnificent world using characters from different time periods.

name: Chemists: Area of infection
summary: A year after the global catastrophe, you woke up in a hospital and don't remember anything. You have to not only find out what happened, but also try to survive in this harsh dangerous world.

name: Chef RPG
summary: Craft your culinary adventure in a beautiful pixel art world. Manage your restaurants, forage and hunt for ingredients, befriend locals, and grow your culinary empire. What kind of chef will you be?

name: Childlike
summary: Use objects not to step on the floor. Do not step on the road outside. Run away from the Guard at school. Run away from the haunted doll.

name: Chunithm New
summary: The 13th game in the hit rhythm game series by Sega. Brand-new machine is launched in japan named 'Gold Model'. It has 120Hz Monitor used, and user can pay japanese electronic money. Asia version will be launching Early 2022.

name: Chunithm Super Star Plus
summary: The append version of Chunithm Super Star Plus (Standalone Expansion). It has launched Sep 2, 2021 via Online Update. Added the new features: Course Mode, World's End.

name: Chrono Cross: The Radical Dreamers Edition
summary: Chrono Cross: The Radical Dreamers Edition is a remaster of Chrono Cross bundled with Radical Dreamers, which was previously only released for the Satellaview in Japan.
developers: Square Enix Creative Business Unit I

name: Chef Life: A Restaurant Simulator
summary: Create and manage your dream restaurant! Menus, purchasing, décor, staff, equipment, customers… and don't forget the actual cooking! Experience the daily life of a restaurateur and earn your stars from the Michelin Guide.

name: Chronicles of 2 Heroes: Amaterasu's Wrath
summary: Chronicles of 2 Heroes is an intense 16-bit action platformer with Metroidvania elements and a singular mechanic: you can switch in real-time between the two main characters! The Samurai and the Kunoichi have unique, surprising combat styles that you will need to master to save feudal Japan from the goddess Amaterasu and her fearsome minions.

name: Chosung Quiz
summary: It is an initial consonant quiz and a game made for Koreans.

name: Chain Champ
summary: Chain Champ is an unconventional platformer in which you play as a cosmic vagrant to save the large flightless birds of a dying planet - using only your grappling hook. Not one feather can be scorched.

name: Checkers Minimal
summary: Checkers Minimal contains all essential parts of good checkers game.

name: Chaos Faction
summary: Chaos Faction is an arena game with customizable characters and tons of weapons and maps.

name: Chaos Faction 2
summary: Chaos Faction 2 is the second game in the Chaos Faction arena game series, featuring more characters, maps, and items, with the same old arena fighting gameplay.

name: Chichens
summary: Chichens is a mobile simulation game that is all about tapping, you guessed it, chickens! Chichens are cute, silly little critters that go insane when you tap them and drop all sorts of fun things. Fill each world with chichens and unlock the next one. You never know what these silly chichens are going to do!

name: Chaos Girl
summary: The seal of the millennium was broken, and evil came back to the world. Only those who possess the power of Chaos can seal the evil again. You will experience an adventurous journey against evil.

name: Charlie in the Moistverse of Madness
summary: Charlie in the Moistverse of madness is a small fangame made to celebrate the amazing Moistverse meme that took the world by storm. Feel the power of screaming "YEAA BABY" from the top of your lungs to put fear on your enemie's hearts. This game truly makes you feel.. like Critical.

name: Chess Crown
summary: Chess Crown chess in a medieval fantasy theme and with the opportunity to compete with other players on the network.

name: Chastity Catastrophe
summary: Chastity Catastrophe is a action platformer where instead of beating up enemies, you break your friends out of chastity equipment!

name: Chao's Collection of Random Games
summary: A collection of games including a 2D and a 3D pinball platformer, a tower defense game, a generic turn-based RPG, an RTS game, a puzzle based platformer etc.

name: Chair Spinning Simulator
summary: Chair Spinning Simulator is a short quirky game where you have to spin a chair as fast as possible to reach space in under 60 seconds!

name: Chefy-Chef
summary: Once again approaching the refrigerator, Chefy magically finds himself in new worlds in which he has to find the ingredients for his favorite dish!

name: Christmas Celebration With Sakuya Izayoi
summary: Celebrate Christmas with Sakuya Izayoi from the Touhou Project in this cozy visual novel! Explore the colourful sights of the human village in Gensokyo as it hosts a one of a kind festival with several venues and gorgeous sights to see!

name: ChickenZ
summary: ChickenZ is an arena shooter where you have to fight in a post-apocalyptic location against crowds of angry zombies that will try to eat you.

name: Chimeras: Mark of Death - Collector's Edition
summary: An open-and-shut case is suddenly reopened by a violent murder!

name: Chronicon: Ancient Beasts
summary: The first DLC to Chronicon expands upon the endgame content with Expeditions, Passive Skill Tree, Artifact items, Mythical crafting, and Beast companions with inventory space!

name: Chimeras: Mortal Medicine - Collector's Edition
summary: The children of Ronas have fallen victim to a strange illness. With their condition worsening, you’ve been called in to investigate. What starts as a simple investigation quickly takes a dark turn as you uncover secrets and encounter a dangerous creature of unknown origins! Can you save the children before it’s too late? Find out in this hair-raising hidden-object puzzle adventure!

name: Chicken Coop
summary: Chicken Coop - Top Down View is a game where you have to beat eggs and provide yourself with offspring. Beat them in the right direction so that the chickens get their long-awaited eggs. Your work will be duly rewarded, happy chickens and lots of chickens.

name: Chester
summary: After a tragic accident, you find yourself fighting your worst fears. With your best friend Chester at your side, you'll face down what lurks in the dark.

name: Christine
summary: Christine is a young orphan who works at the Paris Opera, with an unexplored talent for singing. If history sometimes repeats itself, will an Angel of Music help her to achieve her dreams?

name: Chernobyl Trap
summary: You are survived pilot of fallen helicopter. Your mission is simple: go to evacuation point. But can you do it and not die?

name: Chess Club
summary: The greatest strategy game of all times! Select a stunning environment and challenge your friends, our AI, or one of the millions of Chess fans around the world.

name: Chronicle of Infinity
summary: Chronicle of Infinity is an MMORPG that plunges you in the middle of a battles between the Astral Alliance and the Obsidian Alliance.

name: Chaos;Head Noah / Chaos;Child Double Pack
summary:
Two delusions become one. Enjoy both Delusional Science Adventure Series in one cartridge!
Both games feature branching paths and multiple endings. Where will your delusion take you?

name: Chitty Chitty Train
summary: Chitty Chitty Train is a puzzle game about coordinating trains. Guide your train to pick up all passengers and reach the exit without colliding with other trains or obstacles. The game also contains a level editor to modify levels.

name: Chaos;Head Noah / Chaos;Child Double Pack: SteelBook Launch Edition
summary: The edition comes with a steelbook featuring exclusive art drawn by the character designer Mutsumi Sasaki.

name: Chroma Chronicles
summary: Fast, turn-based, PVP deckbuilding game created by streamer BoxBox. Recently launched on Kickstarter!

name: Chocolat: Maid Cafe "Curio"
summary: The main character's father suddenly gets remarried without noticing him, and he starts a new life with his father, a new mother and a younger sister, Suzu. But his new parents go on honeymoon for three months, and he is forced to work at his father's coffee shop until they come back. He is totally confused with his new life at first. But he meets various girls, falls in love and gradually starts to enjoy his life....

name: Chrono Days
summary:
This game follows a female character named Saige (renameable) who is given a device that lets her travel through a portal, taking her 100 years into the past.

Chrono Days allows the player to go through 30 days, traveling through the past and present. The player can interact with eight dateable characters and choose between multiple endings. There are also available cheat codes to skip days, earn money, earn hp, unlock characters and skip the relationships to get the full relationship.

name: Chowder: Rump-A-Thump
summary: Chowder is helping Mung Daal with three different items, thumpster,cutterfly,and spinzle with his rump(end). There are different foods for you to get for the orders. There are lots of hazards for you to dodge,avoid,and keep away.

name: Chubby Cat
summary: A cutie little kitty who loves eating. Cut the wool thread precisely to feed the cat. Many stages and lots of fun in this game that suit both children and adults alike.

name: Choose your Poison
summary: You must take a pill. Some are safe, others will kill you. Using process of elimination, survive as long as you can, with as few casualties as possible.

name: Chesskoban Cyber
summary: Community Based Chess Game. On a cyber map, Move Knights, Bishops, Rooks, go through Portals and capture the Enemy Pieces. Level up by Playing and Building. Be the Best in the levels and win Medals. Reinvent in Creative Mode by creating your own levels and sharing.

name: Chinese Train Trip
summary: First-person exploration. Genre: adventure. Train travel simulator in China. You will find a free world, buying and selling items, riding a train and much more.

name: Chest Mate
summary: A precision based tower defense/puzzle game that focuses on optimization! Control your cannon, optimize your defenses and defend your mate! Chest Mate is a challenging aim-based strategy game.

name: Charset Crossfire
summary: A retro maze shooting game with a weird and wacky menagerie of enemies.

name: Chase
summary: Chase is a homebrew game for the NES.

name: Chessie Chicken
summary: Help Chessie Chicken cross the Chessboards in this fun and unique learning tool for the popular game of Chess. Improve your Chessboard awareness by avoiding squares that can be attacked by a piece on the board.

name: Chico's Family-Friendly Circus
summary: Welcome to your new job, champ! Take the 2:00-4:00 A.M. shift at Chico's Family-Friendly Circus and hope for the best! A short horror Point & Clicker with multiple endings and dancing clowns.

name: ChronoBreach Ultra
summary: Dash through dangerous levels, warp time, and blast enemies in this time-bending action platformer! Manipulate the crumbling dimension of time to escape a deadly factory. Use your wit, your laser weaponry, and your time-warping abilities to face your demise head-on and triumph!

name: Christmas Mansion
