summary: Elf is back! Complete his quests and restore Winterland. Blast through the hundreds of puzzle levels and have a fantastic Christmas holiday again! Hurry up! Winter has tons of fun in stock for you.

name: Choro Q HG 3
summary: Choro-Q HG 3 (Japanese: チョロQ HG 3) (also known as Gadget Racers in Europe) is a role-playing, racing game for the PS2. It is the sequel to Choro-Q HG 2. It was also slated to be published in North America by Conspiracy Entertainment under the title Road Trip Adventure Avenue but it was cancelled for unknown reasons.

name: Chaos Law
summary: Chaos law is a visual novel about the world and how it changes depending on how we view it. The genre and style constantly changes from meta-comedy to psychological horror. . The game is partly voice acted. There will be fully animated cutscenes and a very diverse soundtrack.

name: Cheery Soccer
summary:
With Cheery Soccer you will get an accessible and exciting football game in retro style.
Three levels of difficulty, three levels of speed, World Cup & European Championship tournaments and 48 teams will give you hours of fun!
In training mode, you can try out moves and tactics to defeat your opponents in a later game.

name: Champion of Venus
summary: Champion of Venus is an erotic visual novel where you play as a virgin NEET dragged into a tournament to elect the next Queen of Lust. She'll have to learn fast if she wants to stand a chance...

name: Chernobyl: Origins
summary: "Chernobyl: Origins" - is a quest game with psychological horror elements. You have to solve a lot of puzzles to find out the terrible secret of the catastrophe at the nuclear power plant. The game will take you to 1986, to the Chernobyl nuclear power plant.

name: Changa
summary: A psychedelic trial-by-fire journey to sever the knot of suffering. Mastery in movement and combat will be needed on this path to inner peace. Bounce, dodge, fly, and fight the illusions of material and immaterial reality in this new kind of bullet hell.

name: Chess Cartoons
summary: A hilarious looking chess game! Play a game of chess with your friend or climb the ELO ladders in single player mode!

name: Check it Out!
summary: Ever dreamt of working a cash register with no pay or real-life customer interaction? Look no further! This simulation game brings a fresh-take to the notoriously dull tasks of customer service, introducing you to a cast of wacky characters and the baggage they carry.

name: Chapel 3-D: The Ascent
summary: Chapel 3-D: The Ascent is a break-neck, violent boomer shooter inspired by classics of the genre. Experience the story behind the events of Cathedral 3-D and make your enemies regret ever crossing your path. Become a beast and let loose.

name: Chester's Revenge
summary: Take control of Chester the pig as you avenge your herd and set out to retrieve the Sacred Carrot. Armed only with his trusty hand cannon, Chester must battle his way through Rad Ralph’s lieutenants in an over-the-top style revenge romp to reclaim the Carrot and stop Rad Ralph from world domination.

name: Cherry Kisses
summary: Cherry Kisses is a visual novel dating sim that takes place over the course of one week running your shop for various monstrous companions.

name: Chants of Sennaar
summary: In this game of adventure and enigmas where ancient languages are both the lock and the key, travel the endless steps of a prodigious labyrinth, multiply unexpected encounters and unveil the mysteries of a fantastic world inspired by the myth of Babel.

name: Chicken Run
summary: A handheld game based on the movie Chicken Run.

name: Championship Wrestling Promoter
summary: Book shows, build feuds, manage your finances, and win the TV ratings war in Championship Wrestling Promoter, a professional wrestling management strategy game.

name: Chrysalis Inc.
summary: Slipping between the past and present, a child puzzles their way through a crumbling toy factory filled with the remnants of its child workers and the grudges they bear.

name: Chico and the Magic Orchards
summary: Solve puzzles by rolling a giant walnut in this retro-handheld-inspired adventure. Explore a variety of levels each with unique mechanics. Help Chico build his winter stash and find his way home!

name: Chicken in the Henhouse
summary: Chicken in the Henhouse is a multiplayer hide-and-seek game in which you kill each other amongst tons of identical looking NPCs. Key to winning is to Walk and Turn like an NPC.

name: Chroma+Elektron
summary: Chroma + Elektron is a 2D twin-stick shooter. Return all chromatic energy back to its proper state. Survive against increasingly difficult waves of constructs and collect their energy to unleash powerful weapons and abilities. Your speed and power will know no equal.

name: Change: A Homeless Survival Experience - Living City Expansion
summary: Create your own story and explore all the new buildings, items, perks and characters in this huge expansion for Change: A Homeless Survival Experience.

name: Chainphoria
summary: Chainphoria was made by the developer of DropZap and DropZap 2. It is a color matching game with elaborate chain reactions.

name: Chicken Pox: Scrambled Eggs!
summary:
It's a scramble to grab the eggs! Pimp your chicken, pick your ride and jump into hours of awesome egg grabbing fun!
Dodge past crazy sheep, weave through herds of cows and time your run perfectly through closing gates to grab the eggs and make it to the finish line - can you get them all?

name: Chain Quest
summary:
Defeat your enemies and break all highscores in Chain Quest! Every fight is a thrilling puzzle of attack and defense. Level up your hero, unlock mighty skills and befriend frightening monsters.
Only if you master all your abilities you will have a chance to be one of the best in Chain Quest!
Can you become a champion of the chains?

name: Chalkboard Pinball
summary: Chalkboard Pinball Creator is not your ordinary pinball game. You can actually draw your own pinball machines on the chalkboard, and then play them! Share your creations with your friends, and there's even a multiplayer mode where you can play simultaneously with up to 4 other players!

name: Chromatic
summary: Chromatic is a 2D Side-Scroller where your goal is to bring color into a monochrome world by using your abilities to traverse new terrain and defeat enemies.

name: changeType()
summary: Swap all spikes with blocks or springs with coins. Rewire the Platformer!

name: Charade Maniacs for Nintendo Switch
summary: Port of the PS Vita game for Nintendo Switch.

name: Charon's Staircase
summary: In this first-person horror mystery game, you set out to bury the horrible past of a tyrannical government. Retrieve and destroy the documents that unravel the secrets that lie beneath Oack Grove. Will you discover the terrifying truth and find your way out?

name: Chin chin
summary: Before you start your drink you must toast with all the guests.

name: Chain Gun
summary: Crank faster to shoot faster

name: Chickenswamp
summary: A puzzle game about a chicken in a swamp.

name: Chaste Tris
summary: Chaste Tris is my first complete video game I have made. It is obviously based on similar other games but easier because there is no gravity. Blocks can be freely moved up, down, left, and right with the arrow keys. They can be rotated with X or Y keys and can also be held for later use with C.

name: Chronicle of Forgotten Times: Pawn of the Gods
summary: The kingdom of Ayderia is going through terrible times, people suffer from hunger and disease, and at this time the feudal lords are at each other’s throats in the struggle for influence and power.

name: Chicken Fall
summary: "Chicken Fall" is a pixel-style horizontal shooting Roguelike game. The game was made by myself alone. In the game, the player controls the protagonist, the chicken boss, and with the help of friends, defeats the bandits in the forest composed of various carnivores.

name: Chaotic Loop
summary: Reach that gold medal in this colorful platform game! Or just do your best score!

name: Cheese Game
summary: Armed with nothing more than a dash and a hunger for survival, fend off the beasts that desire to slice you up and put you on a platter (with bread or crackers as a palette cleanser of course).

name: Chessarama
summary: Chessarama is a collection of chess-inspired puzzle and strategy games that use chess pieces and their established move sets, then reimagines their goals and themes. Solve challenges, unlock collectibles, and compete against each other on the leaderboards. Welcome to Chessarama!

name: Charlotte: Dragon Slayer
summary: A short, well balanced roguelike RPG that revolves around Norse mythology. Fighting dragons, demons. Customizing characters. Collecting treasures. Discovering strange events.

name: Chuck E. Cheese: Skate Universe
summary:
Grab a skateboard and help Chuck E. Cheese shred some sidewalk in Chuck E.’s Skate Universe.

See how far you can skate as Chuck E. attempts to go for the ultimate distance record. The only limit is what you can get away with! Help Chuck E. hop, dodge, and duck obstacles along the way.

Earn points by picking up the Golden Pizzas and other objects.

Plus, you can unlock some sweet gear along the way – insane items like “The Giant Pickle Board” or “The Tongue” – you’ll have to skate them to believe them. See how you rank on the Leaderboards where you can try to beat Chuck E. Cheese super star friends, like Helen Henny and Mr. Munch!

name: Chaos Wizard
summary:
press x to invoke your sigil
pay attention to the rival wizard's spells

name: Chern
summary: Action with RPG elements from beginners of the game industry, Gamega Games studios.

name: Cheaphaven
summary: Cheaphaven features a brief respite full of farming, building and upgrading, a small town of NPCs for all your chatting and shopping needs, and vaguely humorous descriptions for everyday items. Day/night cycle, market values, a pigeon, all the things that are supposed to be in a farming game

name: Chameleon: DYH
summary: A comic/manga inspired interactive game. The game requires the player to trust their instincts to determine best approach. Actions are chosen either through drawn pages or open stages. The gameplay will affect the characters' emotional strength as well as their skills/cards.

name: Choke on my Groundhog, You Bastard Robots
summary: Choke on my Groundhog, You Bastard Robots is twin-stick shoot 'em up. Each time you die, your previous playthrough returns as a copy to assist you. The number of ghost allies increases with each new life making the player stronger with each death.

name: Chance at Life
summary: The events unfold in an old house built in 1876. Two friends returning from a party were caught in a storm. They had to stay in an abandoned house to wait out the bad weather. To survive, the friends had to unravel the secrets of the mansion, go after the one who is trying to help.

name: Chickweed
summary: A strange creature has escaped from the lab... and that creature is you! Fight your way to freedom through hordes of enemies, dangerous traps and treacherous ambushes in this hardcore platformer and uncover the mystery of the running bush!

name: Changkabang
summary: Enter the bustling city of "New Bilsmando", filled with abstract wonders and critters as far as the eye can see. Unfortunately, it's not all wonderful for the "Chang Gang", a compact group of rookie hover-boarding rebels.

name: Chronescher
summary: Chronescher is a challenging turn-based puzzle game in Escher-esque spaces. Use impossible geometries, teleportation and environmental snapshots to navigate your mind and uncover your lost memories.

name: Chess vs. Chat
summary: Allow your chatters to actively participate and engage with your chess stream simply by typing the moves they would like to see in the chat. :) All without the use of 3th party applications. Includes a highscore, match history, twitch emotes, twitch bot, auto moderating and tons of customization.

name: Chess Pills
summary: You have to guess the right move, but you're running out of time. Use the orange pill to get sharp and focus on the right piece. Or use the turquoise pill to chill and slow the time. But beware, the abuse of substances can cause hallucinations, or worse, leave you in a coma or permanently insane.

name: Charmareians
summary: Planet Charmara's situation grows more dire every passing day. Will the Misfits be able to stop the world from falling apart underneath them?

name: China: Mao's Legacy - Homeland or Death
summary: Che Guevara's legacy is as living as Mao's. Intervene in the history of the South American states, change their destiny, show them the right path. But at the same time, do not forget your home, where you will now be able to make many more flexible decisions.

name: Chicken Journey
summary: Play as an adorable chicken in this relaxing platformer. Jump, climb and solve puzzles to find the answer to the ultimate question chicken can ask.

name: Chicken Shoot: Easter Eggs
summary: Chicken Shoot is a gallery shooting game based on free 2003 flash game of the same name. Played from the first-person perspective, the player points the Wii remote and shoots all chickens that fly across the screen.

name: Chousoku Shoujo: Hypersonic Speed Girl - Over the Speedz
summary: A doujin game by disfactNoir based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Chiki's Chase
summary: Help Chiki & friends dash past foes and get back home in this tricky, pocket-sized runner.

name: Chiruno Freezer
summary: Freeze, ride, hold, and throw enemies in this fast-paced, exhilarating side-scrolling action game.

name: Chuhou Joutai 3: Three Nights of Scarlet Abscess
summary: Pandemonium will break loose if you don't unleash your rage.

name: Choose Your Own Nightmare: The Curse of the Mummy
Choose Your Own Nightmare: The Bite of the Vampire
Chrono Trigger
summary: As the definitive version of Chrono Trigger, not only have the controls been updated, the graphics and sound have also been revamped to make your adventure even more fun and enjoyable to play. To complete your journey, also included is the mysterious ‘Dimensional Vortex’ dungeon and the forgotten ‘Lost Sanctum’ dungeon. Meet the challenges presented to you and long-lost secrets may be revealed...

name: Chikarou
summary: Chikaro is a 2D action game featuring pixel art graphics that incorporate light expressions. The player uses the action of out-of-body experience to explore the field by manipulating enemies and gimmicks.

name: Chronicles of Tal'Dun: The Remainder
summary: Interactive story about two magi trying to survive a failed ritual. Learn from their deaths and untangle the mystery before you. Guide their actions as they come to terms with their past mistakes, and find forgiveness and love for each other.

name: Chaosground: The Siege for Freedom
summary: A new type of "siege party FPS" brought to you by high school students who love FPS. Experience the chaotic war for castle control!

name: Chizome Kijo
summary: A savage action game where you become stronger as you slaughter.

name: Chu
summary:
A super-super-super-super easy control action game with just one tap on the screen!
Anyone can play!? However, it's super hard!?? Feel great if it works well!!!
Let's enjoy the simple and stylish game in your free time!!

name: Chuukara Shisen
summary: Chuukara Shisen is the one that allows you to play the rare chance times in Shisen-sho with high probability.

name: Championship Mah Jongg, Oriental Chess & Dominoes
Championship Riding Star
summary:
Championship Riding Star (known as "Riding Star 2" in Europe) is the sequel of Riding Star, a riding simulation released by dtp Entertainment AG for Windows 95/98 and ME. Just like the original game did in 1999, the sequel puts the emphasis on a realistic portrayal of riding challenges and features the three riding classes military, dressage and horse jumping.

The player can create a rider avatar and own several horses. These may be equipped with different types of accessories such as saddles, blankets and decorations. While in the stable, the player can look at each of his horses from nearby and take individual care of them: the quadrupeds can be fed, their fur can be groomed and their hooves can be cleaned.

By completing tournaments in the three classes and five difficulty settings, the player can win prizes, unlock further content and improve the statistics of his horses. Each horse gains additional experience points through training and participation in tournaments. The game features a number of indoor and outdoor levels of varying difficulty, including a virtual representation of the world championship stadium in the German town of Aachen, home to the World Equestrian Games 2006.

The controls are somewhat different from most games featuring horses: The reins of the horse are simulated with the mouse and the keyboard is used to control the speed.

name: Chessmaster
summary: The Best-Selling Computer Chess Game now available on your favorite console! * Choose from 18 opponents with a range of levels and strategies. * Improve your game with a full tutorial mode. * Learn new strategies from over 150 famous recorded games. * 10 chess sets for both classic and just for fun. * Scalable gameplay for chess players of all levels. * 2-player mode via the Game Boy Advance Game Link Cable.

name: Chemistry World
summary: Chemistry World is a game where education and fun are paramount, this game is made with low-end hardware in mind. It is an open-world game with different storylines that contain different chemistry topics.

name: Chunkers
summary: Chunkers is a casual, multiplayer first person shooter set in a voxel world where you and your friends are in a world made of cubes where you can build and fight in various game modes!

name: ChessVR
summary: Board a spaceship and commence a game of wit in the vast universe! Take the lead, attack ferociously but defend cautiously, and give your opponent the final blow. You may also follow the ship to travel, guess which mysterious scene you will end up?

name: Chompies!
summary: Chompies! is a cute couch / online sports game where you fight for the ball to reach the top of the level and score a goal.

name: Charlie and Friends
summary: Welcome to the world of Charlie and Friends! Currently looking for a new caretaker for our beloved characters: Charlie the Cat, Hilda the Hyena, Sammy the Snake, and Rosy the Rabbit.

name: Chonky: From Breakfast to Domination
summary: Cute characters, cuddly enemies and an all together chonky world. Fight your way through adorable monsters, collect all kinds of loot and find new spells to help you on your journey. Face the dangers alone or with a companion that can assist you as an even cuter baby Chonky.

name: Chimeras: Wailing Waters - Collector's Edition
summary: Can you save the Heavenfall campers from a malevolent force in time?

name: Charging Out Dead Zone
summary: This is a zombie car parkour game. The pace of the game is very tight. The goal of the game is to score as many points as possible. .

name: Chamrosh
summary: Chamrosh, The Guardian Of Persia, turned himself to stone with magic for being immortal to protect persian lands forever, and only kaveh the blacksmith's blood can turn him alive again,after thousand years,after the latest generation of kaveh, you are the only one who can turn him alive.

name: Chasing Halo
summary: It is a team tactical competitive shooting game,which has forged vehicles, novel playing methods,exquisite pictures and shocking scenes. In the tripartite battle of virtual history, we will break through the siege,use exquisite strategies to sweep away thousands of troops and be the winner.

name: Chef: A Restaurant Tycoon Game - Pizza & Baked Goods
summary: It's time to raise the temperature and fly to a new dimension of baking! With Chef: Pizza & Baked Goods, it is finally possible to put pineapple on pizza!

name: Christmas Town: Passion House
summary: "Christmas Town: Passion House" is a first-person shooter game.

name: Cheesey Sponge
summary: Do the right thing!

name: Chatbotaged
summary:
Chatbotaged is a twitch interactive Chase horror game built in Unreal, where the player assumes the role of an unnamed clone, developed solely for the purpose of testing and demonstrating the effectiveness of Genespliced weapons developed by a company called Pyontech Industries.

The clone's task is to find the correct keycard in a contained space, while avoiding and potentially escaping the Weapons.

To raise the stakes, there's a timer, and Twitch Chat has the ability to "bend the rules," in ways that modify the game's behavior.

Will the player escape? Will the clock run out? Will Chat have mercy? There's only one way to find out!

name: Cheese Runner
summary: Trade illicit cheese in a dystopian cyberpunk city filled with police killbots trying to hunt you down in this ASCII Art text-based early 80s retro trading game. Like a fine blue cheese, this isn't for everyone.

name: Chess Dungeons
summary: Help the white pieces escape by solving chess puzzles ranging from beginner-level to more experienced challenges in this dungeon-themed sokoban-style game.

name: Character Sheets, Please
summary:
A silly parody of "Papers, Please", where you're playing as a Game Master and have to review your players' character sheets. Confront the rulebook (with increasing number of rules) with information on the sheet and try to spot any mistkaes... mistakes... oops.

How to play: Check your rulebook (on the left) with character sheet (on the right) and spot any inconsistencies. Click on an incorrect element and reject the character sheet or approve it if everything seems to be in order.

name: Christmas Break
summary: Christmas Break is an arcade game that lets the user break Xmas bricks with a unique Christmas paddle and ball.

name: Chokkan Crash Bandicoot
summary: Chokkan♪ Crash Bandicoot (Crash Bandicoot Intuition♪ in English) is a game released for the DoCoMo SH904 mobile phone series in 2007, only in Japan. It is a sequel to Crash Boom Bang! that uses motion-sensing gameplay. It has more minigames than Crash Boom Bang! and uses the same graphics as it.

name: Chiaroscuro: O Jogo
summary: Chiaroscuro: O Jogo is a mobile game that features three minigames based on songs featured on the album with the same name by the singer Pitty.

name: Champs TD
summary: Champs TD is a Tower Defense Game with endless replayability. Slay thousands of Minions in randomized Waves. Summon powerful Champions with 28+ unique Abilities. Earn Experience, Level Up and choose from 100+ Talents to improve your Champs just the way you want.

name: ChibiTama
summary: Deploy your players and supporters, and band together to survive the stages! As you do so, your characters will grow! Little cute characters are waiting for you! Stay tuned for more features and characters to be added soon!

name: Chess, but...
summary: Play against a low level engine, simulating a 100 rated player, while completing challenges. Multiple difficulty modes make the game suitable for chess beginners and experts.

name: Chess Survivors
summary: Chess Survivors is a grid based, quick-turn, roguelike where you outmaneuver and destroy an ever growing horde of chess enemies. Combine abilities and upgrades to create game-breaking builds. Unlock cosmetics, characters, and powerful relics. Think fast, die, learn, repeat.

name: C.H.A.O.S.
summary: The game is an VR railshooter based on the classic arcade railshooter with some VR features.

name: Champion Battlegrounds
summary: Champion Battlegrounds is a multiplayer Battle Royale game with unique low-poly anime graphics and a strategic combat system that allows you to play how you like. Choose one of an always growing set of champions and enter the battleground to be the last champion standing!

name: Chrono Weaver
summary: Looking to test your brain and body in VR? In Chrono Weaver, think and throw your way through time bending kinetic puzzles. As you explore an unearthly sci-fi world, work with copies of yourself as you travel through time to find solutions to seemingly impossible tests.

name: Chimp Chase
summary:
"The year is 20XX. Crypto is declining along with our society..."

Run around a collapsing city and steal JPEGs of chimps from dorks by swinging a big net at them.

name: Chromahertz
summary: Chromahertz is a boss rush bullet hell game about drawing with your body. Lead yourself around through hazards and enemies leaving rainbows of destruction in your wake. Be careful where you stop!

name: Chased Around the World
summary: Travel the world as a thief collecting money bags or play as the police gathering clues to locate the thief.

name: Chopmania
summary: Chopmania is a relaxing RPG, where you drive a harvester to cut your way through overgrown forests. Reclaim humanity's land, after Earth fought back deforestation and engulfed it in plants! Uncover the mysteries and save humanity!

name: Chesslands
summary: Chesslands is a turn based tactics game where you train chess pieces with 4 unique abilities each and deploy them into battleground to win your opponent.

name: Chosen Dice
summary: A Tile-Matching Puzzle Dice Game, only on Playdate.

name: Chop Chop Soccer
summary:
Chop Chop fast action soccer now comes to Brazil! Better looking than ever.
Top 10 downloaded game in over 10 countries!

name: Chronotron
summary: A puzzle-platformer about a robot that goes back in time to cooperate with itself.

name: Chill Town
summary: A sequel of Chill Corner - a combination of relaxing simulation and idle game. Listening to beautiful music while decorating the room, fishing, cooking or even keeping it in background while doing your real life activities.

name: Cheesequest
summary: A dark card game where you try to eat the cheese.

name: Chicken Rescue
summary:
The ultimate cute, family friendly tilt-based arcade game. Help Mama Chicken find her lost chicks! They're missing and it's up to you to bring them back to the coop.
Guide Mama Chicken through more than 40 exciting and colorful levels using your choice of gyroscope, accelerometer or virtual joystick. Avoid trees and barrels, hungry pigs, and treacherous ledges. Earn coins and stars for completing levels, then use your coins to unlock in-game boosts and fun skins such as Ninja Chicken, Robot Chicken, and Chicken Zombie!
Supports saving to iCloud so you can save your game on one iOS device and pick it back up on another.

name: Christmas Shooter
summary: it's a 2d game focused on Christmas where it's snowing and you have to shoot candy at people, the game should be fun and have nice music. Your end is a goal where you have to get all the way to the end and you have two endings which are secret and normal

name: Chinatris
summary: Chinatris is a Tetris-like game about Chinese characters where you combine different Chinese character components to create new ones. To clear each stage, you must create the target characters. While playing you will meet many new and surprising characters that will give you a different look of Chinese culture.

name: Chronicles of Refugia
summary: In the aftermath of catastrophic global warming, humans live in conflict with their new, not-so-human neighbors... and three "Alices" must fight against humanity to ensure the survival of their race.

name: Charge Knight: A Duck's Tale
summary: In this casual mechanics game, use continuous movement to overcome challenges. The unstoppable knight Dundee must be strategically driven on his journey, defeating enemies, solving puzzles and mechanics while using the scenery to his advantage.

name: Chug the Tiny Tugboat
summary: Use reading skills to help Chug the Tugboat keep the bathtub shipshape!

name: Christmas Break 2 Head to Head
summary: Christmas Break 2 Head to Head is a retro arcade game that lets 1 and 2 players play head to head in a competitive arcade environment. Unique animated Christmas themed items tumble down toward the users paddle along with Mini-Bosses and Powerups. Collect powerups as you progress through the levels and defeat your opponent. Thirty Levels to compete in and battle mini bosses on your way to victory in single player and two player modes.

name: Chameleon
summary:
A colorful platform game in which the player controls a long-tongued chameleon that must make around a series of single-screen, platform-strewn levels; stealing chicken eggs from their nests and being careful to avoid contact with angry chickens.

As well as walking along the platforms and poles, the chameleon can use its tongue to pull itself up to higher platforms; and to escape from any nearby chickens. Each level also has a number of bombs placed at various points; the chameleon can hit these with its tongue to send them crashing towards nearby chickens. The player must keep an eye out for projectiles thrown by the chickens, such as flashing eggs.

If the nesting eggs are left for too long, they will hatch into a baby chick. The player can eat the chick for bonus points, but if the chick is left alone for too long, it will grow into an adult chicken and start attacking the player.

A level is over once all of the eggs have been collected and all of the chickens killed.

name: Chop Shop Simulator
summary: Plan unique car thefts, hide them and sell the legalized parts on the market. The simulator will allow the player to experience life in an illegal environment full of gangs and dirty business. Earn a fortune by running your own Chop Shop.

name: Chesstris Mini
summary: A chaotic Chess-unlike auto-battler

name: Chrono Survival
summary: On the eve of the end of the world, become the last hope for the world by standing alone against thousands of monsters. Chrono Survival is a hyper arcade rogue-lite game that combines simple gameplay and challenge.

name: ChainSki
summary: Chain Ski is a fast paced open world snowboarding game. Race against the clock or take on the challenging obstacle courses. Earn XP and upgrade your gear to take things to the next level.

name: Charming Blood
summary: a visual novel that has many choices that affect not only relationships with girls, but also the fate of the hero. What will be the fate of the young vampire? Will he be able to defend his right to exist, or will he go all out, succumbing to temptation?

name: Chicken Feet
summary: Chicken Feet is a first person survival-stealth horror game about a giant, angry chicken. Descend into the depths of GOOBER laboratories and uncover the horrors that lie beneath the lab's shiny façade.

name: Chess Dungeons: Shubousha
summary: Help the white pieces escape by solving chess puzzles ranging from beginner-level to more experienced challenges in this Japan-themed sokoban-style game.

name: Chris Isn't Alone
summary: Can you convince a demon from another realm to spare your life? Chris Isn't Alone is a visual novel horror/comedy game that gives players freedom to choose their own path towards their fate. This is a student project!

name: Chris' Story
summary: Welcome to Chris' Story~ It's a 2D platform action role-playing game. You're gonna be playing as a young mercenary, Chris. To tell an adventurous story about freedom and growth.

name: Chico Bento: Um Dia na Roça
summary: Children's game about the Brazilian character Chico Bento.

name: Chess Corp
summary: ChessCorp - an indie puzzle game that takes you to a pixel art world to solve the mystery of your existence. Tackle AI-generated chess puzzles, develop your own thinking machine, and win the Grand Tournament. This is the only way.

name: Chess: The Lost Pieces
summary: A chess game with 30+ pieces and deck building,

name: Chaos Crown
summary: An RPG Styled Roguelite set in fantasy procedural paths. Craft artifacts, slay legendary monsters and abuse synergies to fulfill the secret goal of your champion. Which one will you choose? We need your feedback before the official launch!

name: Chickenoidz Super Party
summary: Chickenoidz Super Party - multiplayer top-down arena shooter for up to 4 players. You can play local or altogether online via Remote Play. Steal the show using an array of incredible weapons, special equipment and even mutations. Smash your opponents to smithereens, rip everything around you.

name: Chorizo
summary: Fight side by side and head to head with claw, fang, and a whole lot of bad attitude in Chorizo, a multiplayer wrestling fighter. Play in 2-4 player PvP; or take the fight online with seamless rollback netcode. Hop into the ring and fight to be La Correa's top street dog.

name: Chatseat
summary: Chatseat has singleplayer controls as well as chat command controls.Chatseat currently has 16 main levels as well as a level editor with the option to play custom levels.

name: Challenge of the Tentacle
summary:
Challenge of the Tentacle is a free point and click escape room adventure fangame inspired by Maniac Mansion, Day of the Tentacle and Maniac Mansion Mania.

On a beautiful morning with chirping birds and sunshine, it seems a new beautiful day begins for the whole world. But no one knows that a catastrophe could happen that day. An evil, tyrannical, purple tentacle wants to take over the world. On this seemingly wonderful morning, our well-known protagonist, Bernard, renowned physicist and chemist, wakes up muddled. He still doesn't know that on this day he has to prove that he is a genius and has not, like so many others, studied in vain. But he's starting to remember the Purple Tentacle's visit and their argument about world domination, which ended with a cup of tea, his heavy, drooping eyelids and Purple Tentacle's malicious grin.

He is locked in his bedroom with many puzzles provided by Purple Tentacle to challenge and prevent him.

Help Bernard to solve these challenging puzzles, because with each solved puzzle he gets a little closer to the key that opens the door and thus also to the means created in his laboratory with which he can save the world from conquest. Solve logical, amusing and motivating puzzles that challenge not only Bernard, but YOU as well.

Inspired by Maniac Mansion, Day of the Tentacle and Maniac Mansion Mania.
Humorous game that combines point and click adventures with escape room tasks.
With many allusions to all adventures by LucasArts.
Various types of puzzles, from classic inventory usage to brain teasers.
You will find out the result of your performance at the end of the game: very good, good, satisfactory or bad.
And the best at the end: it costs nothing! It helps curb inflation!

name: Chibi Maruko-chan no Okashi de Piihyarara
Chronique des Silencieux
summary: Set in 1970s southern France, you play a rookie private eye tasked to dig out the secrets of a stubborn old man. Think on your feet while you follow your leads : ask questions to witnesses, detect their lies, hypothesize why and finally confront the silent ones running from their past.

name: ChocuPixel
summary: ChocuPixel is a two dimensional platformer starring the beloved character chocu. In this adventure we must find chocus friend Juan who is lost in the basement, but we will have to fight many enemies to get to him.

name: Charley's Day
summary: Every night, Charley looks up at the stars in the sky and finally decides to go on an adventure on a special day!

name: Chrono Trigger+
summary:
This hack adds a ton of cut content back into the game, allows access to previously unexplorable areas, fixes some bugs and offers some options to remove the linearity from the game. Full list of changes in the readme.

In addition 1999 is fully explorable and offers tons of stuff to do. As well as more Easter eggs and quality of life improvements.

More stuff carries over like names money, fair prizes and cats.

name: Charge!
summary: Charge! Destroy the enemy! can you reach the other side of the level?

name: Chell's Way to Home
summary: What you would do, if everything seems to be over and you are still alive? We are pretty sure you'd like to come home. The story takes place in Half-Life universe, after being a lab rat and death of mental ai system, you should make your way in the wake of last alive members of "Aperture Transport Systems", subdivision of "Aperture Science". They're barricaded in Institute Campus, which is located on volcanic island. However, after a while the portal storm has begun, which brought Combines, Headcrabs and Antlions...

name: Chess Classic Board Game
summary:
Challenge your friend to a chess duel in this popular board game! Awaken your skills as a strategist, because only in this way you can outwit your opponent and checkmate.

If there are no friends nearby, then play against a virtual opponent by choosing one of three difficulties. Are you a chess master or a beginner? Regardless of this, you will find a difficulty level suitable for your chess skills!

name: Charlie's Delivery
summary: The game includes love, peace, environment, science, dreams, friendship, ambition, passion and NO SAVE. TRY IT NOW!

name: ChengDu Mahjong
summary:
This game is based on the rules of XueZhan mahjong of Chengdu, China, which been proposed by Chengdu local developer.
All the special rules of Xuezhang mahjong are supported, such as XueZhan (players who still not win can continue play the game until only left one player or haven't tiles), added glory to a gong, robbing a gong, must lack suit, self drawn award, etc.

name: Chacara
summary: Hitting the highway immediately after finishing a crazy party was definitely not a good idea... Now you are stranded on the road, luckily, there is a cozy country house nearby, what could go wrong?

name: ChamberLocked
summary: After you were stunned you found yourself in an abandoned house. You got out of bed and tried to leave the room only to find that the door was locked. However, you heard the door outside the room open...

name: ChaseTag
summary: Come participate at ChaseTag ! A tag competition where athletes are candy ! Face your friends in intense Player-versus-Player matches, that will make you sweat !

name: Chevalier Historie: Append
summary: Follow Jeanne, the first and only female knight in the Kingdom of Berde's lengthy history. She sets out to restore the Royal Ring's power and save the imprisoned Princess Lily. The new Append adds another adventure for Jeanne and her friends, along with many new scenes and events!

name: Chicken Hero in Wulin
summary: All Creatures will be uphold justice and "chivalrous".In the familiar world of martial arts,I regenerate a chicken.As a chicken, can you change your life against the weather and create miracles!Become an unprecedented and fantastic Great Xia! Everything is about to start!

name: Child of Aether
summary: A 3rd person, quest based, survival horror journey, with a heavy lean on narrative, mystery, exploration and detective work. Uncover the circumstances behind the grim world you awaken in, and in the process learn the truth by piecing together the many character stories clues and puzzles

name: Choice of the Viking
summary: Sail forth to a land of gods and giants! Wield your sword, words, and magic to take your place among Iceland’s chieftains and forge your legacy of honor.

name: Cheech and Chong Bud Farm
summary: Cheech and Chong Bud Farm is a free-to-download and play hemp and marijuana lifestyle app, but some game items can be purchased for real money. A network connection is not required, but you will have limited access to in-game functions.

name: ChatFight!
summary: ChatFight! is a battle royale for stream viewers. Play the game on stream and let your viewers customize their characters, equip ridiculous outfits, and fight to the death!

name: Cheese Dreams
summary: The moon has been kidnapped by space mice! Bounce him off their ship.

name: Chivalry 2: King's Edition
summary:
Chivalry 2 King's Edition includes exclusive in-game content. Chivalry 2 is a multiplayer first person slasher inspired by epic medieval movie battles.
Chivalry 2 King's Edition contains:
1. Chivalry 2 Special Edition
2. Rebel King's Armor and War Helmet
- Don the legendary armor worn by General Malric at the Battle of Stoneshill.
3. Feydrid's Aegis Armor and War Crown
- Fight for glory and honor with the Steward King Feydrid's royal set.
4. Duke's Talon and Kralle of Bridgetown Shields
- Protect yourself with the Duke's Talon (Mason Shield) and Kralle of Bridgetown (Agathian Shield).
5. Surrender Flag Novelty Item
- Live to fight another day with this novelty item, added to your spawn-in inventory.
6. 1000 Crowns + 5000 Gold
- Receive 1000 Crowns (premium currency) - and 5000 Gold (earnable currency), used to unlock new armor, weapon appearances and more!

name: Chotto Magic Taizen: Suki Kirai Hakkenki
Chip Off the Ol' Stumbling Block
summary: A physics-based runner where you weave between obstacles, set off explosives, and use your environment to reach the end. Travel through five unique environments, conquer nine different obstacle types, and make it to the other side in one piece!

name: ChaosWorld
summary: A magically controlled medieval large map and a multiplayer survival open world game with randomly generated caves on the large map by the program. Use combat, building, farming, automating to create your own medieval village or town, and defeat magic with magic.

name: Chiky Poky
summary: Chiky Poky is an old-school 2D puzzle inspired by games like The Key of Solomon and Caliper. Help Chiky to return the brother kidnapped by the portal from the mysterious forest.

name: Chikai no Kiss wa Totsuzen ni
Choujikuu Yousai Macross: Countdown
summary: 1999. In the darkness of night an unidentified flying object is discovered. The scientists are flabbergasted. But calculations show that it will collide with Earth in the early morning... It does. News that the object is a weapons-crammed spacecraft strikes everyone with great dismay. Is there War in space? 2.009. Ten years later. Macross -the space cruiser- has been repaired when new UFO's appear in the skies. Their horrifying message: surrender Macross and her crew or total destruction shall be yours.. Enemy commando's even manage to abduct co-pilot Lon. It's up to Prynce, Captain of Macross and Super-Transformer, to avert a disaster. And rescue his beloved Lon from a fate worse than death...

name: Champion Strike: Hero Clash
summary: Champion Strike: Hero Clash is a 1v1 real-time PvP strategy simulation game with a controllable Champion aspect. Strategize your battle with the simple Champion control until the battle is over! The unpredictable battle that's going to take place through the Arena with controllable Champions will make players around the world very excited!

name: Chased
summary: Chased is a single-player horror game. You will have to try to find the exit and proceed to the next upcoming levels. But remember you are not alone. On every single level, there are going to be different entities that will not let you escape by trying to trap and catch you.

name: Chewing Gum Tests
summary: Chewing Gum Tests - A side-view physics-based puzzle platformer where you have to control chewing gum by pointing and throwing it with your mouse.

name: Christopher Columbus
summary: Christopher Columbus is a cancelled shoot 'em up game for the Super Famicom that was in development in 1992 to 1993. The game was based on the famous Italian explorer Christopher Columbus.

name: Chase the Sun
summary: It's the end of the world and everyone's handling it in their own way. A game about running, family, and death.

name: Chou Hakai Keikaku kara no Dasshutsu
Chemical Existence
summary: Chemical Existence puts you in the role of Reece Max whom simply is in the wrong place at the wrong time. He gets mixed up with fighting gangs, evil corporations and mutated creatures…

name: Cho-ricchi! Tamagotchi no Puchi Puchi Omisecchi de Violin Lesson
Chibi Devi! 2: Mahou no Yume Ehon
Chiyokagi
summary: Chiyokagi is heavily based on Solomon's Key, a game developed by Tecmo in 1986. The goal is the same: grab the key and reach the goal while avoiding obstacles.

name: Chickip Dancers: Nori-nori Dance de Kokoro mo Odoru
Choco-ken no Chokotto Fushigi na Monogatari: Chocolate Hime to Mahou no Recipe
summary: Choko Inu no Chokotto Fushigi na Monogatari: Chocolate Hime to Mahou no Recipe is a game for the Nintendo 3DS by Nippon Columbia.

name: Chain Chronicle V
summary: Chain Chronicle V is a PlayStation Vita port of Chain Chronicles, a card tower defense role-playing game on smartphones . The digital download version was free-to-play.

name: Chernobylite: Season 1 - Blue Flames
summary: Expand your weapon arsenal with a craftable, highly-customizable tactical crossbow and master the stealth exploration of the Chernobyl Exclusion Zone. Discover more memories of Tatyana and Igor with photos hidden in the area - each picture will display a short animation and play voices revealing a piece of the past.

name: Chernobylite: Season 2 - Red Trees
summary: Dive into the free Red Trees update, presenting 6 new story missions with Tatyana as a narrator and more. Take on the VR Games roguelike-inspired challenge and face enemies in the fractal world with your equipment and skills assigned randomly. In addition, you can now improve your base with a post-soviet gaming station (cosmetic item).

name: Chernobylite: Season 3 - Green Walls
summary: From special game mode for players who love extreme challenges to the much-anticipated part of the map with two never completed cooling towers on the premises of the infamous power plant and a brand-new weapon.

name: Chernobylite: Season 4 - Black Smoke
summary: New events: 'Farewell, My Doll' a new game mode, 'Brothers in Arms' and more!

name: Chaos in Aisle Seven
summary: Chaos in Aisle Seven is a twin-stick top-down shooter where you play as George, a customer who shops for a laptop in a store where salespeople are annoying, greedy and only want to sell useless products and services. Fight back by shouting your displeasure in this satire about shopping!

name: Chasing the Unseen
summary: Climb massive creatures, explore otherworldly landscapes and find what you have been seeking.

name: Chaqs
summary: Chaqs is an instructive CTF (Capture The Flag) game that performs the basic functions of an operating system. While it meets your expectations from an operating system to a certain extent with the applications it contains, Chaqs progresses in the direction of more challenges in terms of gameplay.

name: Chilljong
summary: Chilljong is an endless adventure for lovers of puzzles and unhurried gameplay without limits! An unusual hybrid of genres in the style of mahjong connect will delight fans of the genre.

name: Chimeral Fantasy
summary: Explore a fantasy world, assemble a party of quirky characters you meet along the way, and fight monsters in turn based tactical combat! Set between the "real" world and the fantastical dreams of a young girl, you must help save the king in her dreamland- and maybe help to save her ill father, too.

name: Chinese Characters
summary: "Chinese characters" is an elimination and puzzle game, put the same three words into the bottom slot to eliminate, eliminate all the words to pass the level, the game should always pay attention to the lower level of the text.

name: Chompy Chomp Chomp Party
summary: Invite your friends and family to join you for a Chompy Chomp Chomp Party. A chaotic and fun local multiplayer game for up to 8 players that will bring joy and laughter to the room.

name: Chroma Circuit
summary: The far-future painter-racer! A single/multiplayer party racing game that has you painting boosting pads on the racetrack as you color the world of Synthara, 1,000 years into a world that isn't an apocalypse for once.

name: Chyss
summary: Chyss is a turnbased, tactical 1vs1 game inspired from chess. You can move, attack, and consume your mana to summon new units, cast spells and use items when it's your turn. Your characters both have a move type and range and an attack type and range. Overcome your opponent's team!

name: Checkers Lounge 3D
summary: Checkers Lounge 3D brings you one of the most famous board games to your device. Tip and slide on the screen to rotate the view in all three dimensional angles. Use two fingers to zoom in and out. Simply drag & drop the game pieces to the desired location. Play locally against friends, against the computer or against people all over the Internet. Compete with the world and improve your world ranking position. Do you make it into the top ten?

name: Chippy's Escape from Seaberry Keep
summary: Bust out of the terrarium, uncover the witch's secrets, make new friends, decorate a mansion, and explore on a great adventure!

name: Christmas Wonderland 5
summary: Another Sensational Christmas Wonderland game for Everyone to Enjoy Christmas wouldn’t be Christmas without a new Christmas Wonderland! Christmas Wonderland 5 is crammed full of fabulous HOG scenes, lots of truly superb Mini Games and Puzzles for players of ALL ages and

name: Cherry Lady
summary: Cherry Lady is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Chiki-chiki Machine Mou Race 2: In Space
summary: When Milk (Penelope Pitstop) is kidnapped, players have to explore the cosmos to rescue her. This game is a mixture of a graphic adventure and a racing game. In the adventure segments, players travel to different planets where they talk with people and solve puzzles using a point-and-click interface. Periodically, players will need to race to progress; these scenes feature a behind-the-car perspective as players try to get first place in high-speed chases.

name: Charged: RC Racing
summary: Charged: RC Racing is all about speed and making use of random items. Drive RC Cars in different locations and use items to defeat your opponents.

name: Chronicles of Cyberpunk: Lost dream
summary: Chronicles of Cyberpunk: Lost dream - exciting finale of the story about the search for Big Brother and the Supercomputer

name: Chicken & Egg
summary:
The Easter bunny has gone wacky and trapped all the cute little chickens in a desperate attempt to ruin Easter.
Don't let him succeed! Save the trapped chickens by solving puzzles involving ramps, spikes, buttons and other fun, mind-bending obstacles.

name: Chao Adventure
summary: Chao Adventure is a mini-game that can be played on the VMU in Sonic Adventure for the Dreamcast. This game is designed to train the player's Chao to become faster and stronger, and it appears when the player transfers a Chao from the Chao Garden in Sonic Adventure to the VMU using the Transporter Machine.
platforms: Visual Memory Unit / Visual Memory System

name: Chao Adventure 2
summary: Chao Adventure is a mini-game that can be played on the VMU in Sonic Adventure 2 for the Dreamcast. This game is designed to train the player's Chao to become faster and stronger, and it appears when the player transfers a Chao from the Chao Garden in Sonic Adventure 2 to the VMU using the Chao Transporter.
platforms: Visual Memory Unit / Visual Memory System

name: Chicken Smoothie
summary: Collect new pets every month, watch them grow, dress them up and trade them with friends! Create artwork using the free online Oekaki app, and join clubs, roleplays, and discussions in the Forum!

name: Checkers Online
summary:
Play Checkers online for free!
Choose your level and favourite rules: American Checkers or International Draughts

name: Chop Goblins
summary: Pursue the malevolent Chop Goblins through time, and foil them with devastating weapons, in this bite-sized FPS from the creator of Dusk, Iron Lung, and Squirrel Stapler

name: Chrono's Arena: Characters Pack
summary: Bored with the same four characters? Don't want to play hours to acquire all the characters? This pack is for you. This Character Pack includes 10 characters that will bring you 80 more skills to enter the Arena!

name: Children's Jigsaw Puzzles: Beautifully Illustrated - Expansion Pack
summary: This puzzle game helps your kids develop matching and fine motor skills. Your children will just love these wonderfully hand-drawn pictures and will improve their spatial skills while having fun!

name: Christmas Blaster
summary: Christmas Blaster: Christmas Blaster is an Arcade-type action video game. Santa needs to save Christmas and face creatures with a lot of explosion in this action-packed game.

name: Chess Royale
summary: A non-standard chess game in which kings have magical powers. The player needs to cut down the enemy king, building a victorious tactics by combining the queue of moves and magical abilities.

name: Chain Detonation
summary: Outline "Chain Detonation" is his TopDown 2D action game in which he has to defeat many enemies to advance. The purpose is to operate the player and defeat many monsters and bosses. There are a wide variety of monsters in each stage, and the game will be cleared by defeating the boss of all stages.

name: Christmas Fun
summary: Christmas Fun is a retro rhythm game that lets the user complete a level with the controller buttons. Try to complete the level with your best time. Trophies are collected as you complete the rhythm goals. Single player fun and arcade style entertainment.

name: Christmas Wonderland 7
summary: Santa’s Awesome Adventure in Wonderland Christmas Wonderland is crammed full of fabulous Presents and Hidden Surprises with lots of Gorgeous Graphics and Puzzles for ALL the Family to enjoy. Find Golden Trees, get Game Rewards and Achievements along the way.

name: China: Mao's legacy - Bombard the Headquarters
summary: Subdue the party members and the people. Change the destiny of China and the nation. Conquer space and your neighbours.

name: Chess Challenger
summary: Chess game for the ColecoVision. Originally partially developed in 1983 by Fidelity Electronics, the game was advertised before becoming vapourware. Based on advertising material and unreleased unfinished prototype cartridges of the game, the game was finished and released by CollectorVision in 2012.

name: Christmas Wonderland 13: Collector's Edition
summary:
Santa’s Magical Christmas Wonderland Adventure for All the Family to Enjoy! Enjoy magnificent Holiday Festivities in Springfield. Help Santa at the North Pole.

The Collector’s Edition includes:
- Check out spectacular bonus locations for more holiday fun!
- Enjoy exclusive wallpapers and seasonal soundtrack
- Explore the mega collection of bonus puzzles
- Earn special Extreme Mode rewards

name: Cheers!
summary: Cheers is a cooperative puzzle party-game for two players who will have to coordinate and work together to combine pairs of elements and create new ones!

name: Christmas Run 2
summary: Christmas Run 2 is a Runner style arcade game where the user leaps and dashes through obstacles to get to the finish line. Play and survive through 12 levels as you complete your festive winter run.

name: Chuzzle: Christmas Edition
summary:
Nuzzle up to some Chuzzly puzzle fun this holiday! The Chuzzles are all dressed up for Christmas and ready for some Yuletide fun! Match Chuzzles to clear them from the board and keep the fun going through all 4 chuzzly puzzly holiday games. The full version of Chuzzle Christmas Edition features:

4 ways to play
Cool trophies and power-ups
2 difficulty settings
Have a Chuzzly puzzly Christmas and a fuzzy new year! Play today!

name: Christmas
summary:
Christmas is under threat! Santa has got caught in a blizzard, he has lost all the presents and cannot find his way home. Only you can save Christmas.

To help Santa find his house, you need to light the lights on the biggest Christmas tree in the forest. However, before you do that you’ll have to get to where Santa lives in the North Pole and get everything back in order. Find out why the magic elves refuse to work and the presents are not getting to the children.

name: Chernobyl
summary: If only we could change the past, or witness the events that changed the world... Is it possible to change fate? Travel back in time to see if you can change the situation from which, it seemed - there was no way out. What happened on the night of the accident? What happened afterwards? Find answers to questions that have remained unanswered until now. The ghost town of Chernobyl can tell you its story... A story which cost lives. A disaster that still affects us today...

name: Choplifter III
summary: Despite sharing a similar title with the SNES game, Choplifter III is a remade version of Choplifter II: Rescue Survive and is based on the Game Gear remake of the same game, titled Choplifter III: Rescue Survive.

name: Choplifter III: Rescue Survive
summary:
Choplifter III is a shoot 'em up video game released for the Sega Game Gear.

Despite sharing the same title as the SNES game, Game Gear version of Choplifter III: Rescue Survive is a remake of Choplifter II: Rescue Survive.

name: Cherry Tale
summary: Cherry Tale is an erotic visual novel.

name: Charlie's Angels
summary: Join Natalie, Dylan, and Alex for an intense adventure based on the Charlie's Angels movies. You'll need various disguises, clever tactics, and acrobatic martial arts moves to ensure a successful mission. Master the different styles of all three Angels as you battle 32 different types of enemies across the globe. You can switch between characters at anytime during the game. Charlie's Angel's movie stars--Cameron Diaz, Lucy Liu, Drew Barrymore, and Bernie Mac--supply the voices.

name: Chef Life: A Restaurant Simulator - Al Forno Edition
summary:
Make delicious wood-fired pizzas and give your restaurant an Italian ambiance with the AL FORNO pack. Get 8 pizza recipes and a wide range of customization items to decorate your restaurant.

The Al Forno Editionof Chef Life: A Restaurant Simulator contains the base game and the following content:
- A new type of dish to add to your restaurant menu: pizza
- A new cooking station to make delicious pizzas: wood-fire oven
- 8 pizza recipes (with 3 upgrade levels each): Neapolitan, vegetarian, seafood, cheese, spicy, BBQ, Hawaiian, mountain

name: Chiller
summary:
A brief, strangely familiar tale of a man who got into trouble at his job and now spends his time all alone, dreaming of better days.

A contribution to DDJ4.

name: Change
summary: A Yume Nikki fangame. Explore your dreams and decide what kind of person you want to become.

name: Chicken Killer
summary: "Chicken Killer" is a horror/comedy game based on the trashy horror movies of the 80's. Inspired by the low-budget chinese horror films.

name: Chimera Online
summary:
Chimera Online is an MMORPG with a high focus on the ever lasting war between the 2 Nations "Rain" and "Millena".
Rain is living in the mountains and uses magical power for combat, while Millena is living in the forests and uses a mainly physical combat style by using Swords and Bows.

The game is designed for an easy entrance, after just a few hours of Gameplay you can already participate in fights with your nation against the other nation.
While there are many dungeons and raids that can be done with the help of other player in your nation, you can also progress alone and enjoy 1v1 combat or solo farming.

If you are unsure which nation or class to pick, you also test out any class you want to at any point in time. All you have to do is login a free test account. These Test-Accounts have limited access ingame and are designed for pvp tests and special war events.

The battle system is designed so that fights last for a moderate time. Infinite chain of control effects, aswell as 1hit KOs are banished from Chimera Online.

The game is 100% free to play. Everything you want to access ingame you can access without the need of any payment. The Cash Shop mainly offers Special Skins and quality of life items that have no direct impact in the gameplay.

name: Chou Jinsei Enjoi! Tamagotchi Plus
summary: The Chou Jinsei Enjoi Tamagotchi Plus also known as the Entama for short, is a Tamagotchi virtual pet that debuted in Japan on November 23, 2005. It was the first Tamagotchi release to include Internet functions, and introduced a new shell design that features an antenna with a ball at the tip.

name: Chou Jinsei Enjoi! Tamagotchi Plus Cyoi Change
summary: The Chou Jinsei Enjoi Tamagotchi Plus Cyoi Change is a version of the Entama following complaints that the games were too difficult for new players. It is visually distinguished from the original by having "plus"-shaped beads instead of round beads.

name: Chop Chop Guys
summary: Join the madness in Chop Chop Guys, a wild competition of dim-witted characters racing through a world of zany traps. Lose your head? No problem! You don't need it to reach the finish line!

name: Choppertchi
summary: The Choppertchi is a licensed Tamagotchi Nano based on the character Tony Tony Chopper from the anime and manga series One Piece by Eiichiro Oda.

name: Chicane: Jenson Button Street Racing
summary: Cancelled racing game for Gizmondo.

name: Chuggington: Babysitter Brewster
summary: Based on the popular TV show, join Chuggington' s Brewster as he is left in charge of Hoot and Toot, two mischievous twins who are double the trouble. Brewster tries to teach them how to use the turntable, but they run and hide while his back is turned. Now Brewster has to find them and your child can help as they learn reading comprehension, rhyming and more.

name: Checker
summary: A peg solitaire game released in some Mega Drive plug & plays. It was originally released in Brazil by Tec Toy under the name of Fica 1.

name: Chess is Stupid!
summary: Shoot the Juicers.

name: Chromosome Evil: New Weapon & Weapons Customization
Christmas Cats
summary: King Rat has kidnapped Santa Clause in this Christmas themed, 4 player split screen game. Play as one of the Christmas Cats, and ride on magic sleds that shoot presents to deliver to houses that need it.

name: Chubby Cat 2
summary: A fat cat who loves to eat all day is back now in this game even better than the first! Cut the wool yarn precisely to feed this lazy cat. This game is suitable for all age groups. You will have a lot of fun!

name: Checkers Quest Bundle
summary: Capture them all!

name: Christmas Land: Opposite Worlds
summary: What if you can play in two opposite worlds with two different characters,where you can choose whether to play with a little elf girl in a christmas town or with a hitman in world full of zombies and soldiers, will you give it a try?

name: Choi
summary: Choi is an arcade game that requires physical agility. Choi makes a contract with the demon and is traveling freely in space and time. The space police in charge of space order started chasing Choi for distorting time and space. Hide behind a tree or kick a rock to evade the space cops and get away.

name: Chess Match
summary: Chessie Chicken's Chess Match is a unique addition to the Match-3 genre. Pieces move like they do in Chess. Catch chicken's before they cross the board by matching pieces they are standing on. Earn chips and use them to purchase powerups. Earn combo points by catching 2 birds in one match!

name: Champ at Dawn
summary: Change the counrty's flag in the background of the game using your game records. You can.

name: Chestnut Grove
summary: How do you go about your life when self-isolation has become the new normal? Chestnut Grove is based on my personal experience of quarantine and features 100% real documents and notices.

name: Chase Love in Japan
summary:
Fresh out of high school, and only months away from starting college, this seemed the perfect chance to turn your dreams into reality and finally visit Japan! Your online friend, Emi, eagerly awaits your arrival for what promises to be a manga and anime pilgrimage of epic proportions!

No sooner do you arrive, however, before a chance encounter throws you into the middle of a global intrigue—threatening to turn your dream vacation into a nightmare. With three different men all vying for your attention for very different reasons, you just might live to regret all those heroines you envied in your favorite dramas…

name: Chick Chick Boom
summary: Chick Chick Boom is a game for Adobe Flash and WiiWare, which was published by Nintendo of Europe, starring small chicks/chickens.

name: Chef
summary: Peach must flip cooking items thrown into the air by the Mario Bros. with a pan and feed them to Yoshi.

name: Chunithm New Plus
summary: The 14th version of the famous Sega rhythm game. Including brand new songs and gameplay features.

name: Chunithm Sun
summary: The latest version of the Sega rhythm game saga Chunithm, with new multiplayer modes, songs and gameplay enhancements.

name: Chasmal
summary: Chasmal is a top down action shooter with procedurally generated elements. Descend into a ruined machine using powerful items to overcome foes and reach the bottom of the depths.

name: Chicobanana: Space Pong
summary:
Play Pong with a monkey as ball!
One or two players, you can play together with your friend at your side on the same device. Chicobanana loves to play this crazy game!

name: Charlotte's Table
summary:
Welcome to Charlotte’s Table where you can create the restaurant of your dreams!
Choose your menu items and the look & feel of your restaurant. From interior design to table settings to food plating, Charlotte’s Table offers many choices to create both a lavish and welcoming restaurant for you to call your very own.

name: Chain Letter
summary:
Daily Word - Everyday A nine letter word is waiting to be unscrambled, use the hint, solve the puzzle. Come back everyday to play a new word and build up your streak.
Alphabet grid - Want to learn the mechanics, or simply pass the time? put the alphabet in the order within the time limit, play as much as you like and build your streak.
Take on the four by four and five by five alphabet grids, more letters, more moves, not enough time, how fast can you put the grid in order?

name: Chip Beat Blaster
summary:
Chip Beat Blaster is a rhythm platformer game featuring a world-class artist lineup. It's made by people who love rhythm games, chiptunes, and old school games.
Help Riff Radical save the world from evil catfish attorney Bill Johnson using the power of chip music and his homemade 'famiguitar.'
Chiptune music is electronic music made using the sound chips of vintage computers and video game consoles.

name: Chef Master Slot
summary: The most famous slot machine is now available for free on your device.

name: Chess Minis
summary:
Chess Minis has launched World Wide! Solve fun handcrafted puzzles or play online and collect 3D Chess sets designed by amazing artists. Play completely free with NO ADS!
Play free with no ads interrupting you, ever!
Play puzzles that are full of tricky, but elegant solutions. From beginner to expert, play to learn, train for just for fun!

name: Chop Chop Kicker
summary:
Kicking cute dinosaurs and making them fly used to be the national sport of the paleolithic age!
Now, you can re-live the very first flights of the dinosaurs! The magic ink will allow you to draw lines and control the little buddy during his flight.
Use bouncy mushrooms, fat and angry birds, clouds and much, much more to improve your flying distance.
But be careful, the world is hostile and many dangers and obstacles will slow you

name: Chronicles of Albian: The Magic Convention
summary: Gathering of wizards and sorcerers of the world is about to happen in Albian Castle. They have no idea what secret the castle holds!

name: Chaos Awakens
summary: Chaos Awakens is a re-imagination of the OreSpawn mod for Minecraft, it adds more bosses, armors, weapons, tools, dimensions, dungeons and so much more!

name: Charm
summary: Charm is a mod for Minecraft designed to enhance the vanilla game experience without compromising its gameplay style.

name: Chef Wanted
summary: The chef at Freddy Fazbear's Pizza has gone missing, so Freddy has to give up the microphone and take control of the pizza-making for a whole week!

name: Chase: Animatronics
summary:
Chase: Animatronics is a Five Nights at Freddy's fangame developed by Team EKS, the people behind the Five Nights at Candy's and Popgoes series, as well as the now cancelled Chef Wanted, the game that originally spawned this project!
This is a "maze chase" game that takes mechanics and characters from the Five Nights at Freddy's games and puts them in a fast-paced arcade scenario. Try your best to collect all of the coins and survive against Freddy, Bonnie, Chica and Foxy with clever takes on the door mechanic from FNAF1, the flashlight mechanic from FNAF2, and more!

name: Chex
summary: Chex is a strategic board game currently based on Gliński's hexagonal variant of chess. Players must use their pieces to capture their opponent's king. The hexagonal board introduces new challenges and opportunities.

name: ChikuTaku
summary: This is a short rhythm game based on the first single by Watson Amelia of hololive English -Myth-. Enjoy the journey of hololive's No.1 detective as she traverses through various time periods of the past and future in a fun musical adventure!

name: Chronicon: The Mechanist
summary: Play as the Mechanist, laying waste to your foes with high tech weaponry and machinery! Equipped with a medium range Gun, an Axe for close encounters (or throwing!), and a Jetpack for mobility, the Mechanist is an intense and powerful class.

name: Chain Car Stunt Simulator: 3D Extreme Highway Car Driving Games
summary: This is the latest gaming attraction with all new car racing mania adventure in town. So be prepared to break the chain, as it is a real challenge and test of your core driving skills.

name: Chuzzle 2
summary:
Fall back in love with a fuzzy, non-stop explosion of adorable Chuzzle matching action!
Slide and match colorful chuzzles, and watch them sneeze, shiver and explode with delight! But watch out for locks and other dangers as you take on dozens of Chuzzle challenges in your quest to funkify the universe!
Your pet Chuzzles are waiting for you to find them! Unlock them all to fill your very own Chuzzarium! Take a break to watch your Chuzzles swing, run, dance, eat, and play! Raptisoft's ADO (artificial digital organism) technology makes your pet Chuzzles feel real!
So cuddle up with Puzzle fun -- once you start popping Chuzzles, you won't be able to stop!

name: Chinese New Year 2013
summary: Chinese New Year 2013 is a Google Doodle made to celebrate the year of the Snake.

name: Chinese Expeditionary Force: Assault Team
summary: Chinese Expeditionary Force - Assault Team is a tactical stealth game set in the expedition of the Chinese Expeditionary Force to Burma during World War II. The assault team consists of five characters, each with their own special skills. You can use different strategies to complete the mission.

name: Chaotic Era
summary: Chaotic Era is an intense and brutal strategy game inspired by classic science fiction, following a stranded human crew on an alien planet. Scavenge for resources and fight back against mysterious alien terrors in this frantic real-time strategy nightmare.

name: Chimeras: Blinding Love - Collector's Edition
summary: When several young men are mysteriously found blind and paralyzed, you're called in to investigate! Can you uncover who, or what, is attacking them and return the Parisian streets to safety?

name: Chess Defense Saga
summary: A chess-themed tower defense game with unique strategies, stories, and illustrations!

name: Chop Suey
summary:
Chop Suey is a martial arts fighting game developed by Adam Billyard for the Atari 8-bit family. It was published in 1985 by English Software. Antic Software published the game in the US. The title is a repurposing of the name of the American Chinese dish chop suey.

Chop Suey is a one-on-one martial arts fighting game. The action takes place on a box-type stage, watched by an audience sitting in several rows of seats in front of two competitors. Each successful attack on an opponent means their pain bar goes up and when the bar is full, the POW symbol will start blinking. It means the player is in a very fragile state of health - one more punch or kick and the fighter will fall. The match ends when the fighter falls eight times or the timer runs out. At the top of each wall air vents will open occasionally, allowing scorpions to drop to the floor and scuttle away. The players should avoid them at all costs, as they give potentially lethal bites.

If the player is victorious, a more difficult opponent is faced in the next match.

Source: Wikipedia

name: Changeling Charade
summary: Put on a magical disguise to find true love! As a changeling, will you stay among the human nobility, or join the fairy revolution?

name: Churchill Solitaire
summary:
A variation on the classic card game Solitaire which was loved by Winston Churchill. Gameplay differs from standard Solitaire in the following ways:
- Uses two decks of cards concurrently
- Newly drawn cards are laid on top of existing columns rather than their own pile
- Features "The Devil's Six", which are six cards in a row up top which must be sent directly to the scoring area and may never enter the field of play.

This game was commissioned by Donald Rumsfeld and features video clips and audio recordings of Winston Churchill throughout a war-themed campaign mode.

name: Choose Your Weapons TD
summary:
This game combines the game play of a tower defense game, and the fun of destroying the stickman virus.
You get to use towers, and some fun things to lay on the track (mouse trap, land mines, frying pan). They all eliminate the virus in their own fun way.

name: Choose Your Weapon
summary: A virus is vandalizing websites across the internet. Choose your weapon and slice, shoot, smash, and incinerate the stickman virus.

name: Choose Your Weapon 2
summary:
The virus has mutated! Good thing Glowmonkey has some new weapons. Fight, crush, burn, and blow up the stickman virus.
In this sequel you can go up ans down the folders.

name: Choose Your Weapon 3
summary: The virus is back, and it got smarter. You'll notice in the later levels that the stickmen have figured out how to climb up the folders. Glowmonkey has a few new weapons.

name: Choose Your Weapon 4
summary:
The virus is back, and this time you have 20 different weapons to choose from. Plus, they're all unlocked! Choose the best ones for each level and eliminate the virus!
Includes a boss at the end of each stage.

name: Choose Your Weapon 5
summary: The Virus Has Transformed! They set up their own servers too! This latest installment in the Choose Your Weapon series has many new features, but the goal is the same...seek out the internet virus and destroy it - using 60 different weapons :) You always carry 4 weapons. Two are melee, and two are projectile. Smash, burn, claw, bomb, or face palm them on their own turf.

name: Christmas Fables: Holiday Guardians - Collector's Edition
summary: It's time to make your choice! In the new game you have to bring Santa to children despite the odds using your wits and the Christmas spirit!

name: Chronos: Dawn of Time
summary: Chronos is a 2D action RPG game where you will need to fight fierce enemies and build your empire as you explore the dawn of time in a post-apocalyptic world.

name: Cheese Quest 3D: The Brother Lady Saga
summary: Cheesequest features Cheese playing a game in his head. It begins with Cheese saying he likes games and sticking a video game cartridge into his mouth. He then goes into his imagination, avoiding obstacles, completing a monkey dance lesson, getting a horsey, fighting a boss (cake), getting a "Water Horsey (a shark that Cheese rides)", and avoiding falling cereal. After he avoids the cereal, he says "I like- CEREAL!" and he takes the video game out of his mouth.

name: Chinese Rail SIm
summary: Start with an empty Chinese map, create, build a rail network with your own imagination and sophisticated design, help millions of people to reach where they want to go. Ready yourself as a lead rail engineer to make some challenging decisions along the way.

name: Chrome Wars
summary: Can you become the best robot ever and defeat your opponents? How far can you get in this robot fight. After every fight you can adapt your robot.

name: Chorus of the Night
summary: Fight through hordes of burnt CDs, flying TVs, and faceless suits in this frantic, run-based, twin-stick shooter. Forget firing bullets, though - you'll be flinging vinyl records, throwing drumsticks and swinging guitars to fend off the enemies of music and maybe, just maybe, survive the night.

name: Chucky: The Road To Heaven
summary: Chucky:TRTH is a 3D, action-adventure, jumping puzzle game. You a cute demon trying to reach heaven all the way from hell. Travel through many different locations, filled with monsters, puzzles, traps, hidden objects etc. Will you reach your goal or fail? That is for you to find out.

name: Chess & Guns
summary: Chess & Guns is a mix between chess and real-time third person combat. Use your piece's weapon, ability and the environment to your advantage to be the last one on the board.

name: Christmas Stories: Taxi of Miracles - Collector's Edition
summary: A tough year has put a damper on your town’s holiday cheer. With Christmas just around the corner, it’s up to you and a jolly cab driver named Nick to help townspeople in need and share the true meaning of Christmas with one and all!

name: Chuck the Metalhead in Medieval Hell
summary: Become the first Metalhead Ruler of Hell in this illustrated RPG with a fresh approach to the combat system! Recruit a team of hellish freaks, kick the butts of demons to the rythm of metal and decide the fate of souls! All of this in hand-drawn art style inspired by medieval illuminations.

name: Chainmail Bikini
summary: Join Brandi the Red and her heroic companions as they hunt monsters for fun and profit in this RPG game!

name: Chester: Into the Light
summary: Your once favorite plush toy now torments your mind. Find your way out of the nightmares each night, and bring your fears into the light.

name: Chicago 2020
summary: You have been bad. Now the police is coming for you. Escape the city before they catch you. And if you're too slow the city will be locked down.

name: Chick Rage
summary: Chick Rage is a top-down arcade game where the game becomes more and more difficult each time, the levels confuse the player more and more, and the ghost gains more and more powers. Run around the location and beat off disks flying everywhere at the enemy, and most importantly, do not stand still!

name: Chaos Magic: Towers and Wizards
summary: "Chaos Magic: Towers and Wizards" is a multiplayer strategy where players choose from unique races and use their strategic skills to guide their forces to victory in battles for dominance. Players must carefully plan their attacks, defend their base, and outmaneuver opponents to emerge victorious.

name: Chai
summary: Chai is the digital adaptation of the card game of the same name created by Dan and Connie Kazmaier developed by "Steeped Games". It can be played with 1-5 players.

name: Chinese SimpleLife
summary: Chinese SimpleLife is a living environment simulation.

name: Chaos Storm: Strategy Edition
summary: Chaos Storm: Strategy Edition is a magic style tower defense strategy game. You will be the leader of a specific camp, strengthen your power through constant battle, defend your strongholds, and constantly expand your territory, eventually becoming the ruler of the whole world.

name: Christmas Luge
summary: The penguins in the villages below need some Christmas cheer! Slide your way down the snowy mountains, gathering scarves along the way, and toss them to penguins in need.

name: Choppie's
