summary: A horror game where you have to escape a restaurant from a killer rabbit that has got a really sharp arm. Will you chicken out or face your fears?

name: Chillquarium
summary: Chillquarium is a relaxing idle game. Buy fish and raise them in real time, then sell them to turn a profit! Customize your aquarium and fill your collection with rare exotic fish, and unlock ultra-rare color variants!

name: Chaos Saw
summary: Your task is to rotate the platform and not to get under the saws

name: Christmas Night
summary: Christmas Night is a story-themed horror game about Christmas and its beliefs. Will we be rewarded for being a good girl this Christmas or will we be punished for being a spoiled person?

name: Chosun Zombie Defense
summary: Chosun Zombie Defense is a stage-based zombie defense VR game where players eliminate the approaching zombies using weapons from the Chosun Dynasty era.

name: Charem of Metropolitan
summary: This is a simple simulator with 4 amazing girls you can play with. No bullshit storyline, No uncontrolled animation. Just there for you when you are feeling horny.

name: ChronoCodex
summary: Conquer the trials through platforming and dodging hazardous zones to ascend to the top.

name: Chess Morph: The Queen's Wormholes
summary: An original puzzle game inspired by chess. Control a lonely Queen with shapeshifting abilities and defeat the enemy army. Move wisely, explore the wormholes on the board, take the enemy shape and kill them all.

name: Chicken Coop
summary: Chicken CoopThe hoomans are gone. The cow wants her pumpkin and the homestead is in need of your help!What animal will rise to feed the hungry cat and pet the dog?Chickens? With hats?Can they use the tools on the farm to save the day?Can they harvest the pumpkins to feed the cow?

name: Chivalrish
summary: Chivalrish is a novella-sized, romance visual novel set in a medieval fantasy world. Set out on an adventure to rescue a princess who is not at all like you imagined her to be. Meet characters along the way, and decide your fate and theirs in this fun, comical, and thrilling journey.

name: Chess
summary: Use Chess on your Mac to play a match online, against your computer or even against yourself.

name: Chronophoto
summary: Play the online game that tests your knowledge of pop culture and history. Try to guess the year a picture was taken.

name: Chess Maiden
summary: Introducing the ultimate chess experience - "Chess Maiden"!

name: Champ's Nightmare
summary: Champ's Nightmare is a horror immersive audio game for the visually impaired which prioritizes ears over eyes.

name: Chicken Fight
summary: Chickens, baseball bats and rockets, need more? Fight other player chickens in a fast-paced platformer fighter where you use the environment to defeat your enemies. Pick up fishing rods, jetpacks, net guns, and even other chickens. Also defeat an evil duck in story mode or create maps in the editor.

name: Chickie Catchers
summary: Help Mocha and Butternut Squash catch the birdies from the treetops in this cute co-op physics game!

name: Chains of Time
summary: In this 2D RPG, Rollo will have to become much more than a street urchin and care for the survival of all people, instead of only his own.

name: Chernobyl: Death May Die
summary: You have to plunge into the psychological horror, where you have to solve puzzles and find a way out of Chernobyl. Weird, crazy and unique horror awaits you.

name: Christmas with Freddy's
summary: It's Christmas! It is exciting, isn't it? I'm so hyped for my gifts, the animatronics from Fazbear Entertainment! I'm going to play with them all day! It's a shame I won't sleep anymore.

name: Chests, City, Clicker
summary: The principle is simple, the more time you spend, the richer you will be, you can do nothing and get money, but the decisions you make will allow you to get even more!

name: Chick Flick
summary: Use your trusty trampoline to bounce the chicks back to the safety of the nest.

name: Chronicles of Time: Timeline Zero
summary: Travel back in time and unravel the mystery of humanity's extinction in Chronicles of Time: Timeline Zero. Play as Azura, a skilled warrior with time-manipulation abilities, and defeat the rogue AI, Crimson, in an epic battle for the fate of humanity.

name: Chronicles of TalDun: The Longing
summary: A kinetic novel about two magi learning how to live with the burden they each carry. Explore Tal'Dun—a world of dark magick and primordial beings with unfathomable power. Follow a mysterious phenomenon as it turns the world upside down in a way not even magi would be prepared for.

name: Chest
summary: The story of Chest is about Capulet, who has forgotten how to undo the spell after having transformed into a Chest for a time until found by Zong. Having turned back human with Zong's help, Capulet then decided to go on the quest to help those who have also turned into chests.

name: Charles
summary:
Avoid quickly the enemies coming by moving the plane.
It`s not just Dodge. You can kill the enemies with items.
Whose plane will live longer?
You will be a fantastic player if you avoid more than 5 minutes.

name: Chippy & Noppo
summary:
"Chippy and Noppo" is an action puzzle that assembles parts into a toy!
Collect the parts in the factory, process the colors and shapes, and make the same toy as the blueprint.
Even if it's a little different, you might be able to clear it...!?
Because the factory manager is a bit careless.

name: Channel 7
summary: Channel 7 is a single player game with psx era graphics. You are a camera man working for channel 7 news and you are on a journey to a mysterious town called Willowbrook.

name: Champions Ascension
summary: Ready your Champions for battle! Collect, train, equip and manage your own stable of brave and brutal gladiators. Define your own story, and influence the world of Massina. Who will you become? A battle master, an ingenious alchemist, a rich Imperial business magnate? Enter a player-driven fantasy world of arena-based combat where death is real— but so are the rewards.

name: Chief Emoji Officer
summary: Chief Emoji Officer recreates the absurdities of tech corporations by letting you become CEO using only emojis. Climb your way through corporate America by getting promoted, making allies, avoiding layoffs, and turning Redify into the most successful company in the world.

name: Changer Seven
summary: Fast-Paced Lane-Based Action Brawler. The legendary Changers 7 heroes must fight a new threat that changes the citizens of Sunny Point into terrifying beings! But as they investigate and defeat "villain of the week" like enemies, they suspect that someone from their own group may be behind it all.

name: Chess Battle Quest
summary: Learn Chess the fun and easy way through unique challenges throughout the campaign. Beginners and Youngsters alike will enjoy this game a lot. Chess Pieces follows the movement rules of traditional chess but capturing a piece may need several attacks where in each pieces have their own stats.

name: Chain Reaction Classic
summary:
Objective of the game is to Eliminate all of the Opponent's Atoms by Strategically Exploding your Atom and Owing neighbor cells.
A player may only put an atom in an empty cell or a cell having an atom of its own Color. When the cell reaches threshold,The Atom Explodes and move to neighbour cells.

name: Chadboy
summary: Chadboy is a roguelite beat'em up game about a martial arts master who goes against the system and decides to destroy the office of the most influential criminal authority in the city.

name: Chariot Racer
summary:
A battle to the death!
Avoid the monsters, bloodied spikes, flying spears, and blasts of fire as you race around the coliseum track in a battle for survival! Challenge your friends to best your time! Survive long enough and be rewarded the coveted "3rd Star".

name: Chi Ninja
summary: In a world full of ninjas chi ninja will fight his way to freedom a fast pace speed runner platformer with sharp ninja moves grappling hock and ninja stars aswell as a katana will our hero survive the ninja army.

name: Chucky: Wanna Play?
summary: Chucky: Wanna Play? is a stealth-action video game, based on the Child's Play franchise.

name: Champion Cup Goal 2
summary:
Do you want your football club team be the winner of the world champion cup?
Play this fantastic football game, choose your team and your rival, dribble, dodge the opposing players and score the maximum of goals. Raise your team to the top of the ranking and sink your rival to hell by subtracting goals.
Don't miss the opportunity to play in this world tournament your own world league and score goals for your team. This is no normal scorers league… Dare with your favorite sport and rise the ranking of your team to the top of the world.
Defeat your opponents, win the league and turn your team into a legend!

name: Chinese Chess Party
summary: Chinese Chess(Xiangqi) is no longer just a 1v1 game, Chinese Chess Party can support up to 4 players. You can play against the computer on a 1v1 game or even play a 2v2 team game with a computer teammate.

name: Chibi Ninja Shino-kun: Treasure of Demon Tower
summary: Inspired by Japanese ninja games from the 80s and 90s, Chibi Ninja Shino-kun: Treasure of Demon Tower is a fast and smooth retro platformer in which you climb a giant tower while dodging enemies, traps and other obstacles. Use your wall jump, hookshot and ceiling running abilities to make it past the various enemies and discover the legendary treasure of Demon Tower!

name: Chef Life: A Restaurant Simulator - Al Forno Pack
summary: Make delicious wood-fired pizzas and give your restaurant an Italian ambiance with the Al Forno pack. Get 8 pizza recipes and a wide range of customization items to decorate your restaurant.

name: Chef Boyardee Can Simulator
summary: You are a can of Chef Boyardee Mini Ravioli rolling your way home

name: Childhood Dreams: Jigsaw Puzzle
summary: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: Childhood Dreams: Jigsaw Puzzle - Expansion Pack 1
summary: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: Choo Choo Survivor
summary: Drive your train and get to safety while shooting down endless hordes of zombies that are blocking your way. Upgrade your weapons and abilities and become absurdly powerful!

name: Chart1647
summary: Chart1647 is a classic rhythm game developed over many years and is a 4k game similar to Stepmania. It features a fully customized set of levels, importers from most modern SM formats and more!

name: Chezz
summary:
Play fast chess in an all-new way!
Chezz breaks the rules to create the fastest, most frantic new way to play the classic board game.

Challenge yourself in a game that lets you move all the pieces at the same time. Fight quick online PVP battles in real time with other players, or solve hundreds of levels in adventure mode. Pieces change on each game board and can be upgraded. Fast like checkers, intense like chess. Play the ultimate board to action game conversion. Become the ultimate king or queen and join the Chezz revolution today!

name: Chaser
summary: Developed over a couple of days, Chaser is not what it first appears to be. Players are presented with a simple black environment and take control of a green man chasing a turquoise figure. Over time, you’ll pick up speed, grab coins that the turquoise man throws out, and eventually trip and come to a standstill.

name: Chase Goose 2
summary: A monster is chasing you, escape - but the game is doing it's best to stop you...

name: Chaos Coming
summary: "Chaos is Coming" is a personal independent development of the Cthulhu Mythos-style card roguelike game. In the game, the player will face various mysterious and crazy creatures and events, collect powerful relics to drive away monsters, and escape the domain before their mind is corrupted.

name: ChasingCube
summary:
Control the cubes to avoid every triangles.
Easy yet hard, how fast will you react.

name: Charm Studies
summary:
Charm Studies is a lo-fi picross game about young witches studying magic. You play as Cassia, an airheaded girl who's currently failing charms class... Luckily, Senna has agreed to tutor her! The only problem is she's not very nice... Can these two little witches learn from each other through the magic of puzzles?

The game includes a small tutorial for those who are new to picross, but you won't fail if you make mistakes either. You can still see all of the story regardless of your picross skills.

name: Chao Bandstand
summary: Something has stolen the chao's precious instruments for their little bandstand. Who could've done such a thing!? It's up to a small little rabbit to go and find them. Six music boxes to find, find the thief and make the poor little chao happy once again!

name: Chain Ninja
summary: Chain Ninja is an exciting action-adventure game designed and developed by an experienced game development team. In the game, players need to play a chain ninja, traverse the entire room by hanging ropes in the air, obtain keys, and avoid various obstacles and traps in the level.

name: Christmasjong
summary: Feel the atmosphere of Christmas with Christmasjong, a great Mahjong game with beautiful Chrsitmas theme Mahjong tiles. Customize everything you need! Set the background, the color and shape of tiles and many things more. Choose whatever mode you like: Classic or Match.

name: Chameleon: DYH - Chapter 2
summary:
Chapter Two of Chameleon - DYH continues Kai's journey to find his brother.
As Angie continues to investigate the infamous ''Silent Mourn'', Strom struggles to face his past.
Overwhelmed with feelings of sorrow and despair,
Strom remembers the fateful day when his eyes have changed.

name: Chocotto Land Online
summary: 2.5 Dimension Online MORPG from "cocone v corporation"

name: Chataclysm
summary:
Legend has it that there is a treasure trove of great loot and riches. The fortune is said to lie at the very top of a perilous climb. However, all those that have tried have been pulled down by an evil monster. The monster known as........ chat
Welcome to the game where chat directly affects the player. And can only be WON with a chat alliance. Every chat message will try to stop your journey to the top.

name: Cheetahmen
summary: The Cheetahmen was the most marketed game in the Action 52 compilation.

name: Chup's Quest
summary: The sequel of the game The Legend of White Whale.

name: Chubby Hurdles
summary: Clear three mighty hurdles to beat the game!

name: Christmas Squirt!
summary: Christmas Squirt! - is an awesome, animated, relaxing game where sexy elf girls help you have an unforgettable Christmas night. See if you can bring the lusty girls to squirt!

name: Chrono Rift
summary: Join the Breach Hunter Guild in Chrono Rift, a multiplayer online coop game of fantasy, action and roguelike elements. Defend the world from monster invasions caused by mysterious breaches and uncover the truth behind the phenomenon. Play now!

name: Chieftain's Daughter
summary: Chieftain's Daughter is a tactical turn-based strategy game that challenges players to lead a team through an alternate history of the Colonization era of the Americas. With base building, squad management, and survival elements, players must navigate a dangerous world. Will you survive?

name: Check & Clean
summary: Check&Clean is a tactical First Person Shooter that immerses you in a rhythmic universe, alternating analysis sequences and gunfights.

name: Chromatching
summary: Chromatching is a casual 3D game, and you'll love it if you like arcade puzzle games. Match (or not!) shapes of the same color to complete the challenges. Change their color, push them or even remove them using the special shapes. There are 55 levels, so you'll have a lot of fun!

name: Chronomon
summary: Chronomon is a monster taming JRPG game with retro pixel art graphics. Explore a branching storyline, Capture and train over 50+ Chronomon. Battle other trainers in this one of a kind, multi-platform game.

name: Chase Survivors
summary: Survive the apocalypse for 15 minutes! In 'Chase Survivors,' evolve your character and your weapons to face hordes of horrifying creatures. Rescue is already on the way, just wait.

name: CheckMaze
summary: CheckMaze brings chess and mazes together and introduces new pieces and mechanics to the classic game of chess. Maneuver your way through a series of mazes filled with portals and traps and more, while utilizing the unique abilities of new pieces to solve tens of handcrafted puzzles.

name: Chase the Sun 3D
summary: Yes, what you saw is right!! It's a high speed chase to keep up with the sun.

name: Choro Q
summary:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy Color. Original version: Taito - MSX, 1984. Created with GB-Studio 2.0.0 beta5!

The player takes the role of a yellow Volkswagen Beetle (Type 1) Choro-Q, with a surfboard carrier on its roof. The objective of the game is to assemble two more VW Beetles while contending with hostile Choro-Q cars that intend to impede the player's progress. The enemies can be eliminated by jumping on them.

However, the player has a limited amount of life to complete the VW Beetles, which must be assembled in the right order; First, the chassis, then the motor, and lastly the body. When one VW Beetle is completed, it leaves behind a power-up (indicated by a coin-like icon with a dollar sign ($) on it) that grants temporary invincibility, allowing the player to plow through enemy cars.

The level is completed by assembling both VW Beetles. The parts of the Beetles are on the edges of a three-level suspended platform system, and must be pushed off for assembly. The player can jump on the platforms to reach the parts.

The player can lose lives by starting or performing an assembly out of order, crashing into a wall at high speed, falling from too great a height, colliding with an enemy Choro-Q. If the player loses all lives, it results in a game over.

name: Chill Out
summary:
Chill Out is the fourteenth game in the NES version of Action 52.

Old man winter is at the top and is your goal, but it keeps snowing and he's blowing. You must reach the top before you get snowed under.

name: Cheetahmen
summary: Unlike the NES version of Cheetahmen. The Sega Genesis one instead has the same background on all levels, and you need to collect Cheetah Icons from trees or ground areas, and battle snakes, bats, white rhino, hyena, scavenger, and more creatures as you try to get the Cheetah Icons. In level 1 you play as Hercules, then Apollo in level 2, and finally Aries in level 3. Finally, after those 3 levels, the game is beaten.

name: Champion Cup Goal
summary:
Do you want your national football team be the winner of the world champion cup?
Play this fantastic football game, choose your team and your rival, dribble, dodge the opposing players and score the maximum of goals. Raise your team to the top of the ranking and sink your rival to hell by subtracting goals.
Don't miss the opportunity to play in this world tournament your own world league and score goals for your team. This is no normal scorers league… Dare with your favorite sport and rise the ranking of your team to the top of the world.

name: Chiki-chiki Machine Mou Race: Kenken to Black Maou no Ijiwaru Daisakusen
summary: Based on the classic Wacky Races cartoon, this game puts players in the role not of a racer but of a gambler. Players choose different races and gamble on the outcome. Players can pick two different drivers they expect to come out on top. The racing itself is presented via prerendered CG cutscenes with some branching, so players' guesses aren't purely a matter of memorizing the cutscenes. With the money players earn, they can take part in the "trip" mode where they travel through the world of Wacky Races collecting items.

name: Chronicles of 2 Heroes: Amaterasu's Wrath - Collector's Edition
summary:
Chronicles of 2 Heroes: Amaterasu's Wrath - Collector's Edition includes:
- Physical copy of the game
- Artbook
- Soundtrack
- Double-sided Poster
- Samurai Pin
- Magatama Necklace
- Stickers Sheet
- Collector's Box

name: Cheetahmen III
summary:
In 1994, third game in the Cheetahmen series was in development for the Action Gamemaster, a handheld multi-cartridge and CD-ROM clone console that was being developed by Active Enterprises at the time. The game was announced at the 1994's Consumer Electronics Show, alongside the console itself.

The game was later silently cancelled alongside the Action Gamemaster and Cheetahmen II.

name: Children of Morn
summary: Children of Morn is an erotic adventure and sandbox game set in a dark fantasy world full of vicious demons and alluring witches.

name: Child Run: City Surfers Runner
summary: Become a professional runner by passing all the barriers and obstacles. Explore new cities and take all coins!

name: Cherrywitched!
summary: In Cherrywitched! You play as a witch detective for the Council of Witches who’s been struggling with a recent series of missing person cases. One day, you decide to take a break from work to visit your favorite cafe: Cherry Pie’s Cafe! This game takes place in the same universe as my first visual novel Berrywitched! So if you haven't played that game, please consider checking it out.

name: Cheri La Bete
summary:
The shut-in princess' first mission is making a pact with a dragon!
She departs, along with her trusty knight, but...

name: Chou Ga Shin Zangard
summary: Drama CD story, featuring interviews with the voice actors and two minigames.

name: Chrono Trigger: Schala Edition
summary:
What if... Schala escaped from the Ocean Palace?

Chrono Trigger fans have been imagining what might've been for almost twenty-five years. Now, for the first time, an extensive ROM hack explores that question in Chrono Trigger: Schala Edition!

By the same author who created the Golbez Edition and General Leo Edition hacks of Final Fantasy IV and VI, this hack alters events so that Schala survives the Ocean Palace disaster. Magus leads Marle and friends on an expanded adventure through 12,000 BC in search of his sister, with a promise to help them retrieve their lost Crono... but only if they help him first. New locations, enemies, bosses and scenes await, ending in one of gaming's most long-awaited reunions.

While recognizably based off of Ted Woolsey's original 1995 translation, this hack features an extended and polished script, new Techs, new items and weapons, and lots of surprises along the way, bringing maximum nostalgia while also offering something new.

Other changes include: an expanded version of the original Ted Woolsey translation, new items and Techs, new enemies and dungeons, new locations and NPCs, new shops and treasures, and a lot of surprises along the way. More alterations are explained in the readme.

2.2 is a cleanup of 2.1, including typo corrections and repairs to minor bugs. The primary game content is not altered.

name: Chaotix of Tomorrow
summary: Chaotix of Tomorrow is a fan made Sonic RPG made by Magnus Andersson using RPG Maker 2000, it stars the Chaotix crew featuring the return of Mighty. The game was later updated in 2006 to add better graphics and new features. The creator originally did not plan to create a sequel to the game, but a sequel was made anyway titled Twisted Mettle.

name: Charged: RC Racing - Starter Edition
summary: Charged: RC Racing is all about speed and making use of random items. Drive RC Cars in different locations and use items to defeat your opponents.

name: Chamberbound
summary: Chamberbound is an atmospheric 3D ball roller puzzle game where you maneuver your way through chambers while solving puzzles with a brilliantly engineered ball which functions in unknown ways.

name: Chiller
summary:
Chiller is an unofficial game developed by American Game Cartridges for the Nintendo Entertainment System. The game is based upon a notorious arcade shooter by Exidy. It was also released in Australia by Home Entertainment Suppliers.

The game is cited as one of the most violent games ever made for the Nintendo Entertainment System, let alone the 1980s video game medium. Despite being an unlicensed port, the game followed several official examples by being censored with some nudity covered up.

In the game, you are in various medieval settings, usually featuring innocent people restrained in torture devices. The gruesome motive is to kill every NPC in as little time as possible.

name: Chu Da D
summary: Chu Da D (鋤大D) is a Famicom game developed by Ex-Sachen developers and published by Fortune Power/Jichang in 1995. It is based on the card game of the same Chinese name, often known as Big Two elsewhere.

name: Chinese Tycoon
summary: Chinese Tycoon (中國大亨) is a Game Boy Color game developed by Hitek. This is a port of the Richman 2 (大富翁2). It is believed to be the game released under the Hitek name and it appears to be their only board game.

name: Chef
summary: Chef is a fun, easy to play tycoon cooking game with 48 levels to complete. The aim of the game is to prepare and serve the customers their orders.

name: Chef
summary:
Chef is a fun, easy to play tycoon cooking game with 48 levels to complete.

The aim of the game is to prepare and serve the customers their orders. You will need to be quick , efficient and most importantly accurate, wrongly created orders go into the bin, losing you money and serving a customer too slow will lose you much needed income.

In low levels, this may not be a deal breaker, but pretty soon it will get very challenging as you advance your career and move to higher levels.

name: Chronicles Of Errodean
summary: Embark on an epic adventure to collect three powerful relics in this medieval RPG. Explore ancient ruins, fight mythical beasts, and master magic to save the kingdom from an evil sorcerer.

name: Champion's Chalice
summary: Champion’s Chalice is a single player Roguelike Auto Battler. Choose your champion, buy units and items, roll the shop, and battle enemy parties. Discover unique and powerful synergies as you traverse varied environments in search of prized treasure. Can you find the chalice?

name: Chrono Crystal
summary: Chrono Crystal is a tower defense game. Spanning across 5 major regions with the Prince and facing numerous challenges, an unprecedented great war is about to break out. Build your towers, upgrade your heroes, and defend your crystal against waves of enemies—until the countdown timer runs out!

name: Chess Cats
summary: Welcome to "Chess Cats" - the ultimate chess experience with cats! Go on a journey to rediscover the beauty of chess as you challenge our adorable cats, each with their own unique look and personality. Dive into a world of strategy and intellect, where you'll not only improve your chess game but also make some furry friends along the way!

name: Chef Ramsay
summary:
Gordon Ramsay likes you very much. You are his top chef and you never disappoint.

But do you have what it takes to be a master chef? I certainly doubt it! Complete objectives to try and impress him. Who knows? You may even make it out alive.

name: Chicken Shoot
summary: Chicken Shoot is a gallery shooting game based on free 2003 flash game of the same name. Played from the first-person perspective, the player points the Wii remote and shoots all chickens that fly across the screen.

name: Chicken Shoot
summary: Chicken Shoot is a gallery shooting game based on free 2003 flash game of the same name. The player, controlling Chicken Bill, shoots all the chickens that appear on the 2D hand-drawn screens, shown from a first-person perspective.

name: Charlotte's Web
summary:
Charlotte's Web is based on the 2006 holiday hit movie released by Nickelodeon Movies, Walden Media, and Paramount Pictures.

Play as Wilbur, the pig, or Templeton, the rat throughout four settings: Zuckerman Farm, the countryside, a junkyard, and the Country Fair. Throughout the journey, you'll unlock arcade-style mini-games and take on a variety of amusing and complex missions. Collect letters of the alphabet to help Charlotte spell out messages in her web, stash firewood so Mr. Zuckerman can't cook in his smokehouse, release rats imprisoned by the nasty crows, and collect tickets so Fern and Avery can play at the carnival

Charlotte's Web features a wide range of gameplay elements that include exploration, stealth, and puzzles. Be rewarded with high-quality movie stills and sharp gameplay visuals.

name: Charlotte's Web
summary:
Charlotte's Web is based on the 2006 holiday hit movie released by Nickelodeon Movies, Walden Media, and Paramount Pictures.

Play as Wilbur, the pig, or Templeton, the rat throughout four settings: Zuckerman Farm, the countryside, a junkyard, and the Country Fair. Throughout the journey, you'll unlock arcade-style mini-games and take on a variety of amusing and complex missions. Collect letters of the alphabet to help Charlotte spell out messages in her web, stash firewood so Mr. Zuckerman can't cook in his smokehouse, release rats imprisoned by the nasty crows, and collect tickets so Fern and Avery can play at the carnival

Charlotte's Web features a wide range of gameplay elements that include exploration, stealth, and puzzles. Be rewarded with high-quality movie stills and sharp gameplay visuals.

The Nintendo DS version of the platformer has even more exclusive features including taking on the role of Fern and use the stylus to feed, bathe, or pet Wilbur, as well as a variety of unlockable mini-games, including Wi-Fi and touch screen mini-games.

name: Chicken Run
summary: Chicken Run for Game Boy Color brings all the fun and adventure of the movie to the palm of your hand. You take the role of Ginger as you guide your fellow chickens to freedom in this one-player action or puzzle game. More than 20 levels of puzzle-solving adventure span the farmyard and the pie machine, which will keep you busy for hours. To begin, you'll have to bring a group of chickens through the farmyard, carefully avoiding or deactivating any obstacle that may alert the farmers. Then it's off to the pie machine, where mechanical mayhem awaits you if you aren't careful. Once you've brought the chickens through the pie machine, you'll be back in the farmyard with a new bunch of chickens and all new challenges ahead of you. You'll have to avoid obstacles such as dogs, cameras, spotlights, and others, as you make a break for freedom. You can push objects, shut off power, or find shortcuts to get around the many obstacles. And don't forget to keep an eye out for objects you can use to your advantage. You can also use a password to continue your chicken-saving quest another time.

name: Chris: The Element Runner
summary: In Chris: The Element Runner, race through an endless 2D stage filled with elemental particles as you dodge stones, flames, water, and air. Simple graphics and gameplay make it easy to pick up and play for quick sessions. Test your skills and see how far you can survive in this thrilling adventure.

name: Chess Graphy
summary: Aren't you tired of looking at only one board, while reviewing your opening lines? Chess Graphy will graph out your openings and allow you to easily glider over the endless possibilities of a chess game.

name: Checkmate Showdown
summary: Chess meets Fighting games. Crush your opponents in the arena and on the chessboard in this online multiplayer competitive tactical fighting game that mixes the strategical elegance of Chess with the fast-paced execution of fighting games.

name: Chef: Cocktails & Drinks
summary: Tired of serving soda to your customers? It’s time to reach a whole new dimension of beverages with Chef: Cocktails & Drinks! Ranging from fruity booze to overpriced creamy coffee, you will have a new wide array of options at your disposal to gently decrease your customers’ bank account!

name: Champions of Quortz
summary: This is not another platformer! Champions of Quortz is a 2D Boss Rush that focuses on repeatable boss fights and loot & character progression. Hack, blast and smash through bosses that become stronger with each victory. Make your Champions stronger by leveling, upgrading and equipping loot.

name: Chocolate Cavern
summary: A simple casual game. Control Licorice as you run through the chocolate caverns and avoiding the ghouls.

name: Chiaroscuro
summary: Explore a whimsical world of light and shadow, while the blinking between black and white blurs the edge of reality…

name: Chrono Trigger: Bugfix and Uncensoring Patch
summary: This patch is geared towards fixing bugs and patching up script inconsistencies or censorship. The aim is to preserve the original translation while generally improving the game as a whole.

name: Champion Shift
summary: Unleash mythic heroes and their mighty vehicles in this thrilling co-op action roguelike. Seamlessly shift into car form, create builds with unique abilities, and battle endless enemies to stop the evil Dominion. Rev through high-octane missions, conquer epic bosses, and become an absolute legend!

name: Chicken Tricks
summary: Peck, dodge and shoot your way through endless waves of enemies. Upgrade your Chick and prove you have what is needed to avoid being turned into fried chicken.

name: Chess!
summary: Chess! an immersive 3d chess game built with Unreal Engine 5 and seamlessly integrated with the popular online platform, Lichess. Players can challenge advanced AI, compete against millions of other players in ranked matchmaking, delve into offline chess puzzles, and much more!

name: Charge!
summary: Charge! Lead your elite squad to advance! Use dozens of weapons, armor sets, and relics to create a variety of gameplay styles and eliminate endless enemies!

name: Chloe’s Requiem: Encore
summary:
Chloe’s Requiem is a Japanese 2D adventure game, filled with mysteries and surprises. The young creator, in her teens, created the original game, inspired by free game titles such as The Witch’s House and Ao Oni.

From the original release in 2013, the graphics and sounds have all been completely revamped, allowing all players, new and returning, to have a fresh experience with the game.

In Chloe’s Requiem -encore-, the side story -con amore- is also included, which can be played after the player finishes the original story. Players who have played the game in the past can enjoy the updated art and graphics.

name: Championship Rally
summary: Championship Rally is a top-down racing game. The player can choose to control real rally cars: Toyota Celica, Nissan Pulsar, Lancia Delta, and others. There are three modes in the game: time attack, high speed rally, and "adventure mode", which takes the player through a championship in Senegal. Each mode allows the player to select a car and customize its steering, gears, brakes, etc. Car controls are fairly simple, with one button assigned to accelerating and another to applying brakes.

name: Charon's Staircase: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary: In this first-person horror mystery game, you set out to bury the horrible past of a tyrannical government. Retrieve and destroy the documents that unravel the secrets that lie beneath Oack Grove. This Digital Deluxe Edition includes a Digital Artbook and the OST.

name: Chenmo de Xishuai
summary: Chenmo de Xishuai is a cricket fighting game.

name: Chronos Affinity
summary: "A Story-Driven Extraction Based Shooter"Chronos Affinity is an ultra-realistic first person shooter. Raid, fight, loot, and grow your inventory to better prepare yourself for survival. Join now and be apart of the interactive story!

name: Chronicles of Vaeltaja: In Search of the Great Wanderer
summary:
A fantasy grid-based dungeon crawler role-playing game set in the kingdom of Twin Falls, a lush and colourful world created with beautiful pixel graphics.

Chronicles of Vaeltaja: In Search of the Great Wanderer takes you back to the golden era of pc gaming, when role-playing games like Dungeon Master, Might and Magic, Eye of the Beholder, Lands of Lore, WIzardry and Ultima ruled the world. Gather your party of six adventurers and embark on a journey through the colourful kingdom of Twin Falls where sunny fields, lush forests, misty swamps and dark dungeons await to be explored!

name: Chicken Cluck Cluck!
summary: In this humorously plotted point-and-click adventure game, fool around as a chicken by swallowing items and laying them back as eggs! Solve funny riddles, find ways to enter locked rooms, and talk to funny animals, enjoyable with an original hand-animated style!

name: Chasm Bound
summary: Chasm Bound is a challenging 3D platformer where the player tries to escape from a deep pit in the ground.

name: Chiko-chan no Noukatsu Kenkyuujo
summary:
Let's exercise your brain with Chiko-chan by playing a brain activity game supervised by Kikunori Shinohara, professor of brain science! Stimulate every part of your brain while playing 3 genres of brain activity games!

Energize your brain by playing brain-activating games in three areas: attention, analysis, and inspiration.

In "brain activity mode", you can measure your brain age once a day. In addition, there is a "recommended brain activity game" mode that recommends brain activity games that match the current state of the brain.

"Brain activity with everyone" mode where up to 4 people can play together.
"Chikotto Trial" mode where you can play your favorite brain activity game.

In addition, you can enjoy content related to brain activities such as "Brain Activity Quiz" and "Brain Activity Stretch".

name: Chotto xx na Watashi no Nichijou: Kiki Dasshutsu!? Gyakuten no Nazotoki Life
summary:
Save the heros from these unfortunate pictures!
A simple, touch based time killing escape game

Somethings happening in these ordinary bright, yet sad, illistrations
A hidden object game where you aim to seek out a solution to these "Not-so-sad" dangers!

name: Chickenauts
summary: Chicken Strike is a fast paced, action roguelike game where you fight Alien Chickens that are invading your farm. All of the combat happens in huge Spaceship where you try to clear rooms full of various alien chickens that are trying you to stop from going to the main floor.

name: Chemical
summary: A first-person action role-playing game where you encounter enemies and explore new spaces to progress.

name: Chrome Sweat
summary: A semi-open world RPG set in a cyberpunk universe. Inspired by games like Deus Ex, Chrome Sweat grants players a wide degree of class customization options and in-game choices. Your decisions will impact the fate of this city and its denizens.

name: Check the Room 13
summary: Check the Room 13: Unravel the Hotel's Haunted Past - Immerse yourself in this chilling 4K, 60fps adventure as Sarah uncovers the eerie secrets of a grand hotel. Navigate supernatural forces, solve cryptic puzzles, and escape the malevolent grasp of the sinister entity.

name: C.H.A.I.N.G.E.D.
summary:
The antichrist has won, the world has ended.
Time to make some choices.

name: Chex Quest 4: Flemmed to The Core
summary: A modification of Chex Quest 3 that adds a new episode.

name: Chicco App Toys Blocks
summary: Look how easy it is to build objects and colourful characters with simple clicks. Choose the right blocks and complete the figures. The game does not end here. The app really does interact with the Chicco constructions. Frame the special bricks and discover the magic from your tablet.

name: Chip-8 Emulator
summary: This is a first ever emulator for the Atari Lynx. There is an included selection of CHIP-8 games: Brix, Pong, Invaders, Blinky, Blitz, Tetris, UFO, Joust, Super Blinky, Worm and Car.

name: Chariot: Royal Gadget Pack
summary: The Shopkeeper joins the action, bringing along 5 new gadgets to Chariot! Play as the Shopkeeper in solo or co-op and try out new technology delivered straight from the royal engineers' workshop! Walk on ice, light up the darkness, go swimming in lava, freeze the world in place, teleport the Chariot through time and space, and much more! Also includes new achievements and blueprints hidden throughout existing levels. Help His Downloadable Majesty rest in peace already!

name: Chapolim & Super Sam: a lenda dos super heróis
summary: An unofficial overhead arcade shooter featuring El Chapulín and Super Sam.

name: Chaves Arena
summary: A simple unofficial 3D graphics fighting game featuring characters from El Chavo. It has only two characters (Chavo and Don Ramón) and two stages. It is considered as an evolution of the previous game Street Chaves.

name: Choo Choo Minder
summary: Assemble a train in order through controlling the locomotive and switches

name: Chojiro
summary:
"The wandering ronin.
Night breeze carries the scent of burnt horse flesh to his nostrils.
He follows it through the weeds, and comes across a village ablaze.
What horrors unfurled here...?"
This is a small horror game on itch.io made for a game jam. Gives ps1 vibes with its visuals.

name: Chrono Hunter
summary: Step into the thrilling world of Chrono Hunter, a native VR immersive adventure that combines enjoyment of FPS, Roguelite, and RPG genres. As a time traveler agent equipped with amazing abilities and weapons to explore to experience through diverse and meticulously crafted levels.

name: Chronicles of Vipers
summary: Chronicles of Vipers is a remake-demake first-person shooter inspired by old 8-bit and 16-bit console games, as well as VHS-era movies.

name: Choice of Rebels: Stormwright
summary: The uprising continues! You fled the armies of the Hegemony into a nightmare wilderness. Now escape the storms of chaos magic to spread the flames of your rebellion in this epic fantasy RPG.

name: Chrono Crystal: Giant Gate DLC
summary: Chrono Crystal is a tower defense game. Spanning across 5 major regions with the Prince and facing numerous challenges, an unprecedented great war is about to break out. Build your towers, upgrade your heroes, and defend your crystal against waves of enemies—until the countdown timer runs out!

name: Charon: Zhetan Chronicles
summary: Overcome the chasm ordained by divine fate! Charon - Zhetan Chronicles is a 2D Fantasy RPG with pixel art visuals. An epic story with queer characters, strategic battles and handmade artworks awaits you!

name: Chrono Crystal: Factory DLC
summary: Chrono Crystal is a tower defense game. Spanning across 5 major regions with the Prince and facing numerous challenges, an unprecedented great war is about to break out. Build your towers, upgrade your heroes, and defend your crystal against waves of enemies—until the countdown timer runs out!

name: Choice of Life: Wild Islands
summary: Conquer the jungle and prove that in any situation you - the master of your destiny!

name: Chronautical
summary: In this narrative-driven sci-fi mystery, investigate across space and time to uncover clues and unravel the secrets of a star system that has disappeared, and the man trying to find it.

name: Chicken Brother
summary: Exploring in the huge sinkhole, you can transform from a chicken to a muscle man, by jumping, gliding and climbing from the bottom of the sinkhole to the outside world.

name: Chrono Crystal: Hubert
summary: Chrono Crystal is a tower defense game. Spanning across 5 major regions with the Prince and facing numerous challenges, an unprecedented great war is about to break out. Build your towers, upgrade your heroes, and defend your crystal against waves of enemies—until the countdown timer runs out!

name: Chrono Crystal: Archie
summary: Chrono Crystal is a tower defense game. Spanning across 5 major regions with the Prince and facing numerous challenges, an unprecedented great war is about to break out. Build your towers, upgrade your heroes, and defend your crystal against waves of enemies—until the countdown timer runs out!

name: Champion Strike: Crypto Arena
summary: Champion Strike: Crypto Arena is a 1v1 real-time PvP strategy simulation game with a controllable Champion aspect.

name: Chimera Custom XG
summary: Dive deep into mysterious alien facilities, hidden structures, and ancient sites all over the planet. Overcome technologically advanced defenses, deadly forces, and cunning traps. Be wary of what you uncover, as the most dangerous thing you may find is the truth!

name: Chelesste
summary: Embark on an epic journey where chess meets magic and digital card games in Chelesste! Engage in battles on a mystical chessboard as you command powerful cards. Strategize and outwit your opponents in this thrilling blend of strategy, card gameplay, and chess-inspired tactics.

name: Chef Capybara
summary: Chef Capybara is a hardcore platformer where you play as a capybara cooking a variety of dishes. Explore different worlds, collect ingredients, and avoid traps while preparing meals. Unlock new outfits by collecting gems. Get ready for an exciting culinary adventure!

name: Checkmate! My Shogi Club President can't be this Cute!
summary: Have you ever wanted to learn how to play shogi (Japanese chess), but found the pieces intimidating? Fear no more! We're here to help. Experience a shogi game with a gentle learning curve, featuring westernized tiles, combined with an engaging visual novel. Join us and bid farewell to your worries!

name: Chase
summary: Chase is a horror game with shooter and detective elements. The events take place in a dark and atmospheric world, you have to take on the role of a mercenary of the Inquisition, go to the dark forest of Blackwood and fulfill the terms of the contract.

name: Childhood Homes: And Why We Hate Them
summary:
Welcome back.

After over a decade, you return home.

name: Checkers in the Park
summary: Checkers in the Park is an Activity that we've developed here at Discord for playing checkers with your friends!

name: Chess in the Park
summary: Chess in the Park is an Activity that we've developed here at Discord for playing chess with your friends!

name: Chicken Balls
summary: Chicken Balls is an Angry Birds-style arcade with realistic physics.

name: Chimera Island
summary: Rediscover a lost island with mysterious creatures the world has long since forgotten. Now it is up to you to help restore this ruined world and bring about a new age of Chimera.

name: Chickenality
summary: Chickenality - A top-down game, you control a chicken in an arena where enemies appear, in each level you find yourself with a unique weapon, ammo, health packs and explosive barrels. Challenge yourself to last as long as possible.

name: Champions Tactics: Grimoria Chronicles
summary:
Champions Tactics Grimoria Chronicles is a brand new PVP Tactical RPG experimental game on PC published by Ubisoft utilizing Oasys Blockchain and NFT elements. Assemble a team of mythical Champions, engage in thrilling tactical battles against other players and discover the legends of the dark and mystical world of Grimoria.

Are you ready to write your name in the chronicles?
Follow us on our social networks and subscribe to our newsletter to stay in touch with the latest news.

name: Christ's Revenge: Ascension
summary: Jesus Christ is back... For vengeance. Jump, Dodge, and Glide your way to the top as Jesus Christ himself.

name: Chasm
summary:
Joe is a good sleeper, very good - some would say the greatest in Chasmton. But there are just some things you can't sleep through; good lovin' and bad rockfall.

Joe doesn't get much lovin these days, but rockfall has cut off his town's water supply from the dam at the top of the chasm, and you (lucky devil) have the chance to go along for the long and perilous ride.

name: Cheogsh
summary: A wad for Doom II: Hell on Earth with 1 very large map.

name: Chronicles of the Soulforged
summary: Chronicles of the Soulforged (“CotS”) is a card-based strategy game that combines strategy, deck building, and realtime combat. Build your deck with powerful combinations and free the soulforged's from its remorese by crashing its enemies!

name: Chosen Angels
summary: Chosen Angels is a side scroller game where you have to play as an angel, who must cope with not an easy job. Need to have time to deliver all the angels on the right path. The color of their wings corresponds to their color of the door. Do not hesitate, with time there will be a lot of them.

name: Chromata
summary:
Chromata is a game about experimentation in an original way.

You don't have control of the movements of the character but rather mix up colors in order to move him in the game world. Red moves the player forward, Blue makes the player jump vertically, pink makes him jump at an angle, green makes the player stomp downwards. Now add to that that you can boost the effects of colors by adding up to four of them in a row, just pick your 10 colors, chose the direction and then watch as your mixture of colors gets auto-played to see if you beat the level or not. Can't you already see how many possibilities there are?

name: Chop Chop Ninja
summary: A sidescrolling action platformer, and the first game in Chop Chop franchise.

name: Chop Chop Caveman
summary: Side-scrolling action platformer from the Chop Chop franchise.

name: Chef Showdown
summary: Activity selected co-op cooking rush game apart inside of Discord's Nitro program.

name: ChillCraft
summary:
A clicker game heavily inspired by Minecraft.

You gather resources and then use the resources to craft and upgrade your world and unlock new features. Survival features to be added in the near future.

A simple game to mindlessly click away and forget your life's worries

name: Chicken Scratch
summary: Chicken Scratch is a quirky multiplayer drawing game set in a bird office, where you pass on a telephone chain featuring unusual prompts, muddling doodles and wacky captions.

name: Chungo's Gauntlet
summary: Fight through 70+ stages of retro action and strange internet culture, as you make it through Chungo's Gauntlet. There'll be many traps, strange enemies and strong bosses waiting for you.

name: Children of the World
summary: Children of the World is a 2D adventure indie game displayed in a 3D world with puzzles, platforms, music, and minigame elements based on the movie Boy and the World.

name: Chef Town
summary:
There’s a new chef in town! And it’s you! But that will be just one of your many roles!
A budding but faltering restaurant business was left in your care, and it will take all you’ve got to really get it off the ground and make it work. Become a cook, a chef, a manager, an organizer, a provider! Yes, it’s up to you to start from scratch, run your own restaurant and raise it from rags to riches! It will be quite an adventure!

name: Chronicles of Ghost Town
summary: Chronicles of Ghost Town is a episode of respectable size for Doom 2 designed for limit removing source ports made by various members of Doomer Boards. This month's project lead is 40oz.

name: Christmas In Inferno
summary: Christmas In Inferno is a festive episode for Doom 2 made to be played on any limit-removing port of your choice brought to you by Sant-ilya Claus and his merry band of helpers from the north pole the Doomer Boards. Play as Santa and go to hell and back to deliver presents. Get it before Christmas is over!

name: Chainworm Kommando
summary: Just a set of highly detailed small to medium large maps, mostly inspired by shooter classics of the 90s.

name: Chronology: Deluxe Edition
summary: A platform-adventure game about time travelling, puzzle solving and a friendship between an Old Inventor and a Snail.

name: Chamber of Hex
summary: A 15-minute puzzle adventure game on a 9x12 sheet of paper. Explore rooms, figure out the secret codes and escape the chamber!

name: Christmas Magic
summary: Christmas Magic is a game where you fly on Santa’s sleigh above the streets in six different countries and drop Christmas presents for boys and girls on their chimneys in time while trying to avoid the scary Gargula from stealing the presents and ruining the night.

name: Chirk
summary: A visual novel about lovers in a city where they cremate the roadkill.

name: Chiki-Chiki
summary: Chiki-Chiki is a multiplayer racing game staged in the colorful reefs of Batabada. This frenzic gameplay based on physics will make you want to challenge all of your friends & family through a smashing versus experience. Make sure you samba hard.

name: Chicken Police: Into the Hive!
summary: A wild tale of loss, friendship, conspiracy, and... chickens?! Two rooster detectives are about to venture into the insect underworld to uncover a worldwide conspiracy, while also battling their inherent demons in this animal noir adventure satire.

name: ChronoDojo
summary: ChronoDojo is a cute, cooperative tower defense beat 'em up game in which humble heroes travel time to bash, build and save the world!

name: Chains of the Goddess
summary: Chains of the Goddess is a delivery mechanism for uncomfortable existential questions, cleverly disguised as a roguelite game. Our lawyers warn that you should not follow financial or medical advice dispensed by the Goddess.

name: Chimera's Mansion
summary: This game is an FPS perspective 3D escape horror game. Use various items to solve the mystery and escape from the terrifying creatures Let's escape from the strange mansion

name: Chronicles of the Wolf
summary: Chronicles of the Wolf is a 2D gothic Metroidvania where you play as Mateo Lombardo, a knight hunting the Beast of Gévaudan in 18th-century France. The game features exploration, challenging combat, and a dark, folklore-inspired story with hand-drawn cutscenes and a haunting soundtrack.

name: Chasemaster
summary: A perfect blend of adventure, racing, strategy and speed. Chasemaster is all about completing your mission and escaping the city to your agency safely. Make quick decisions, outplay the police and get back safely!

name: Chef Survivor
summary: Chef Survivor is an action-packed game that puts you in the shoes of a skilled chef facing a nightmare scenario.

name: Chondriatic
summary: Something is under your skin. It itches.

name: Chromatic Resonance
summary: Bullet hell meets auto-shooter in this roguelike color-matcher where RGB itself is your weapon! The Maiden of Light has been captured by the forces of entropy. Six challenging bosses stand in your way and only you can save her!

name: Chromatic Shift
summary: Destroy thousands of unearthly creatures and machines, and progress through the strange world you find yourself in. Chromatic Shift is a small rogue-lite game where you mix and match powerful colors to create your perfect build of abilities. Find your favorite combinations and become powerful!

name: Charles the Bee
summary: Charles has always dreamed of one day becoming a master dancer. The only thing in his path? The cost! Charles must harvest pollen until he has defeated the biggest and baddest dancers around in the world. Can he be the very best? That no one ever was? Its up to you!

name: Charged!
summary: Make over the top RC-Car commericials of the 90's a reality, in electrifying, movement intensive team based battles from a miniature perspective. Control modified RC-Cars, Helicopters and Aircraft, each equipped with unique DIY-weaponary and -gadgets, in highly immersive, detailed environments.

name: Chained Horror Experiences
summary: This is a point-and-click horror game set in modern Japan. You must carefully explore the stages where items are randomly placed and escape while you have life. It's up to you to solve all the mysteries and stop the chain of fear experiences...

name: Chrome Death
summary:
Chrome Death is a hardcore, minimal action game about escape.
Survive for as long as you can in a cyberpunk city and avoiding the CORP AGENTS that have one goal: your destruction. Defeat your friends, earn credits, buy cars and work together with drivers across the world to unlock secret vehicles!

name: Chess Remix
summary: Experience the thrill of playing Chess like never before with Chess Remix. Try out different versions of Chess from around the world, historic board games, modern variations or even create your own original games

name: Choppy Heady
summary: Choppy Heady is a short, intense horror game set in an abandoned children's camp. Trapped by psychopaths, your goal is to survive and escape. Navigate the environment, solve puzzles, and avoid the psychopaths. Can you make it out alive?

name: Chrono Belt: Ayakashibito & Bullet Butlers Crossover Disc
summary: A crossover visual novel by Propeller.

name: ChronoBelt SchwarzOath: Ayakashibito & Bullet Butlers Crossover Disk
summary: PSP port.

name: Chinese Chess Wargame
summary: This is a new game based on the expansion of the traditional Chinese chess game "Chinese Chess". It not only retains the basic rules of the original Chinese chess, but also adds new war chess elements. You should be able to get started quickly. Take the challenge to become the new master.

name: Chaotic Pursuit
summary: Chaotic Pursuit is a hardcore Top-Down Shooter with cute graphics. You miss a shot and you're out!

name: Chrome Wolf
summary: Enjoy tank fights in a tale of fleeting memories and the lives of freedom fighters!

name: Cheesy Munch
summary: Eat the ham, skip the bombs!

name: Chaos-Alante
summary: A magical online game with multiple players online, mainly featuring a rich skill set, highly playable equipment system, and a rich combat experience as its core. Use different options and combinations to engage in treasure brushing, challenge boss, and PVP battles, and win rich trophies

name: Chess Undress
summary: Chess Undress is a 2D pixel chess game with a uniqe anime highschool storyline.

name: Chester: Into The Darkness
summary: After being thrown into the trash, Chester has to fight his way back home while learning to face the darker side of himself.

name: Chemical Sort
summary: Chemical Sort is a science-themed casual puzzle in which you unscramble various colored chemicals by sorting them into their own test tubes.

name: Chilly Slide
summary:
You can slide, slalom and dash down on skis, snowboards or snow sleds. You can race, chill and meet a bunch of colorful characters!
It’s a whole new chapter of the Geometry Slalom Saga. It’s a Winter Sports Wonderland. Play with one simple game mechanic, experience the game’s “no-frills” infinite variety and enjoy your journey downhill!

name: Chainsaw Man: Nusunda Baiku De Kirihiraku!!
summary: Chainsaw Man: Nusunda Baiku De Kirihiraku!! is a mobile browser game based on the Chainsaw Man series. The game was made to promote volume 15 of the manga.

name: Chaos CompleXX
summary: A junk hack made by FPI. This hack includes loads of glitches, horrible palettes, bad level design, message boxes filled with a bunch of junk messages, and bad grammar.

name: Chaos Chain: Supporter Cosmetic Pack
summary: The Supporter Cosmetic Pack is for people who'd like to show some extra support for Chaos Chain and the developers at Corrosive Studios and to help us continue to grow. As a thank you, you'll receive 8 unique skins to show off your style as you descend into the shadows of Slade City!

name: Chaos Pattern
summary: Chaos Pattern is an Action/Strategy hybrid game, with a visual blend of modern lighting and retro looks.

name: Chromosome Evil 2
summary: Dive deep into this Lovecraft-inspired RTS survival for a second time. Assemble your strike team and manage your convoy. It's up to you to survive the onslaught of nightmares that are surely coming your way. Will you find the source of the darkness?

name: Chores of Corruption
summary: Chores of Corruption is a top-down arena shooter with roguelike elements where you defeat waves of enemies. Choose between different characters and from a variety of items and traits to create unique builds to survive the ever growing corruption.

name: Checkers RPG: Online Battles
summary: Experience the ultimate fusion of classic online PvP checkers gameplay and RPG elements in Checkers RPG.

name: Chillax
summary: Chillax is a megawad compiled by an anonymous author and noted for its extreme difficulty. Most, perhaps all of the maps are plagiarized from other WADs, with monsters liberally added in. The mapset is often played on ZDaemon servers and is meant for cooperative play, though some of its maps have also been speedrunned in single-player mode.

name: Chilled Chicken
summary: A map made by 8 ppl thru discord. 500 monsters on UV but really it sounds longer than it is - you can probably bang it out in a half hour.

name: Checkmate Challenge
summary: A chess arcade game where you play against the strongest chess engine in the world.

name: Chickado
summary: Chickado is an isometric rogue-lite game where you play as an armed chick who seeks revenge against the other animals on the farm by battling them.

name: Chocolate Kiss
summary: Chocolate Kiss is a dating sim visual novel game featuring a high school student as a protagonist. The game's story starts in January, and this year, he is determined to find a girlfriend that will give him a chocolate for Valentine's Day, however he has only one month time to achieve that goal. The game's story advances through the days, and allows the player to go to different locations. Depending where he goes he will run into a different girl, all of which are potential candidates for becoming his girlfriend.

name: Chat Simulator: Blind Dates
summary: Delve into blind dates in this fun graphic novel. Will you get to know the four women and their personalities?

name: Chrono Trigger
summary:
An enhanced port of Chrono Trigger that adds anime cutscenes and an exclusive Extras Mode. It is also known for having significantly longer load times in comparison to the original SNES version.

Extras Mode is an option in the main menu that let players view cutscenes and artwork, listen to music, and view information about techs, enemies, bosses, endings, and item locations.

It was first released for PlayStation in Japan before it came to North America as part of the Final Fantasy Chronicles compilation.

name: Chrono Trigger
summary:
A port of Chrono Trigger for Japanese i-mode phones, based on the DS version. This version was separated in two episodes.

Each part cost 600 points (equivalent to 630 yen) and required at least a FOMA 903i series phone to play.

name: Chrono Ressurection
summary:
Chrono Resurrection is an unreleased fangame developed by Resurrection Games under Nathan Lazur's direction, based on the Super NES role-playing game Chrono Trigger. The project was initially called CT64 and was meant to be a complete remake of the original game for the Nintendo 64 with both 2D and 3D playing modes, but it was eventually reworked from scratch.

On September 6, 2004, the project was publicly closed after Resurrection Games received a cease-and-desist letter from Square Enix for trademark and copyright infringement.

name: Chimeras: Heavenfall Secrets Collector's Edition
summary: Astrid and Greta are the best of friends, but when she goes missing during the semester break at their magical school, Astrid needs your help as a detective to find her. As you dig deeper, you'll discover she's not the only student to vanish in these hallowed halls.

name: Church
summary: Sequel of We're All Dead Here

name: Chaos
summary: The life that we knew has changed, The Chaos took control of the streets. Experience a post-apocalyptic world where your survival skills are crucial.

name: Chez Croggy
summary: Chef Croggy, AKA Croggster, AKA Croggison, is on the trip of a lifetime! Get ready for a gruesome, and rage inducing experience as you run, jump, and push your way through the wacky physics and camera angles Chez Croggy has to offer.

name: Chromaticasters
summary: Chromaticasters is a chaotically cute co-op dungeon crawler where you and up to 3 friends play as unique spell-slinging animals! Combine elemental magic with your friends to crush hordes of enemies, traverse dangerous environments, and strengthen your spells in this action-packed roguelike!

name: Chocolate Confession
summary:
Take the place of the protagonist Kaori and live two love triangles between your friends Darius and Cloud and a confession in between!

Chocolate Confession
St. Valentine is coming, and your heart starts to beat differently for one of your firends... You want to seize this day and confess and that everything will be perfect. But... Are things really going to be as you planned? Or would they be even better?

Chocolate Confession Christmas Special
It saddens you to learn this will be the first Christmas you won't spend together with your childhood friends Darius and Cloud. But one of them left a mysterious invitation to spend that day together. And it dosen't sound it's just as friends... Which one of them do you wish it was?

name: Chain Reaction
summary: Create your own custom chain reactions from scratch or try and explore a variety of set challenges.

name: Chinese Pope Door
summary: This is a role-playing game where the player can fight freely with the enemies. You can run and jump freely, use sword and dart to attack the enemies, and special attack to give the enemies a heavy blow. If you like Super Mario's style of operation, you must try this game.

name: Charon's Crossing
summary: A mythological arcade-style game where you navigate Charon through the rivers of the Underworld. Dodge obstacles, confront adversaries, and strategize with Hermes' power-ups. Delve into a pixel-art world inspired by ancient legends.

name: Chase H.Q.
summary: As an undercover agent of Chase Headquarters, your job is to patrol the streets and track down five criminals. You are given a mission briefing before you start which gives information on the suspect and what car they drive. Then you drive across the city without crashing into other cars, and catch up with the criminal's car. To arrest the suspects, you must keep bumping into their car until it is no longer functional. And you have to do this under a strict time limit. You can't afford to crash into cars or buildings or you waste time getting on the road again.

name: Chase H.Q.
summary: As an undercover agent of Chase Headquarters, your job is to patrol the streets and track down five criminals. You are given a mission briefing before you start which gives information on the suspect and what car they drive. Then you drive across the city without crashing into other cars, and catch up with the criminal's car. To arrest the suspects, you must keep bumping into their car until it is no longer functional. And you have to do this under a strict time limit. You can't afford to crash into cars or buildings or you waste time getting on the road again.

And you have to do this under a strict time limit. You can't afford to crash into cars or buildings or you waste time getting on the road again.

You are given a mission briefing before you start which gives information on the suspect and what car they drive. Then you drive across the city without crashing into other cars, and catch up with the criminal's car. To arrest the suspects, you must keep bumping into their car until it is no longer functional. And you have to do this under a strict time limit. You can't afford to crash into cars or buildings or you waste time getting on the road again.

name: Chase H.Q.
summary: As an undercover agent of Chase Headquarters, your job is to patrol the streets and track down five criminals. You are given a mission briefing before you start which gives information on the suspect and what car they drive. Then you drive across the city without crashing into other cars, and catch up with the criminal's car. To arrest the suspects, you must keep bumping into their car until it is no longer functional. And you have to do this under a strict time limit. You can't afford to crash into cars or buildings or you waste time getting on the road again.

name: Choujin Sentai Jetman
summary:
Two years have passed since the Jetman triumphed over the evil Vyram faction and saved the Earth. Humanity has flourished again, but peace is fragile, however, one night that peace was destroyed. A remnant of Vyram, hidden in the darkest corners of the universe, has returned to Earth. Renegades and resentful, this group has developed powerful mechanical giants that are wreaking havoc on humanity. They have issued a chilling ultimatum: if the sun goes down, the giants will devastate the world and there will be no hope.​

Faced with this desperate situation, the Choujin Sentai Jetman are forced to meet again to face the greatest threat they have ever known.

name: Chital's Mini Adventure
summary: Small Indie Platformer that started a Game Jam entry in 2022, now polished a little and released! A Single-Level game where you must collect Jewels and defeat a Boss!

name: Chained Together
summary: From the depths of hell, climb chained to your friends through diverse worlds. Solo or co-op, try to reach the summit and discover what awaits you there...

name: Chaos Crafters
summary: Learn, craft and test spells on any element of the game! Solve puzzles or fight enemies alone or in co-op. Be careful, your friends are not immune to your magic and one wrong move could cause total chaos.

name: Chernobyl Again
summary: Chernobyl Again is an adventure game adjusted for Virtual Reality headsets for a more immersive and engaging experience level. The story full of challenges and turbulence will let the players transform into a character trying to save the Chernobyl Nuclear Power Plant.

name: Charles Haunted Mansion
summary: Charles Haunted Mansion is a 2D Top-Down Survival Horror game based on the story of a mansion, haunted by the vengeful spirit of a woman who was murdered inside the mansion decades ago.

name: Chroma Wars
summary: A retro, turn-based strategy game on a square-map where you engage in techno-fantasy warfare! Command magical armies, repel abyssal foes, and conquer the world in high-skill strategic battles.

name: Charade Maniacs: Limited Edition
summary:
Limited edition of Charade Maniacs. Comes with:
- Charade Maniacs game
- Award Booklet
= Drama CD "Find the Memories!"

name: Chilla's Art: The Kidnap
summary: The Kidnap is a Japanese horror game about a kidnapping incident.

name: Champion of Fighters
summary: Get ready to unleash your inner warrior and secure your place among the legends!

name: Chapter Zero: The Angel Island Saga
summary: The world is a chaotic, terrifying place, rife with all manner of monsters, warlords and hostile architecture. Even for the mighty Pachacamac clan, just the act of survival is a day to day struggle, and everybody seems to know that they can't keep it up forever. In pursuit of a safe home, a lone shaman named Ichima happens apon the Special Stage - and with it, a means of realizing their dreams of safety and peace...

name: Chieri no Doki*Doki Yukemuri Burai Tabi
summary: Chieri no Doki*Doki Yukemuri Burai Tabi is an Action game, developed and published by dy, which was released in 2010.

name: Chiyo
summary: Chiyo is a first-person hardcore escape room horror game set in Japan's Edo era. As Idate Chiyo, a paranormal investigator possessing supernatural abilities, you are tasked with investigating an abandoned mansion and unveiling a family's dark history and it's ultimate secret.

name: Chuzzle Snap
summary:
The Chuzzles are back, with a twist!

Snap and match colorful Chuzzles and watch them shiver and explode with happiness! It's easy to learn, easy to play, but hard to master! Collect trophies to show off your skill, and coins to buy up pet Chuzzles and their toys!

If you've enjoyed Chuzzle or Chuzzle 2, you'll definitely enjoy this game-- it's a snap!

name: Chordosis
summary: Chordosis invites you to experience a unique cosmic survival sci-fi horror game centered around alien abductions. Immerse yourself in the small village of Dunahont, Hungary, and uncover its chilling mysteries.

name: Chill Seekers
summary: Slide your penguins to safety in this relaxing puzzle game.

name: Chitei Senki
summary: Chitei Senki is an Action game, developed by Sprite and published by Msd-Japan, which was released in Japan in 1998.

name: Chambered Fate
summary:
Chambered Fate is a role reversal of the shooter genre. Instead of shooting enemies, you take control of the bullet fired from the gun and steer its trajectory into your enemies. Use your environment to your advantage and try to eliminate all enemies with as few bullets as possible. Your fate has been chambered, prepare to be fired.
Submission in the GMTK Game Jam 2023

name: Chaos Metaverse
summary: free, there will dance, will send skills of beauty and hero butler, there is a character special effects system, there is a dressing system, skin system, and MMO-style shooting, lobby chat, friends system, equipment system, props system, leaderboard system, view the results

name: Challenge Tour
summary: This is a casual little game!

name: Chain Drop
summary: A fast-paced puzzle game for match lovers

name: Chain
summary: Chain is an open world 2d action adventure game inspired by the gameboy era. you will have to explore a vast island with different biomes in search of the seven magical petals, but be careful, the island is under a curse that mixes all the items inside the chests.

name: Choice Clash: What Would You Rather?
summary: Experience a world of choices in this ultimate decision-making game with 300 mind-bending dilemmas. Your path, your destiny awaits! And You What Would You Rather? Be invisible for a day or Be able to fly for a day? Your Choice matter!

name: Chelsea Club Football
summary:
Club Football is a soccer series designed to re-create the individual team experience. A total of 17 games released in the Club Football series are tailored to the specific European teams on which they are based, including character facial mapping from each of the 22 position players on the roster.

Each game features bespoke content - including media archive clips of great goals and famous victories - and allows fans to add themselves to the 2003/04 starting line-up of their favourite side.

name: Chelsea Club Football 2005
summary: The follow-up edition to Codemasters' multi-title soccer franchise (each dedicated to a single team in the UK and continental European football league and featuring unique presentation and other team-specific aspects), the 2005 series is powered by an accelerated game engine and new animation system to deliver faster and more responsive gameplay for precise control on the pitch. With twice the amount of official team content in each game, great skill moves and new game modes including Career, Practice and classic Scenarios (plus new clubs added to the line-up), the new Club Football 2005 range will bring players even closer to the heart of the action and the heart of their team.

name: Chango
summary: A Mystery. Someone is killing everyone. They talk about Chango. Will you be able to solve the mystery?

name: Chou Kowai Hanashi DS: Ao no Shou
summary: The developer Alchemist gathers together a total of 63 scary stories and bulks them up into visual novels filled with images, sound effects, and narration from Akira Hirayama.

name: Chalice of Souls: Grahan
summary: Embark on a thrilling journey with Baani, a college student with a tribal background attempting to uncover the secrets of her ancestors. When her friend Sarah is kidnapped by a murderous cult obsessed with immortality,she must confront her own sanity & fight to rescue her friend before it's too late

name: Chick-Chick
summary: You play as chickens who have to survive on unstable platforms in various universes of the chicken coop, will you be able to keep the balance and hold on, compete with friends and beat the record!

name: Chuxen
summary: Hexen replacement hub (6 levels) designed for single player.

name: Chasmal Fear
summary: Chasmal Fear is a next-gen FPS action horror game built in Unreal Engine 5 from the perspective of a body camera. Manage limited resources, make smart choices which affect your playthrough and survive monsters that mutate to get stronger. Played as singleplayer or Co-Op with 2 players.

name: Chill of Death's: Breath
summary: "Step into the world of the mafia with Chill of Death's: Breath, delve into the depths of the underworld. Immerse yourself in the shadows of crime, prove your presence amidst intrigue and desire. Embark on a journey where you can create an impact and leave a lasting impression."

name: Chase Chase Jokers
summary: Chase Chase Jokers is a video game developed by Konami and released on arcade platforms on December 21, 2022 in Japan.

name: Chunithm Sun Plus
summary: An expanded version of Chunithm Sun.

name: Championship Manager
summary: Eidos, one of the world's leading publishers and developers of entertainment software, announces a Sony PSP version of Championship Manager. Developed by Gusto Games, Championship Manager PSP is a fully portable version of the best known football management simulation, and also boasts a wealth of new features. Dealing with everything from transfers to training, tactics to tabloids, championship Manager is the closest you'll get to real-life football.

name: Chou Meisaku Suiri Adventure DS: Raymond Chandler Gensaku - Saraba Itoshiki Hito yo
summary: This DS game is a visual novel game adaptation of "Farewell, My Lovely" detective novel written by Raymond Chandler which spanned several movie adaptations. This time, the player takes on the role of Philip Marlowe, private investigator. While on a case, a big guy called Moose Malloy enter the bar looking for his old flame, Velma Valento. Marlowe steps in to calm down the big guy and hears his story. Seems he's been in prison for 8 years and Velma wasn't interested in waiting. Marlowe reluctantly offers his help if Moose promises to calm down and not do anything rash in the meantime. Expecting a quick conclusion, the great P.I. finds himself entangled in Velma's drama filled with intrigues and deceptions.

name: Chikyuu no Arukikata DS: Shanghai, Hangzhou, Suzhou '07-'08
Chi's Sweet Home: Chi ga Ouchi ni Yatte Kita!
summary: A pet simulation game based on the anime Chi's Sweet Home.

name: Chou Gekijouban Keroro Gunsou 3: Tenkuu Daibouken de Arimasu!
Chikyuu no Arukikata DS: Italia '07-'08: Roma, Milano, Firenze, Venezia
Chikyuu no Arukikata DS: Hawaii '07-'08: Oahu-tou
Chikyuu no Arukikata DS: Hong Kong '07-'08
Chikyuu no Arukikata DS: New York '07-'08
Chikyuu no Arukikata DS: Seoul, Busan '07-'08
Champiyon Pinball
summary: Plug and play with specialized controls.

name: Chickens in Choppers
summary: A shooter game for the Uzebox.

name: Chained Cucumber
summary: Chained bean is action game with little bit of horror element , where your enemy is very bouncy.

name: Checkout Blitz: The Shopping Dead
summary: An arcade roguelite where you complete shopping lists during a zombie apocalypse. Solo, co-op, or versus — bash your way through randomized stores with power-ups, classes, and chaos.

name: Chin Chinny Chin Mouse Cheese Chin Toes
summary: Embark on a toe-tally awesome adventure as a relentless little mouse with a big appetite for nibbling toes. Explore a world spiraling into absurdity as you nibble your way through various states of societal collapse. Toe the line of hilarity and insanity!

name: Chainmap Chaos
summary: Four chainmaps by various authors, each one following a Honey, Zendar, Egyptian and Knave theme.

name: Chain Crisis
