summary: Chain Crisis: An immersive cyberpunk MMORPG set in a futuristic world. Experience thrilling battles, powerful abilities, and an engaging storyline. Uncover the secrets of a dystopian society and forge your destiny. Join the revolution on Solana! #MMORPG #Cyberpunk

name: Chthonic Deities
summary: Large Knave-textured underground lava fortress. It is based on the Progs_dump mod (included) and comes with a few new models, sounds, and a custom music track. The map and qc sources are included.

name: Chaotic Trinity
summary: Around medium-sized level using developer textures; a test map for AD's Chaos mode. The map source and the texture wad are included.

name: Chunky Tomato
summary: Chunky Tomato is a platform game in which you'll help a tomato, fortunately equipped with legs, to escape from a chunky tomato factory. All you have to do is cross the road. But watch out for the cars!

name: Children of the Forest
summary: Iki and Tika live deep within a mysterious forest. Follow their enchanting journey as they find themselves amidst an imminent new threat. Children of the Forest is a story-driven adventure game about two siblings venturing through a land filled with extraordinary remnants from an ancient past.

name: Chessium: 3D Chess Battle
summary: Chessium offers 3D Chess experience where people can play chess and feel themselves in the middle of war!

name: Chinatown
summary: Those evil aliens are in Chinatown, so kill them

name: Chester The Chest
summary: Play as an animated chest named Chester, embracing the captivating atmosphere and breathtaking scenery as you guide him on his journey. Play around solving simple puzzles and uncover cool objects and secrets.

name: Champion of Andia
summary: CoA is an Action RPG Wave Progression game. Create a character and fight progressively harder waves of enemies in a directional based combat system. As you complete missions - you earn experience and gold to buy better armor and weapons. Play solo, cooperatively or PVP!

name: Chrono Commando 2053
summary: "Chrono Commando 2053" offers an exciting gaming experience that combines time travel and military action. Led by Ömer Halis, a special unit ventures through the depths of time to fight for the salvation of humanity. Players witness pivotal moments in history and wield the power to manipulate history to save the world.

name: Chess Housers
summary: Updated release published in 1993 which added VGA suppport.

name: Chapter Wars
summary: Immerse yourself in thrilling first-person shooter battles across three unique maps. Confront rival clans, adapt to hostile locals, and face off against relentless alien creatures. Join the eternal struggle for dominance and choose your side in this action-packed battle for supremacy!

name: Chicken Done
summary: The more stressful anti-stress game that eleven out of ten psychologists advice against. Dangerously addictive for neurodivergent people.

name: Chess Exerciser
summary: Become a better chess player with learning by repetition. Exercise from 3.000+ opening lines and discover their best continuation. Learn tactics from millions of puzzles split into 38 categories and 11 difficulty levels. Master 18.000+ endgame positions sorted by category and difficulty.

name: Champions of Avan
summary:
The fate of Avan is yours to write.

From small acorns great oaks grow. In this idle miner game you start with a small and humble village, tucked away in a shadowy corner of the land of Rokmyer, and are tasked with building it up into a grand and prosperous city deserving of a place of pride on both the map of the land and in the pages of history books.

name: ChampionsTCG
summary: Play Champions of Otherwordly Magic, a fast-paced and simple turn-based trading card game feature cute and adorable Champions that you can own, buy, sell and trade with other gamers!

name: Cheogsh 2
summary: Cheogsh 2 is Doom II episode created by Shadowman and Guest that was released on November 19, 2009. A sequel to 2007's Cheogsh, it contains seven maps and requires the GZDoom source port to play. Much like its predecessor, Cheogsh 2 has a gothic theme and is largely set in a series of demonic towns and fortresses, containing many advanced effects and, new graphics and new custom enemies.

name: Chess Quarto
summary: Chess Quarto is a video game published in 1997 on Commodore 64 by Carl Bevington and Loadstar.

name: Chasing Chickens
summary: CHASING CHICKENS is where Quake's adrenaline meets Pac-Man's wit. Dive into 3D chaos with old-school charm: exploding beachballs, an army of killer chickens, floating cows, all in a hedge maze. Armed with a high-powered grenade launcher, it's a wild race. Outsmart, outrun, outplay. Ready, soldier?

name: Check and Slash
summary: Check and Slash combines the action and combat of a hack-and-slash game with the movement patterns of chess pieces. Find your way through a maze of boards, slash your enemies, dodge attacks, rescue black pieces to receive upgrades, and fight against formidable opponents until you find the enemy king.

name: Chinese Ancient Poetry Matching Game
summary: This game is a classic tile-matching game. Players can match tiles by clicking on the corresponding tiles in the order of Chinese ancient poetry, lyrics, and prose to pass levels. Through this game, players can experience the charm of traditional Chinese culture.

name: Choose Your Cutie
summary: The girls are ready to meet you! Each of them is special. Choose your cutie!

name: Chopter Copter
summary: Chopter 'til you dropter!

name: Chuck Rock
summary: Chuck Rock is a side-scrolling platformer set in a comical Stone Age world. Players control Chuck, a beer-loving caveman who must rescue his kidnapped wife from the village oddball. Armed with his signature belly-buster attack and jump kick, Chuck battles an array of dinosaurs and prehistoric creatures across various levels. The game features a unique mechanic where Chuck can pick up and throw rocks to defeat enemies and reach higher platforms, adding a puzzle element to the platforming action. With its humorous tone and prehistoric setting, Chuck Rock offers a lighthearted and entertaining twist on the classic platformer genre.

name: Chess for Idiots
summary: Chess for idiots - a discipline of intellectual sport, invented and initiated by Ozjasz Goldberg. Seemingly chess for idiots resembles regular chess. The game is played on the same board using the same pieces. However, this is where the similarities end, because everything that would discriminate intellectually against players was eliminated from the rules. Therefore, there are practically no rules, and players can make any move with any pieces and capture any number of opponent's pieces. The victory is determined by the IQ (the lower, the greater the chances of winning) and the decision of Ozjasz Goldberg.

name: Changdong's Bikini Adventure
summary: Adventure of finding a bikini with Changdong! Enjoy fun games with online update technology combined with the latest 3D graphics!

name: Chimeras: Price of Greed - Collector's Edition
summary: People are disappearing left and right in the Carrington Mansion. But who's behind it, how are they doing it, and most importantly, what are they hiding?

name: Chamberflame
summary: Action-roguelite shooter. Each run is different from the last, with unique weapons, upgrade artifacts, enemies, and procedurally generated areas.

name: Cheesecake Cult: Unholy Feast
summary: "In this spine-chilling adventure, you will delve into the eerie world of a cult that worships a sinister deity through the creation and consumption of blasphemous cheesecakes. As the protagonist, you must navigate through a nightmarish maze of secrets, rituals, and unspeakable horrors to unravel the truth and escape with your sanity intact. Did I mention you are being followed by the cult leader?"

name: Chess For Playdate
summary: Play Chess

name: Chromatic Isle
summary: Discover the peaceful beauty of Chromatic Isle, a 30-minute getaway where music and puzzles unite in the four seasons. Whether you're a seasoned gamer or new to puzzles, this harmonious journey awaits. Unveil the secrets of each season in Chromatic Isle.

name: Chambers: The Outlaw
summary: Step into the Weird Wild West of Chambers: The Outlaw, a thrilling first-person hellyeah-em-up! Explore the open world, conquer vast lands, engage in epic duels, and trade in bustling cities in this action-packed adventure! Chambers: The Outlaw is a prologue ver. of the game Chambers.

name: Chikn Nuggit Nightmare Fwiends
summary: You're now dreaming of your worst nightmare, that Chikn Nuggit and his fwiends are gonna kill you! You have to collect all the 10 Chicken Nuggets and then get out of this maze!

name: Chrono Bullet
summary: Co-op bullet hell. Chrono Bullet is unique game with a choice of character class. A beautiful and colourful picture in an atmospheric world. Help the heroes to save their world by defeating unusual bosses.

name: Chicken Attack Deluxe
summary: She's back! The crazy chicken from "Chicken's Revenge" is back on the warpath with vengeance. Defending her chicks in this "Magic Ball" style game, this mama bird won't put up with any fowl play when she's defending her brood. Non-stop action will put your reflexes to the test as you battle to save the little chicks! Prove your skills as you team up with our heroic hen to defeat a world of crazy guys and evil beasts!

name: Channel 3
summary: Tobias is bored at home, watching TV. Though he's about to have a very unique day...

name: Chaperone
summary: Chaperone is a first-person psychological horror game. The events are completely real. Supernatural events taking place in an atmospheric and constricting closed house, events of unknown cause. You can enjoy being scared to the fullest.

name: Chinese Culinary Shop
summary: Chinese Culinary Shop "is a traditional Chinese food simulation cooking game. In the game, players can play the role of a talented Chinese food chef, experiencing the production process of traditional Chinese cuisine firsthand, gradually transforming your small inn into a renowned food paradise.

name: Chicken vs. Eggs
summary:
Aim and shoot game with an angry rooster in the main role.

Play the role of an angry bodybuilding rooster and collect all yolks from the super eggs to become an arm wrestling champion.

name: Chicken Run: Eggstraction
summary: Stealth, silliness, and a whole lot of chaos! Scurry and scramble your way to freedom in this co-op adventure set in the Chicken Run universe.

name: Chronical
summary: The power is at your fingertips! Take control of a powerful Chronomancer in this mysterious puzzle-platformer. Explore the Chronical school to discover its secrets and learn new spells. Can you save all of the professors and reveal the mystery of the Time Loop?

name: Chrono Mirror
summary: Bend time and space in this story-driven 2D platformer with branching story paths and converging timelines! Heavily inspired by the Mega Man Zero Series and Azure Striker Gunvolt Series.

name: Christmas Runner
summary: "Christmas Runner - Rocket Boot Adventure" is an exciting Christmas-themed parkour game where players become a rocket boot runner, navigating diverse terrains, overcoming various obstacles, and pushing their limits.

name: Christmas Rocket Pudding
summary: A fast-paced 3D platform game. Skillfully control the speed of your pudding to beat the levels fast while avoiding pitfalls!

name: Chicocos S.A.
summary:
Chicocos S.A. is a limit-removing map (complevel 2) set in a shipping/receiving office, featuring a non-linear layout with multiple paths to get to your goal.

Clear out all the buildings and pick up all 3 keys to get into the boss arena: the theater hall...!! (which, fun fact, is a recreation of the actual theater hall where the graduation ceremony will take place!). This is a commemorative map for my highschool graduation.

name: Cheyenne Mountain Complex
summary: Large underground base map with some Quake2 textures.

name: Christmas Nightmare
summary: Christmas Nightmare is an atmospheric horror game about New Year's Eve.

name: Charrua Soccer: Pro Edition
summary: Charrua Soccer is an arcade that brings you the most fun part of soccer! Play friendly matches, tournaments or create your team and lead it to glory in career mode!

name: Chimp Quest: Spirit Isle
summary: Swing into a heartwarming tale in Chimp Quest: Spirit Isle.

name: Chess
summary: Enjoy a completely new way to bowl. Try to make all the pins fall and compete against other players.

name: Champion Road
summary: Champion Road immerses you in a dynamic fusion of classic beat 'em up intensity and entertaining platform challenges. Join six formidable fighters in a nostalgic 90s-style tournament arena. Unleash your skills, relive arcade gaming's golden era, and emerge as the ultimate champion!

name: Chrysolite
summary:
A strange knight sat in front of a fire, darkness surrounding him. His sword stuck in the ground, covered in dried blood. He warns you against going any further, but the intrigue of what lies beyond far surpasses the instinct of self preservation.

Play as a young thief and explore the dangerous ruins of a once-prosperous kingdom. Fight against hordes of terrifying monsters, make your way through challenging platforming sections and discover the secret that lies at the very bottom of the ruins in this handcrafted experience.

Chrysolite is a narrative driven, pixel-art, 2D platformer with Soulslike inspirations.

name: Chutney: Space Survivor
summary: Chutney: Space Survivor is a third person, hoard-shooting deck builder where you play as Chutney, shooting down hordes of enemies with his Omni-gun. Alter your attacks by collecting different cartridges and create unique synergies!

name: Christmas Clash
summary: Help Santa claus and his christmas elfs to stop the angry babies, toddlers, and kids. Use strategy and management to secure the road to the workshop.

name: Champion of Venus: Tayla's Big Adventure
summary: Join Tayla on her biggest, bustiest adventure so far! Unravel a conspiracy of gods and monsters, square off with the most lustful Champions in existence, and uncover the stadium's mysteries!Like, totally!

name: Chasm Crawl
summary: Chasm Crawl is a first person action adventure game, filled with dangerous dungeons and even strange monsters. A mist in The Land of Monsters has turned its inhabitants into hostile creatures that will attack on-site. Level up and maintain resources to discover what lies in The Chasm.

name: Chico and the Magic Orchards DX
summary: Solve puzzles by rolling a giant walnut in this retro-handheld-inspired adventure. Explore a variety of levels each with unique mechanics. Help Chico build his winter stash and get home!

name: ChiroTerra
summary: Enter the rocky depths of an unmarked cave. Fight for survival and escape with only the gear and supplies you choose to bring. Every item has its advantages and disadvantages, so choose carefully. Once you've entered the cave, there's no turning back.

name: Champions
summary: Dark Fantasy RTS with a tech tree determined by choices in the campaign. Learn the counter play and manage army compositions to challenge the campaign.

name: ChocoLot!
summary: A little game that was originally intended for Valentine's Day, but you can play it any time you wish!

name: Christmas Yarn 2
summary: Soak in the match-3 magic and holiday cheer with Christmas Yarn 2! Play enchanting puzzles, decorate your Christmas tree with trophies, and have a jolly good time!

name: Choo Choo Crossing
summary: I'm crossin here!

name: Cheetahmen II: Bugfixed Version
summary: An improvement mod for Cheetahmen II that fixes most major glitches in the game, including allowing access to the final levels of the game after the level 3 boss.

name: Christmas Puzzle 4
summary: Blast through match-3 puzzles and restore beautiful town in Winterland. Build a cozy little cottage on the hill and a cookie factory, fire up the oven and get baking! Welcome visitors to your town and complete dozens of quests. Winter has tons of fun in stock.

name: Chokkan Asonde Rilakkuma
summary: A Nintendo DS game with Rilakkuma.

name: Christmas Wonderland Collectors Edition
summary: A relaxing hidden object game for the festive season.

name: Christmas Adventure
summary: Welcome to the Christmas adventure. In this game you have to guess the girls' outfit for Christmas celebration. If you get it right, you are in for a naughty Christmas night.

name: Christmas Girls
summary: It's Christmas time! Everyone is looking forward to it, including our girls! They have already put on their Christmas hats, so they are ready!

name: Christmas Wonderland 14: Collector's Edition
summary: Enjoy an exciting Christmas Wonderland and Happy Holidays in Springfield. Help Santa at his North Pole Workshops. Fly in his brand New Sleigh. Visit Santa's Amazing Virtual Reality Grotto. Take part making a Movie.

name: Chanye's Home
summary: Lam ChoTung, who runs a maid cafe in Shenzhen, discovered a girl sitting unconscious on the ground at the storefront as she prepared to return home from the shop. This girl not only had unclear consciousness but was also dressed in peculiar maid attire. This is a love story about these two girls.

name: Christmas Puzzle 5
summary: Complete matching puzzle levels and create a gingerbread Hansel and Gretel decoration. Tackle a series of quests from cleaning cookie crumbs to creating a gingerbread house, a castle and a chocolate factory. Get ready for a heartwarming conclusion as the characters find their way home.

name: Charrua Soccer: Mirror Edition
summary: With lots of action and adrenaline, Charrua Soccer is an arcade game that brings you only the most fun part of soccer! And now in this "Mirror Online" edition, we invite everyone to play online in a different and very original way!

name: Christmas Fables: The Magic Snowflake - Collector's Edition
summary: A magical snowflake of infinite power is lost, but not hope or holiday spirit! Save Christmas and rescue the dangerous artifact from the hands of a small troublemaker!

name: Chordata
summary: Help a salamander book therapy so she can stop compulsively ripping her limbs off

name: Christmas Bubble Puzzle
summary: Dive into the festive world of "Christmas Bubble Puzzle," a delightful and captivating game that blends the excitement of bubble-popping challenges with the joy of the holiday season.

name: Chat Guess Games
summary:
Chat Guess Games is a community game for Twitch Streamers. A game for your community to battle it out and see who truly knows the most about video games!

Screenshots, artwork, genres, release year and more are displayed on screen and chat races to guess the correct game first!

name: Christmas Horse 4
summary: ESCAPE CAPTIVITY. You wake up in the Elves' HQ. What dangers and secrets will you find during your escape?

name: Charon's Sabbath
summary:
Upon death in the world of Charon's Sabbath, souls leave behind their physical bodies, immediately venture to the spiritual realm, and fuse with a sentient cluster of spiritual energy, called the Soulmother. However, when the Soulmother is suddenly dormant, the souls of the dead have nowhere to go and are left behind in the world of the living, unable to find peace, becoming lost.

These lost souls are completely cut off from interacting with the living. The boundary between the dead and the living is so extreme, the dead will perceive any spoken, written, or non-verbal language of the living as unintelligible. Lost souls are doomed to continuously relive their death through their memory. The vast majority of them descend to wrathful madness and insatiable hunger due to this hellish fate.

You play as Munica, the soul of a young girl, tasked by the weak Soulmother to gather the last of the lost souls that have yet to be tainted and help them find peace.

Sever the never-ending cycle of suffering, and realize salvation.

name: Chew Chew Mimic
summary:
Play as a hungry mimic in this head-scratching puzzle game where you have to guide unsuspecting knights to their doom.

Lay down traps to get all the knights to the mimic and try to collect each level’s 3 coins for an extra challenge.

name: Cherry Tower
summary: Enter the world of Cherry Tower, a charming 2D pixel platformer that will take you on a sweet adventure unlike any other! Join Cherry on her small adventure climbing tower to return home and maybe even more. Overcome obstacles and traps to achieve your goals.

name: Chili Time
summary: Short flash game chili eating contest made popular by the famous Jerma.

name: Choujiku Yousai Macross
summary:
Gameplay consists of two modes, a vertical shooting part and an action part.

In the shooting part, the VF-1S (Fighter Mode) has to navigate through waves of Regults with a Thuverl-Salan moving back and forth at the top of the screen. After some time, the ship will temporarily open up and start flashing, signaling that it can be infiltrated. If the player fails to enter within the allotted period, the shooting part will continue until it occurs once again.

Upon successful entry, the VF-1S shifts to Battroid Mode and the action part begins. The Thuverl-Salan's interior consists of two maze-like corridor screens with Glaugs patrolling the area. The objective is to reach the ship's core in the second screen and destroy it. After doing so, the BGM will be superimposed by an alarm signal and a 100-second countdown will start. The VF-1S must escape before the Thuverl-Salan explodes. The Glaugs in the first screen will respawn, making things difficult.

The game will then cycle back to the shooting part and go in the same looping sequence until all VF-1S units are lost.

name: Checkpoint Gary
summary: Checkpoint Gary features a new world space where the player can work as a mercenary, fighting waves of various attackers in the process. In truth, I developed this to cope with the burgeoning madness that comes with waiting for Fallout 4. Perhaps the infinite content offered by this mod will help you as well.

name: Chunithm Luminous
summary: The latest version of Chunithm for 2023.

name: Chāoshí Kōng zhī Lún
summary: Shi Kong Zhi Lun, also known as Chrono Trigger, is a Chinese unlicensed demake of Square's Chrono Trigger made by Shenzhen Nanjing Technology. It makes use of the same engine as Shenzhen's other RPGs, though it attempts to incorporate the active battle system of the original game. Much content was cut to fit what could be fit onto the cartridge, and the game still does not continue past the battle with Magus, who is nearly impossible to defeat.

name: Cheesy Trials
summary:
A devilish platform game for the 24K expanded Vic 20.

There are three experiments to complete, select one to play using the function keys (F1, F3, F5) or the action buttons on TheVic20's 'TheJoystick'. Can press these keys / buttons at any time to switch experiments without losing your progress.

The experiment main rooms reveal doorways to the trial rooms. Initially in each experiment you will see just the first trial room. Complete it to reveal more,

Control Echo the Mouse with a joystick and learn his abilities as you go. Hint, it is best to start with Experiment 1.

To beat a trial room collect a piece of cheese before the time runs out. You only have 5 seconds to do this between each cheese and more of the room is revealed. Sometimes there will be more than one cheese and your choice can drastically affect the room.

You have infinite clones but must be successful to proceed. If a trial room in one experiment is proving to be too challenging, jump over to one of the other experiments instead.

Complete the trials in all three experiments to win Echo's freedom.

name: Chico Bento: A Fuga das Galinhas
Chambers
summary: Equipped with cunning and agility, you must navigate through a series of intricate chambers filled with traps, deadly adversaries, hidden chambers and mind-bending puzzles. Your quest? to reclaim the gold that was stolen from you!

name: Chairs
summary: A fast-paced action platformer doubling as the most realistic chair simulator money can buy! Have you ever wondered what your chair thinks? What it believes? What it desires? Learn the answers and destroy some dimensions along the way!

name: Chaos Adventure
summary: Is there a back story? No... The adventure is yours to make! Pick a character, and you are dropped into the fantasy middle ages to start your journey! This game is designed for you to quickly jump right into it and begin hacking and slashing your way through!

name: Charles: The Full Story
summary: Expand 'Charles the Bee' with this DLC! Dive into new marsh and mountain areas, adding 6 extra dance battles and story content. Test your skills in the arcade's triple-threat mode with back-to-back battles. It's a buzzing adventure!

name: Chase Ace Sole Survivor
summary: Chase Ace Sole Survivor is a skill-based top-down action arcade space shooter with survivor & roguelite elements. Fight off aggressive alien invaders. Put guns, items, skills and strategy to the test. Survive and rid The Planetary Shield of the alien infestation.

name: Chick Road Rage
summary: ChickRoadRage is a Top Down game where the player controls a bunch of chickens one at a time, moving them across the road, floating on logs, and dodging cars

name: Chime Candy
summary: Chime Candy is an interactive musical puzzle game that combines the joy of music and learning by guiding fish to their note slots to learn how to read sheet music and various melodies.

name: Choc N Roll
summary: It's time to get the ball rolling, but slow down! Be careful what you roll yourself into because too much chocolate can be harmful to you! Prepare to wind down and melt away as you enter the sweet world of Choc N Roll!

name: Chocolatio
summary: Create and build your own automated chocolate factory. Freely design and expand your factories to deliver a huge variety of chocolate themed resources.

name: Chess
summary: An early computer iteration of Chess for Windows, released as part of Microsoft Entertainment Pack 4.

name: Chip's Challenge
summary: The Microsoft Windows port of Chip's Challenge is a top-down tile-based puzzle video game based on the 1989 Atari Lynx original. It includes 149 levels (one more than the original's 148). It was included in the Windows 3.1 bundle Microsoft Entertainment Pack 4 in 1992, and the Windows version of the Best of Microsoft Entertainment Pack in 1995, where it found a much larger audience.

name: Chakan
summary:
A Game Gear port of Chankan: The Forever Man for the Sega Megadrive/Genesis.
The game featured an uncommonly dark premise for the time of its release, which saw the home console market flooded with licensed platformers based on family-friendly media.

It is based upon a comic book by Robert A. Kraus and was produced by Ed Annunziata, who met Chakan's creator at a convention and was impressed.

name: Chip's Challenge
summary: The Amstrad CPC port of Chip's Challenge, originally for the Atari Lynx.

name: Chip's Challenge
summary: The Commodore 64 port of Chip's Challenge, originally for the Atari Lynx.

name: Chip's Challenge
summary: The ZX Spectrum port of Chip's Challenge, originally for the Atari Lynx.

name: Chip's Challenge
summary:
The cancelled NES port of Chip's Challenge, originally for the Atari Lynx. A build, labeled as "V0.924B" on the title screen, was released by Lost Levels on November 13, 2015.

The normal level sequence contains only 132 levels (one exclusive to the NES port), plus 4 secret levels. That leaves 13 levels from the original game inaccessible.

Entering the password HARD takes the player to Forced Entry, from which they can access the other removed levels: Blobnet, Mishmesh, Scavenger Hunt, On the Rocks, Slo Mo, Cityblock, Colony, Icehouse, Block N Roll, Blobdance, Pain, and Yorkhouse.

name: Chip's Challenge
summary: The homebrew Sega Genesis/Master System port of Chip's Challenge, originally for the Atari Lynx. Does not feature the original music.

name: Chip's Challenge
summary: The homebrew SNES port of Chip's Challenge, originally for the Atari Lynx. Does not feature the original music.

name: Chequered Flag
summary: Chequered Flag is a racing game from Psion Software and published by Sinclair Research in 1983. The first driving game published for the ZX Spectrum, and one of the very first car simulators.

name: Christmas Seaman: Omoi o Tsutaeru Mou Hitotsu no Houhou
summary: A limited-edition demo version of Seaman titled Christmas Seaman was released in Japan on December 16, 1999, and available for only ten days either through the Sega Direct online store or as part of an exclusive red Dreamcast pack-in. The title allowed players to connect to the online servers and exchange Christmas wishes and messages, while a Santa themed Seaman shares some of his trademark "Seaman wisdom".

name: Chess Grandmaster Royal Bundle
summary: Boost your brain with four unique chess and puzzle games that will improve your mood, your problem-solving skills, your memory and your ability to concentrate.

name: Changeable Guardian Estique
summary:
An original side-scrolling shoot 'em up game for Nintendo Entertainment System being developed by Cat Hoi Trading LLC set to release in the Summer of 2024.

The game is set in 5 world cities and space, for a total of 6 stages. The moderate difficulty and play time, as well as a large number of visuals, will delight the eyes and minds of the player.

A demo was sold at the Digigame Expo 2023.

name: Chocolate Cage
summary:
This was the last Valentine's Day of my high school life.

I, who had no luck with love, thought Valentine's Day would end uneventfully like it always does, but...

"Everything was going just as I planned."

name: Chase It!
summary:
Chase It is a homebrew Atari 2600 game developed by Alan W. Smith and released in 2010. The game was later included in the Atari Flashback series of plug-and-play consoles, starting with the Atari Flashback 5 in 2014, and most recently in the Atari Flashback X Deluxe in 2019.

In Chase It, two players (or one player and the computer) must move around the arena and touch a red square before their opponent. After this, the red square(s) move to a random location, and the first to touch it 99 times is the winner.

A selection of 20 game modes add variety to the gameplay; including adding a second red square, making the red squares move, adding obstacles to the arena, and changing the speed of the computer opponent.

name: Chakusin Melody Damon
summary: Chakushin Melody Damon is an utility for creating music and sound, and also features a collection of melodies and sounds for using in mobile phones. Release in Japan for PS1.

name: Chibi Maruko-chan: Maru-chan Ame wo Morai ni Iku no Maki
Chimpy Chippa's: The Game
summary: Chimpy Chippa's: The Game is short horror experience that pits the player against the animatronic from the webseries, while serving as a standalone horror game for newcomers. It was created as a 'Thank You' gift to the community support towards the YouTube webseries :)

name: Chemicus II: Die versunkene Stadt
summary: A famous professor disappears during an accident in a chemistry laboratory. As his assistant, it is the player's job to find him and solve the mystery around this accident. The player has to find solutions to puzzles with the help of chemistry. The necessary ingredients are stored in the inventory. The game includes a knowledge base.

name: Cho'Gath Eats the World
summary: An arcade-style smash-'em-up centered around destroying tanks, helicopters, enemy champions, and most importantly buildings in pursuit of the titular goal: eating the world!

name: Christmas Crimes Bundle
summary:
This bundle includes:

- Yuletide Legends: Who Framed Santa Claus
- Crime Secrets: Crimson Lily
- Clockwork Tales: Of Glass and Ink
- Lost Grimoires 2: Shard of Mystery
- Demon Hunter: Riddles of Light
- Demon Hunter: Ascendance

name: Chatter Challenge
summary: "Chatter Challenge" is a GPT-3.5 text adventure game. In just five short minutes, engage in dialogue or actions to interact with unique NPCs, engage in battles, and achieve challenging objectives! Showcase miracles to the Golden Dragon! Defeat the invading demons!

name: Checkers Twist
summary: A turn-based strategy game, Checkers Twist is a variant of the checkers board game, where the board is irregular and procedurally generated, offering new tactics each game.

name: Checkout!
summary: Checkout! is a casual and chaotic couch multiplayer game for 2-4 players. Dive into a wild shopping spree across the multiverse. Race against your friends to complete your shopping list. Whether locally or online via Remote Play Together, mayhem awaits. Can you shop your way to victory?

name: Chefs Together
summary: A coop coking game with light RPG features. Discover new recipes, level up your restaurant, and make sure your customers leave happy in this kitchen game. Best cooking simulator with multiplayer features

name: Chesslike
summary: A new outlook on the classic strategy game, battle your way to winning.

name: Chronicles of Lussaria
summary: Forge through the story of Caynburn and save the country!

name: Children of the Sun
summary: Burning with anger, The girl wages a one-woman war against the cult, taking them down cultist by cultist, bullet by bullet, until she reaches her true target: the leader. Along the way she will unravel the dark truth about this mysterious order and the atrocities committed by them in the name of their master. In this tactical third-person puzzle-shooter you assume control of one bullet, guiding it through increasingly complex and challenging levels to kill cultists, trigger traps, and reshape the environment. Every shot counts and ruthless precision is rewarded. Taking down the cult is deeply satisfying; doing it with style even more so.

name: Chess Twist
summary: A game of chess set on a procedurally generated board, where tiles can have 3 or 5 diagonals and straight lines bend around your opponent's defenses. Same rules, different battlefield. Opportunities for new strategies are hidden in plain sight. Will you see them before your opponent does?

name: Chick'n Mushroom Soup
summary: Chick’n Mushroom Soup is an anime styled Visual Novel which you've been accepted into a culinary academy with sweet girls. Although you were a total asocial in the past, you now have an opportunity to change this.

name: Chompania
summary: A 2D platformer that immerses you into the space adventure of Eddie, stranded on the quirky planet Chompania. It's time to jump, fight, solve, and conquer your way out of this pixelated space jam!

name: Christmas Corp
summary: Christmas is here, and the only way for elves to produce enough gifts in time, is to be micro-managed ! In Christmas Corp, Santa's elves are burnt out, and need to be told what to do every second. The player has to manage each of the elves' schedules so that the toy production goes smoothly.

name: Christmas Rush
summary: Christmas Rush is a racing arcade game in the warm atmosphere of a winter holiday. You drive a car at high speed, trying to avoid obstacles and reach the finish line in a limited time.

name: Chase Me!
summary:
This is a little game for the 2024 NOMAM's BASIC 10-liners Contest. This program fits in the EXTREM-256 category, and it was written using FastBasic 4.6 for the 8-bits ATARI XL/XE computers line

Collect as many coins as you can while being chased by some evil guardians.

name: Christmas Fables: The Magic Snowflake DLC
summary: A magical snowflake has fallen into the hands of a little troublemaker! Save Christmas and find the magic artifact!

name: Christmas Present
summary: Christmas Present is a fun and Christmas game in which you control Santa Claus. You're flying a reindeer-drawn sled across the sky and throwing presents down chimneys. This game is filled with kindness and Christmas spirit, making you enjoy Christmas with Santa.

name: Cherry Bomb
summary: Cherry Bomb is a basic arcade Shoot 'em up game (Shmup) reminiscent of Space Invaders or Galaga. Pilot your red spaceship to blast your way through 9 waves of attacking aliens.

name: Christmas: Dark Side
summary: This Christmas story is not as usual. Yes, there is the Santa Claus, his reindeer and gifts for children. But these are not at all the gifts that a child expects for Christmas. And you can't even imagine what awaits you that night!

name: Christmas Stories: Alice's Adventures - Collector's Edition
summary: You're enjoying your Christmas when the White Rabbit from Wonderland comes to you for help! The Christmas spirit is vanishing all over the world, but why? Come along for a fun adventure and return joy to the world by restoring harmony to the characters of Wonderland!

name: Christmas Spirits: Two Sisters in Feud
summary: Join Esther and Ellie on a heartfelt visual novel Christmas journey! After a fight breaks out, three ghosts unveil their past, present, and future. Solve puzzles, make choices, and help them mend their relationship!

name: Chess 2000
summary: Chess 2000 is a digital recreation of the board game of the same title. The game features commentary, advices, rules explanation and a 2 players vs mode. The game features 3 different pieces colours and boards, 3 different backgrounds and 5 different kind of pointers.

name: Chaos Heroes Online
summary: Chaos Heroes Online is a free to play MOBA known as Chaos Online in the East, inspired by the Chaos mods for DOTA maps in Warcraft. Standard MOBA/DOTA players may find a few differences: items can be purchased anywhere on the map, consumables are critical, instant teleportation, and no wards. CHO encourages grouping up and discourages passive farming, and has a strict 50 minute time limit on matches. Scoring for matches is based on kills, collective team levels, objective completion, and more. CHO also includes questing, from daily objectives to hero quests. Leveling up will also grant you a free hero for three days.

name: Christmas Patchwork Frozen
summary: Down the rabbit hole with Alice's Patchwork!

name: Chapter Wars: Expansion Pack
summary: Chapter Wars Expansion Pack introduces new battlegrounds - Factory and Rural Terrain. Face zombie hordes, screeching mutants, and engage in Battle Royale. Plant the Bomb for swift operations. Unleash the new Flamethrower weapon. The fight for territory intensifies!

name: Chasing Bottaflies
summary: Chasing Bottaflies is a short puzzle-adventure game, featuring the character Fluffle Puff who got lost in a deep forest. To find her way home she will have to capture various "bottaflies", most of which are hidden in secret places that need good observation skills or understanding of various hints to be found. Going through three surprising areas, she will eventually find a bottafly big enough to carry her back... and maybe something else.

name: Chase H.Q. 3D
summary: Originally developed for the arcades in 1988, Chase H.Q. was ported to various consoles such as the Amiga, the Atari ST, the Commodore 64, the Genesis, the Sega Master System, and the TurboGrafx-16. Today, you can enjoy Chase H.Q. on your mobile phone. Go undercover and pursue criminal suspects with the help of your operator, Nancy!

name: Chase
summary: You control a space ship trapped in a forcefield with 3 other players, a missile, and a tracking beacon. Be the last man standing by shooting the beacon, and sticking it onto the other players, so they die in a glorious explosion.

name: Chronicle Survivors
summary: Chronicle Survivors is an Unreal Engine powered gorgeous action roguelike game with difficult, short (5-12 minutes) and meaningful objectives, thoughtful progression, variety of levels, loads of unique mechanic enemies and, of course, grindy epic loot with a continuous development path.

name: Chris's Casino
summary: “Chris’s Casino” is a casino game for the Virtual Boy that includes three games: Roulette, Blackjack and a Slot Machine.

name: Choco-Ken no Omise: Patisserie & Sweets Shop Game
summary: A DS game in the Choco-Ken series.

name: Choco-Ken no Dekitate Sweets Wagon
summary: A DS game in the Choco-Ken series.

name: Chiralmori
summary: This is a fan disc of the Nitro+ Chiral characters, featuring 3 mini games. Various characters from Togainu no Chi and Lamento -Beyond the Void- are included.

name: Chronicles Of Sagrea
summary: Enter the medieval fantasy world of Sagrea with one of its three characters in this action-adventure game. Explore different locations and face numerous enemies with an intense combo-based combat system to discover the threat that looms over the realms.

name: Churro Maniacs
summary: A cooking simulator of churros! Serve strange customers! Some of them with normal preferences..? others kinda creep!

name: Chipichapas Evolution: Clicker
summary: Collect as many Chipichapas as possible by clicking on the Chipichapa as fast as possible!

name: Chess Soul
summary: Type: [Card] [Aircraft Battle] [Growth]A game where players operate airplanes to pass levels, gradually improving their abilities and challenging themselves with higher levels of transformation.

name: Chicken Tale
summary: Platformer game Chicken Tale with a touching story and pixelart graphics three difficulty levels so that both beginners and experienced players can enjoy

name: Chrome Valley Customs
summary: Help save the garage by restoring classic cars to their former glory with a wide range of customization options! Work on your mechanic skills: repair, restore, paint, upholster, and finish the cars in the way you like best. To get the parts you need you’ll have to solve puzzles with explosives. What a business model!

name: Chef Life: Cooking Lab
summary: Create your own recipes from thousands of combinations with the COOKING LAB pack, available as a free download! Use the lab to offer your customers your own unique cuisine.

name: Chura-jima Kurashi
summary:
Blue sky... White sea... Deep forest... Who will you meet and how will they live their lives?
A mobile island living game where you can simulate life on a small island in the south.
Interaction with residents and as a mini-game
Through life and play in a recreated island country
Find out how to live on the player's own island
It's relaxing and a little strange. It's a mobile app.

name: Chrono Recorder
summary: "ChronoRecorder" is a 3D puzzle game. Players can manipulate time and gravity. And you have to use that ability to solve problems. You might think this game is difficult if you don't use your brain.

name: Chip and Charge
summary: Chip and Charge is an arcade-style tennis game with a fully customizable character and equipment and dozens of new cosmetics!

name: Challenge N°1
summary: The hardest platform game ever. Climb to the top before you drown

name: Chainsaw Maniac
summary:
Chainsaw Maniac was a browser-based game made to promote the PlayStation 2 release of Resident Evil 4.

Chainsaw Manaic involved moving left and right into incoming chainsaw Ganado to defeat them in in Nintendo "Game & Watch" styled graphics.

Two competitions were also held where players could win a copy of Resident Evil 4 for PlayStation 2, a PlayStation 2 Chainsaw Controller, or a T-shirt designed for the competition.

name: Chaos Chain: Supporter Cosmetic Pack 2
summary: The Supporter Cosmetic Pack 2 is for people who'd like to show some extra support for Chaos Chain and the developers at Corrosive Studios and to help us continue to grow. As a thank you, you'll receive 8 unique skins to show off your style as you descend into the shadows of Slade City!

name: Chess for Idiots: Premium
summary: By purchasing PREMIUM you receive the Kink skin and access to a special weapon - SeaWeed!

name: Chitei Tanken
summary:
Underground Exploration is a non-graphical game where players form a party of 4-5 adventurers, fight monsters, collect treasures, and purchase weapons. The game uses text-based commands and a time-passage system.

Arguably the first RPG to be produced in Japan.

name: ChessBase 1.0
summary: Starting in 1983, Frederic Friedel and his colleagues put out a magazine Computer-schach und Spiele covering the emerging hobby of computer chess. In 1985, Friedel invited then world chess champion Garry Kasparov to his house. Kasparov mused about how a chess database would make it easier for him to prepare for specific opponents. Friedel began working with Bonn physicist Matthias Wüllenweber who created the first such database, ChessBase 1.0, as software for the Atari ST. The February 1987 issue of Computer-schach und Spiele introduced the database program as well as the ChessBase magazine, a floppy disk containing chess games edited by chess grandmaster John Nunn.

name: Chromacell
summary: In this sideways scrolling shmup, take control of your spaceship and navigate through vibrant pixelated environments filled with hordes of enemy spacecraft. Upgrade your ship and weapons, dodge enemy fire while blasting through each stage. Emerge victorious as the ultimate space pilot!

name: Chibi Wars Kinetic Novel
summary: Chibi Wars is a series of comic 'kinetic' visual novel stories... Featuring a cute Chibi artstyle following a group of Female Warriors as they face off against various denizens of hell including zombies, vampires and demons.

name: Christmas Carol
summary: Christmas Carol is crammed full of gorgeous Hidden Object scenes and superb mini-puzzles, wrapped into a great storyline based on the famous Charles Dickens novel.

name: China: Mao's Legacy - Ways of Life
summary: Push the limits of what you can comfortably expect with this small add-on that gives you unusual possibilities

name: Christmas Wonderland 13
summary: Enjoy magnificent Holiday Festivities in Springfield. Help Santa at the North Pole. Visit Toy Workshops and an awesome Candyland Factory. Go to a Charity Christmas Market & Santa’s Enchanted Grotto in Pinecreek Hills National Park.

name: Champy the Useless Vampire
summary: Join Champy, the useless vampire, in this charming 2D point-and-click adventure with hand-drawn environments and funny puzzles. Embark on an adventure amongst a cult of vampire hunters, a giant octopus and zombie animals. Will Champy find a way to save Dracula before it's too late?

name: Chakana, Gold of the Gods
summary: Embark on a 2D metroidvania adventure that immerses players in Andean mythology, focusing on exploration, combat, and discovery. Join Hoyustus, a brave jaguar warrior, on his journey to free his people from the oppression of an usurping god.

name: Chill Pulse
summary: Chill Pulse combines productivity tools with serene environments. Use a Pomodoro timer and to-do lists to boost focus, while ambient sounds in settings from cyberpunk cities to ancient landscapes enhance relaxation.

name: Chicago Project
summary: The Chicago Project is a linear, plot-driven RPG puzzle game that blends visual novel and DND elements. The player takes on the role of an engineer, burdened with social responsibility and grief over the loss of a mentor, and ultimately unravels the conspiracy of the powers that be.

name: ChatBBT
summary: Explore the fictional, baby themed chatbot, ChatBBT, in this short, story driven adventure to the heart of the psyche, led by none other than software's leading assistant, Binderclippy. Go ahead... Ask 'BBT something! Anything!!

name: Chicken Boy's Counterattack
summary: This is a bullet hell arcade game where you move to dodge bullets, rebound them, and eliminate Xiao Heizi to unlock more chicken boys. Keep fighting back against Xiao Heizi! Come on, show the dignity of Chicken Boy and say no to Xiao Heizi.

name: Chaos Front
summary: A turn-based space mecha mercenary game. You can recruit pilots and captains with varying stories and skills, buy and modify spaceships, mecha, artillery, and fighters, take missions, participate in battles between Galactic Powers, change the situations, and experience different stories.

name: Cheddar Beach: Episode 0
summary: Take a trip to Cheddar Beach in this interactive visual novel! Join Hamston & The Homies as they search for a crackin’ house party on a Friday night, in a world inspired by LA in the early 90’s. Let’s Chase That Cheese, Ya’ll!

name: Chomper
summary: Are you ready for a challenge? Build, research, craft, and defend in this arcade-style, dynamic real-time strategy tower defense game. Defend the core at all costs. There are no mistakes.

name: Charm Commerce
summary: Run a business with adorable monster girls using power of desire! Employ girls, build your workplace and grow your business in the magical world. Unleash the charm of your team and watch your business thrive!

name: Chromatic Memories
summary: A visual novel about grief, memory and acceptance. Nayara is a painter of memories: she digs into her clients’ minds to change or even erase their memories. One day she realizes she has altered her own memory. What was so painful or unbearable that she wanted to forget it for good?

name: Cherno
summary: Escape game where it is necessary to collect the clues to obtain the key and thus level up until you leave the building without being touched by the Russian experiments that seek to devour you. Show your ingenuity to look for clues in the dark and your agility to dodge the experiments' attacks.

name: Charlie Brown’s All-Stars
summary: An unreleased baseball based off the Peanuts series.

name: Change Lanes
summary: Racing game

name: Chura-umi Monogatari
summary:
"Chura-umi Monogatari" is a sequel to the app "Chura-jima Kurashi" that simulates life on the southern island.

The next stage is a small island "Kotsubu Island" floating in the beautiful sea. The main character will spend 5 days as the caretaker of this island.

On this island surrounded by nature, please deepen exchanges with the residents, enjoy leisure, and find your own way to spend your time!

The story changes with the choice of men and women!
The game starts when the main character saw the article of "Recruitment of Administrators" on the Internet. In this work, you can choose the gender of the main character, and various changes may come depending on various events such as love.

On the island, the daily action time is fixed from 10 o'clock to 18 o'clock, and the time passes depending on the area movement and mini-games. Depending on the situation when you finish the 5-day experience, you will have a different ending.

Every time I play, I discover new things! There are 7 types of mini-games that appear during play, such as "Eisa", "Palm Fruit" and "Snorkeling"! Depending on the change in time and ganju (physical strength), the mini-games you can play may change.

The "achievement rate" will increase due to the progress of mini-games and the collection of illustrated book items. There are also special stories that occur when you master the achievement rate, so please take a walk all over the island!

name: ChipWits
summary: Challenge your brain in this open-ended robot programming puzzle game! Code your ChipWit to navigate logic-twisting puzzles, zap malfunctioning robots, and dominate the global leaderboards. Can you solve Dr. Droog's twisted game and restore order to the space station before it's too late?

name: Choo-Choose
summary: So, have you ever heard of the Trolley Problem? Do you know the price of the choices you make? How far are you ready to go to act according to your values? Will you sacrifice a life of the other to hold the moral high ground?

name: Chushpan
summary: Violent street gang wars have rocked the city. What do you remember about the main urban bands of the “USSR phenomenon” of the 1990s? Feel those times for yourself.

name: ChainBeet
summary:
This app is music game that even advanced users can enjoy!
The system is very simple and anyone can easily play.
Over 800 songs and 3400 charts included.

name: Chords Enchanter
summary: A music theory based puzzle game where you need to fill in the missing notes to complete a chord.

name: Chain Reaction: Sexy Hentai Girls
summary: Are you an Hentai or Ecchi fan ? Do you like japanese girls ? Are you also a mind games fan and nothing pleases you as much as mixing reflexion and pleasure ? If your answer is yes, CHAIN REACTION : SEXY HENTAI GIRLS is the perfect game for you.

name: Choko Nana
summary: This is a single-player RPG where you can enjoy the basic elements of combat, collection, exploration, and growth. The game offers a simple experience composed of “little” elements, and the charming interactions between the cute characters are also a highlight.

name: Chaotic Conflicts
summary: Chaotic Conflicts is a casual and chaotic fast-paced Online FPS game. In this chaotic shooter you'll try to shoot your way to the top of the scoreboard while competing with other players and random events.

name: Chocolate Factory Simulator
summary: Enter the world of steam and sugar and become a master chocolatier in Chocolate Factory Simulator. Craft gourmet chocolate for your customers in your steampunk workshop with the help of your automaton assistant Nougat.

name: Childhood's Rush
summary: An easy-to-play 3D rogue-lite TPS action game that you can enjoy in just a hour!

name: Cheese Moon
summary: Cheese Moon is an adventure game where cute rabbits explore the moon. Dig out the huge secret hidden on the back of the moon by fighting off aggressive cheeses, and machines with the words 'RTMK' written on them. Summon the rabbit clone to clear the stage. There are 5 worlds, 100 stages waiting.

name: Chromocide: Prism of Sin
summary: Shoot, shift color and race against the darkness in this short-run psychedelic action roguelite. Will you atone for your sin?

name: Chymicalia
summary: Cause chaos in a small Yorkshire town with unlicensed alchemy!

name: Cheese Banquet Advanced
summary: A line-drawing game with some twists along the way, created for the Thinky Puzzle Game Jam 3.

name: Check Inn
summary: Build hotels, accommodate guests and expand your hotel business throughout the world!

name: Christmas Journey to Santa
summary: Christmas Journey to Santa is a relaxing platformer game about a snowman who dreams of meeting Santa Claus on Christmas Eve. He sets off on a long journey to fulfill his wish.

name: Christmas Stories: The Legend of Toymakers Collector's Edition
summary: A yuletide hidden-object story packed with Christmas spirit!

name: Chaos Journey
summary: It is a survival and action game set in a post-apocalyptic world. This robot, which was sent from Mars to Earth to prevent the destruction of Earth after the zombie invasion, tries to save living people by fighting hordes of zombies and produce cures to save the world.

name: Chuno
summary: This is a game where Chuno, a mutated snail, goes on a journey and brings back souvenirs and stuffed animals. A very easy and short 2D action. Menu operations are performed using the mouse. Use only WASD or arrow keys. There is no failure or retry system.

name: Chat Wars!
summary: Chat Wars! is a real time strategy game playable only for a streamer with at least 30~40 viewers. Gather gold and upgrade chat viewer's Unit and spell for streamer! Collaborate with chat and streamers to win!

name: Chronocide
summary: Stop the undead from entering the temporal portals with traps and your weapons. Play the campaign solo or in co-op mode up to 4 players.

name: Chordioid
summary: Chordioid is a unique musical JRPG where you battle to the beat. Explore a strange world, make unlikely friends, and uncover dark secrets, all while the beat goes on.

name: Chef's Adventure
summary: You are a chef on the hunt for chickens, which have what you need: Fresh eggs! (Demo does not include eggs). Find the chickens, gain new skills and explore the different levels of: Chef's Adventure

name: Chaos Frenzy
summary: Eris the Chaos goddess has lost her powers source The chaos emeralds by an unknow being at the chaos dimension, now she's got a goal to archive Get back her powers and become the chaos goddess once again but it won't be easy for her, emeralds have taken the form of her most deep dears, dont give up!

name: Chef Life: A Restaurant Simulator - Tokyo Delight
summary: Explore Japanese gastronomy with the TOKYO DELIGHT pack, which includes 8 iconic recipes, new decor items to transform your restaurant into an authentic izakaya, and equipment for your chef.

name: Chains of Judgment
summary: Homicide detective, Ralph, is distraught when his trusted, reliable partner and best friend go missing around the same time when strange killings begin to appear. While solving the case, Ralph is paired up with an impish rookie who he can't get along with.

name: Chromatrix
summary: Defend against waves of unique enemies in this old-school tower defense game, where colors are your key to victory.

name: Chesstempo
summary: Welcome to Chess Tempo's Play Chess Online feature. You can play online chess against other site members, or against bots with a range of playing strengths. Both traditional and correspondence chess is supported, allowing you to play a quick chess game, or a correspondence game spanning many days or weeks.

name: Champions Arena
summary: Champions Arena is a turn-based gacha RPG. Collect unique Champions and engage in real-time turn-based PVP battles!

name: Chaos Islands
summary: Chaos Islands is a city-builder that unites deck-building and tower defense mechanics with roguelite elements. As the last bastion of humanity forced to escape to the skies to hide from invading forces of demons. Protect your settlement and do not let the evil forces pass.

name: Cheap Car Repair
summary: Cheap Car Repair - go back in time to Poland of the 90's. Run your own Cheap Car Repair shop. Look for savings wherever you can. Make lots of money and avoid angry customers!

name: Challenge Love
summary: Challenge yourself to love with beautiful girls through “Challenge Love”! This game is not suitable for teenagers! Adults only!

name: Chadgeon: Enjoyers Edition+
summary: Survive, Dominate and Create the most Chad pigeon in Chadgeon: Enjoyers Edition+

name: Chess Tools
summary: Learn to play chess with Chess Tools. Learn with tutorials, various tools and learn from many famous games from some of the greatest players!

name: Cherry School World
summary: This game is Cherry School World. The game takes place in the open fictional small world "Sakura Town". We designed the game scene to feel like you are in a hybrid world, and as a student, you can experience a simulated high school day-to-day life. This game is not an action and shooting game etc, but a simulator.

name: Chess 2
summary: This project was inspired by Oats Jenkins' video on Youtube titled "I Made a BETTER Chess". In their video, they revised the pieces and rules. This project is that idea, turned into a video game!

name: Chaos Trigger
summary: Go back and forth in a hail of bullets , use all kinds of weapons to take down your enemies.

name: Chronicles Of Crystal: Turn-Basde Epoch
summary: Pixel style RPG world card-like Roguelike,players will live in a mysterious medieval world.The world is full of adventure and challenge,you will embark on a legendary journey through the portal to different levels,randomly challenge a variety of powerful monsters, and engage in intense card battles!

name: Chikaro
summary: A boy and an android girl wake up without their memories in a world where deadly robots roam the streets. With the boy's powers, they can leave their bodies to walk through walls or possess enemies. The two follow the trail of the intentions left behind by those who once perished above the ground.

name: Chatfox Tax Evasion Adventure
summary: Play as Chatfox in three new and exciting environments. Press space to shoot, shift to slow down, arrow keys to move. Shoot and evade the tax forms to progress through the levels. Collect Fox Bux and spend them in the shop to upgrade Chatfox! Become Unstoppable and Defeat all three evil bosses.

name: Chess Opening Repertoire Builder
summary: Learn chess openings and try them out against an AI instantly!

name: Chloe the Cat
summary: Jump, spin, and pounce your way through colorful worlds and challenging obstacles in this charming precision platformer! Collect coins to acquire new looks, scour through every corner to scavenge for food, and expertly leap and bounce past danger through a handcrafted adventure.

name: Chamber Survival
summary: From a first person perspective, escape this terrifying room.

name: Chaos Brave Village
summary: This game is a turn-based strategy adventure where you play as a king's trusted confidant sent to a remote village to investigate a mysterious power. Search for clues, recruit heroes, confront unknown enemies, and uncover the truth behind the "inaccessible place."

name: Chefcito Asesino
summary: In this game, we embody an extremely angry rat that must defend itself from the sewer monsters to survive. We have a variety of weapons at our disposal to achieve this.

name: Child of Ruin
summary:
In this narrative RPG, you join Ravi and their two companion spirits in their quest across the Echoing Isles found high in the sky.

Experience an emotional journey governed by calamity in an attempt to recover your lost memories.

But remember... you must pay the price of your choices in full.

name: Chimera: Complex Hearts
summary: It’s the end of the 21st century, and a mysterious new contagion is ravaging the world. Known as ‘Chimera Complex’, it causes painful and irreversible mutations that mimic aspects of animal biology in those who contract the condition. One way or another, no patient survives for long.

name: Charming Tails
summary: When your mom suddenly falls ill with an incurable disease, you’re about to lose all hope when you remember the legend of the cat realm—a place where wishes come true…

name: Chiclana & Friends: The Game
summary: Try to survive as many waves as possible with the best score in this game in which you control three characters at the same time.

name: Cheree: Remembering My Murder
summary: Cheree doesn't know how she died. Nor does she know why she doesn't know. By "traveling" to dozens of different locations and chatting with her about any topic that comes to mind, Cheree will gradually remember details, and the two of you will discover clues that lead to the answers she has been seeking for over 100 years.

name: Chizome no Hana
summary:
In the middle of summer….

Kurisuno Sakura, along with her fellow Mystery Club Members (and the teachers supervising), decide on a trip to visit Utsugi Mansion – a place hidden in the woods where 10 years ago was known for a forced group suicide to have occured.

Soon after arrival, Sakura and co learn that the previos owner of the mansion, Utsugi Masagi, had been involved in the research of a very special flower – one who’s pollen would carry poison while displaying impressive regenerating ability. A person suffering from it would be gradually covered in red marks and then die, as some cases develop an extreme tendency for violence towards others in the meantime. On top of that, the poison itself is also contagious by blood.

Naturally it doesn’t take too long till one of them is also infected, so the battle for survival begins…

name: Chocolate Carol
summary: Chocolate Carol is a short visual novel, where you sell hot chocolate to the locals. However, on one fateful night, an unfamiliar patron comes to you with news of a crime that occurred … very near your stall. Can you find the culprit with the clues each of the customers give you?

name: Chaos
summary: ChaoS is a Sonic fangame developed by Davie Slam, it focuses on a unique story surrounding the villain ChaoS causing Angel Island (Referred to as "Floating Island" ingame) to fall and split open. It is a platformer borrowing sprites from games such as Sonic 3, and Sonic 2 with many sprites borrowed from the prototypes of these games.

name: Chatterbox
summary: Introducing Chatterbox - the desktop chat app that brings back the simplicity of text-based communication. A piece of Interactive Fiction written for the 2024 Dialogue Jam.

name: Chibi 3D Online RPG Sandbox
summary:
Welcome to the Chibi World Simulation! Build your own CHIBI World and meet and make Chibi friends all over the world.

Pick up your favorite Chibi Uniform and Cosplay as a Schoolgirl Chibi girl or school boy. You can either choose to play Adventure Mode where you can kill Monsters or you can play Role-Playing Mode where you can role play with your friends or alone. You can choose from a huge amount of user created Maps like High School Maps, Yandere Maps, Shopping Malls, Cafes, Bars, Parkour Maps and literally anything that you can imagine.

name: Chess But All At Once
summary:
Move ALL your pieces each turn!

What if you could move all your pieces in one turn in Chess? Only one way to find out!

Friendly for amateurs and professionals alike - come experience chess like never before. If you master it you'll never blunder again!

Enjoy Daily challenges that'll push the limits of your understanding of Chess... but all at once.

name: Chocolate
summary:
Nobody is aware of the dangers lurking in Antarctica.
Try to be - one of the few - to find the shelters and make it back alive.
Feel the horror of being lost.

name: Chibi Akuma's Episode 1: Invasion!
summary:
Chibiko isn't the best choice for the 'hero' of a game... in the last year she's been killed by God, banished from hell, and reincarnated as the enemy of all mankind!

But, she's not going to let any of that get her down!... in fact, the only problem she has right now is the strange monsters that have been lurking around the mountains lately - and now they are infesting HER castle!

Join Chibiko in her unholy battle against the invasion of badly drawn, cliche and generally uninspired enemies, pummel your way through 4 levels of brainless firepower crazy action - and unleash hell on the 4 end level boss enemies!

name: Chalicebound
summary: Chalicebound is a short dark fantasy point & click adventure, mainly inspired by Shadowgate and Vermis.

name: Chaotic Customer
summary: A Dark Deception fangame.

name: Chocolate Factory Tycoon
summary: Will you rise to the top as the ultimate Chocolate Tycoon?

name: Chest
summary: Afternoon, sunshine, pool, sound of flowing water, and... a dream? This is 'Chest'.

name: ChronoClone
summary: The final project for a team of high school seniors as part of their game design class, Chrono Clone is a free to play puzzle platformer with multiple levels.

name: Chowdown Kitty
summary: Meow we're talking! Chowdown Kitty is a Match 3 puzzle game where your goal is simple: Find treats and fill up the bowls of hundreds of adorable feline friends - then fill up your living room with a whole cat-alogue of kitties dressed up for the occasion!

name: Chibi Escape
summary: Long ago, you were cursed. Now you have to fight for your life by either killing hopeless Chibies, or by trying to escape the map. Loot chests, hide from the Killer, use special abilities, collaborate with others, betray them. Do everything to escape from the map alive.

name: Chi
summary:
Chi is a horror game that (poorly) facades as a cute story in which you play as a six year old girl who lives in a small village in Japan with her family and her small dog. Your father is the priest of the small shrine you live in, and you have to follow several important rules that he has set up to keep the village safe. These are the rules: you know what is best for the villagers, so they have to do whatever you and your family say, you cannot go upstairs, you must give blood every Sunday, and you cannot go into the forest.

This specific Sunday, you play as Chi as she goes on a quest with her puppy, Mitsuru, to get markers so that she can draw some pictures. You complete some minor favors, and get your blood drawn so you're able to get said markers. However, as you're walking home, the evening goes terribly wrong as Mitsuru runs into the forest. With this, in order to save your dog, you have no choice but to run in after her...

Run after her into a forest that no one returns from.

name: Chocolate Factory
summary:
Build your dream Chocolate Factory among candy cane forests and gumdrop hills to produce the tastiest sweets.
A delicious first-person factory automation game with a little exploration and combat.
Confectionary conveyor belt heaven awaits!

name: Cherophobia
summary: You find yourself stranded in a forest after your car breaks down. A short psychological horror game.

name: Chariot of Girl
summary: Chariot of Girl is a single roguelike game developed by GreenSnow. This game combines strategy and combat elements, allowing players to experience unique tank racing fun. Players need to use intelligence and strategy to challenge various enemies in different levels and ultimately achieve game goals.

name: Cheril Perils Classic
summary:
The Cheril Perils NES Port we never finished and which ended becoming Yun, the remake! And the port to SEGA 8-bit of the remake of the unfinished port but now finished! Get confused as hell with all the versions of Cheril Perils with this adventure with lots of fun and two gameplay modes!

In easy mode just jump on top of the baddies to clean every stage. In resonators mode, you’ll have to activate a resonator to freeze the baddies for a while before you can jump on top of them to kil them all.

name: Charming Hearts
summary: "Charming Hearts" is a real-life interactive dating game. Players will meet, get to know, and fall in love with different types of beauty. Every choice will lead to a completely different chemical reaction with "her"; every entanglement, the sweet love is entangled and pulled.

name: Chaos Chain: Supporter Cosmetic Pack 3
summary: The Supporter Cosmetic Pack 3 is for people who'd like to show some extra support for Chaos Chain and to help me continue to be able to improve the game. As a thank you, you'll receive 8 unique skins to show off your style as you descend into the shadows of Slade City!

name: Chess
summary: Chess: The Grand Strategy Game - Your Pocket Edition for Mastery and Fun!

name: Chikoku no Mokushiroku: Ver.2.00
summary: This update includes revised visuals, dialogue and a new bonus story.

name: Chained Runes
summary: Plan your chain of runes as well as possible, analyze your opponents, and build up an optimized deck to reach King Gormnoq.

name: Chaos Express
summary: Run, Deliver and do it with care. Become an owner of Delivery point in near-future city and make all the parcels reach their destination. Do it yourself or with friends.

name: Chaos Magus
summary: Dive into Chaos Magus, where you blend spellcasting with sword fighting.Craft 200 spells with a intuitive and deeply satisfying magic system.Tackle over 100 unique enemies with strategic combat where every choice matters. Experience an immersive VR adventure like no other!

name: Chaos Pieces
summary: Chaotic board card game with too much freedom

name: Chaser of Light
summary: It is a pixelated agile game presented in fresh light tones.

name: Check In
summary: "Check in" is a pure collection-based game where there are no complex operations; completing all challenges simply requires checking in on different dates.

name: Checkout: Cashier Simulator
summary: Checkout is a cute point-and-click pixel art cashier simulation game. Work shifts throughout the year and seasons, earn as many points as you can within each shift's time limit, and get to know your coworkers.

name: Cheese Party
summary: Cheese Party is a casual match 3 game where you match charcuterie board delights to complete party orders with cute artwork. Create cheese knife specials and rainbow cheese if you match more. High point scores are rewarded with power ups to cheese the levels.

name: Chemia
summary: Chemia is an adventurous survival crafting game played in a post natural disaster scene. This is a project in development state.

name: Chess Club Valley
summary: Chess Club Valley is a 2D Open-World Chess RPG. Experience this epic chess adventure for the first time across a world filled with unique character’s, monsters, secrets and super bosses, while playing chess to level up your XP. A total of 20+ hours of gameplay!

name: Chillax
summary: Play mini games while enjoying the sight of sea creatures.

name: Chiccoo and Life
summary: In the hills by the river is a small village of handful souls. Chiccoo the raccoon walks through them and their past lives discovering their joys and sorrows. Spend your time in an idyllic rustic environment unlocking the villagers' memories and solving environmental puzzles.

name: ChingMing
summary: As a Taoist from the Heavenly Master's Mansion, you will come down the mountain to experience various demons and monsters on this land. You need to personally build a camp, search for food, establish defenses, and do everything you can to survive.

name: Chip & Sparky
summary: Embark on a high-octane adventure with a young robot named Chip, as he teams up with his trusty companion Sparky to track down corporate pirates who have stolen his uncle's latest invention. Blast through action-packed levels, master high-tech gadgets, and overcome thrilling obstacles!

name: Chooing
summary: The electrifying fusion of Snake and tank battle! Engage in blistering battles as you obliterate your foes with a barrage of firepower or outmaneuver them with foxy tactics.

name: Christmas Countdown
summary: Join Santa's elves in a festive race against time to wrap presents and fill Santa's sleigh before Christmas Eve in this fun and cheerful game for the whole family.

name: Chronicles of Fear: The Babysitter's Tale
summary: Psychological horror game without any jumpscares. Take care of Samuel, the neighbour’s kid, in this realistic singleplayer walking simulator and uncover family secrets.

name: Chase H.Q. II
summary:
Similar to Chase H.Q. in this sequel you drive on a freeway trying to catch up with five criminals who have committed felonies, with time against you.

You can choose one of three vehicles to drive: a sports car, 4-wheel drive, and a semi truck. Each one of them having their advantages and disadvantages.

name: Chornobyl Liquidators - Supporter Pack
summary: For all those dedicated to aiding in the aftermath of the Chornobyl disaster, we’ve crafted an exclusive Supporter Pack. This pack provides even more immersive elements and exclusive content from the game’s development process.

name: Chou à la Crème Collect
summary: A sweet and poignant cream puff adventure to save another self who has lost their sense of taste. An emotional story you won't want to miss until the very end.

name: Chirp Song: Wings of Praise
summary: This charming bubble shooter game set in the RhymVerse reveals the restorative power of praise as players free the "Chirps" in the Forest of Words from Axilla’s corruption!

name: ChainStaff
summary: ChainStaff is a brutal action-platformer with a transforming spear and grappling hook, blazing weapon upgrades, and a rocking soundtrack. Aliens have taken over the Earth! Swing, shoot, and spear your way through hordes of mutating monstrosities and bone-shaking boss fights.

name: Chopper Strike
summary: It's time to strike!

name: ChromaGun 2: Dye Hard
summary: Shoot paint, mix colors, and solve puzzles in this adventure about friendship and redemption. Just don't enter that portal to another universe, and everything will be perfectly fine.

name: Chrono Knight
summary: A homebrew for the NES in which the player controls a wave-shooting sword to fight bosses in order to protect time.

name: Chicky Woggy
summary: A digital simulator of the handheld game Chicky Woggy.

name: Chrono
summary: Chrono is a puzzle/platformer game where you control how time affects objects in the world. By freezing time, fast-forwarding, or rewinding objects, you can crack a wide variety of puzzles. The goal is to escape the facility where you are trapped, before time runs out.

name: Chicken with Robot Legs
summary: Chicken with Robot legs is a Runner-Vania game where you explore a map and find secrets while constantly moving, your only objective is find a way home. Find upgrades that let you explore further and further while unravel the secrets of this unknown place.

name: Champion of Turnabouts
summary: Rumors in the underworld have been circulating about an undefeated Poker player who's never lost in seven years. Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to put an end to that streak, and write the story of a new Poker legend.

name: ChatTDT: Tower Defense Twitch
summary: Dive into the dynamic world of "ChatTDT: Tower Defense Twitch" where your Twitch chat becomes an integral part of the action! Designed to seamlessly integrate with the Twitch API, ChatTDT offers a unique and interactive tower defense experience that engages both streamers and viewers like never before.

name: Chipi Chapa: Brick Breaker
summary: Destroy blocks to to the music of Chipi Chipi Chapa Chapa.

name: Championship Pool
summary: NES Port of "Championship Pool". The game is a straight-forward, virtual version of pool and includes several games: eight-ball, nine-ball, three-ball, ten-ball, fifteen-ball, straight pool (14.1 continuous), rotation, equal offense and speed pool. The player may play against the computer or up to seven other players using the same console using the "Party Pool" (multiplayer) option. Other gameplay modes include "Tournament" (single-player, computer opponents), "Freestyle" (players make up own game rules) and "Challenge" (single-player, shot practice).

name: Chucky: Slash & Dash
summary: Run and collect items as Chucky or Tiffany from the Child's Play franchise.

name: Cherry's Joi
summary: Meet Cherry, a fiery redhead with a big personality. She and her sisters want to help you have lots of fun. Cherry loves wearing hot outfits like corsets and swimsuits, and sometimes even a tough leather suit. Cherry is waiting to be your guide and give you all sorts of things to do. Every time you play, you'll have a new adventure with her. Can you follow her directions? Don't miss out on the chance to play Cherry's JOI.

name: Chili's Big Smasher BurgerTime
summary: Introducing Chili’s Big Smasher BurgerTime, a refreshed version of the cult classic BurgerTime arcade game. Play as Joe Chilihead and build as many Big Smashers as possible and defeat evil fast food syndicate for the chance to win free burgers for LIFE!

name: Chernograd
summary:
Chernograd is a story-driven simulation game with multiple endings based on the player's decisions.

The player takes on the role of an employee of the Citizen Tranquility Agency, monitoring the residents of the 15th district of Chernograd. Each apartment is equipped with a system that tracks citizen activities, and any detected violations allow the player to connect to the home and apartment using video and audio recorders to find the violator, compile a report, and send it to the Department of Truth Inquiry along with all the evidence.

name: Chapatriste
summary: Chapatriste is an intense FPS that immerses you in an infernal world based on the Spanish Tercios of Flandes. Face hordes of skeleton soldiers in a dark and terrifying environment where survival depends as much on your aim as on your melee combat skills. Fight!
developers: Campus Cámara de Sevilla - Centro FP Superior

name: Chase H.Q. 2
summary: This modern sequel to the classic chasing game by Taito carries a similar formula with modern graphics. You are a cop that can pick between three different indestructible cars to chase criminals down, smashing their vehicles until they can't budge another inch, gaining points in the process.
