As such, this is not a racing game, the timer only exists to provide a level of challenge to the game.

name: Chronicle: Rewritten
summary:
Chronicle: Rewritten is a recreation of Jagex's original collectable card game, Chronicle: Runescape Legends. The game was taken offline on the 6th of August 2018 and hasn't been accessible ever since. Until now!

This remake is built from the ground up with the goal of having this game playable until the end of time. As long as there is a download available somewhere, you will be able to play it!

name: Champion's Ashes
summary: Champion's Ashes is a mod for Dark Souls III that overhauls the game by enhancing and balancing various elements. It introduces new gameplay mechanics, such as improved combat and altered enemy placements. The mod also adds new items, weapons, and spells while rebalancing existing content to create a more challenging and refined experience.

name: Chillin'
summary: This map focuses on an alien spacecraft and some buildings around where it landed; by the time Duke gets there, there are way too many aliens in the area just kinda chillin'.

name: Cheating Reset: Uwaki Reset
summary: A happy life of living together. I thought it was going well all this time. Let's start over. Let's go back to six months ago...

name: Choose and Easy Number IQ Quiz
summary:
Complete Brain Training within the Time Limit!
Quick and Fun Brain Activity IQ Quiz

name: Chuxie
summary: 除邪(CHUXIE) is a surreal first person horror shooting game developed using Unreal Engine 5. With the powerful capabilities of Unreal Engine 5, players will experience stunning realistic visual effects, smooth game controls, and intense battles with terrifying monsters.

name: Chick That Never Skipped a Leg Day
summary: Can you reach the top? Chick That Never Skipped a Leg Day is a brutal-cute 3D precision climb. A tiny chick. Massive legs. The Golden Leg Press awaits. Solo or online with friends.

name: Chef & Friends: Recipe for Success
summary: Gather a team of professional restorers and protect restaurants and cafes from Ethan's greed. Help aspiring chefs pass the assessment of the Culinary Bulletin's restaurant critic: upgrade kitchens, renovate interiors, and give owners a makeover. Chef, hurry now to discover unforgettable culinary adventures! Play Chef & Friends!

name: Chelsea of the South Sea Islands
summary: After being marooned on a deserted island, Chelsea has to fend for herself like Robinson Crusoe once did until her family rescues her.

name: Chained
summary: You are chained to your friends and must climb to the top. One wrong move can decide your friendship.

name: Cheese Collector
summary: Cheese Collector is a fun and addictive clicker game where you collect a variety of cheeses! Click to gather cheese and expand your cheesy collection. Every 150 minutes, you'll receive a unique cheese to add to your stash.

name: Chase the Gangsters
summary: It seems that the law no longer works in the city. A super cop is needed!

name: Chunithm Luminous Plus
summary: An expanded version of Chunithm Luminous.

name: Chakan for Hexen
summary: A 3D remake of the Sega Genesis Game Chakan as a mod for Hexen.

name: Chushpan Simulator 2
summary: On their way from Ugryupinsk, Egor and Nastya find themselves caught in the middle of a conflict between two gangs — the Pavers and the Glaziers. Egor must find common ground with the Glaziers, deal with the Pavers, and rescue Nastya

name: Chrono Club: Race Against Time
summary: The biggest karting tournament throughout history is being held, dragging in racers from all over the timeline in order to determine one thing and one thing only: Who is the best racer of all time?

name: Chronicles of Zimoria
summary: Chronicles of Zimoria is a creature-catching game set in the world of Zimoria. Explore diverse landscapes, collect Metals, and conquer Battle Challenges to document over 150 unique Zimon species. Confront the evil Cult of the Marionette and thwart the Puppet Master's plans in this adventure.

name: Chiral
summary: A sci-fi dark-comedy puzzle game. In Chiral, you'll assume the role of a disembodied brain in a jar, paired with a digital AI companion. Together, you'll navigate a labyrinth of mirror, laser, and gravity puzzles that will challenge your spatial reasoning and leave you both laughing and bewildered.

name: Chrono Ark: Summer Twilight
summary:
Summer-themed DLC for Chrono Ark, featuring a new, optional boss with her own substory, new equipment and relics, as well as swimsuit skins for Lucy and 5 investigators, with accompanying VFX.

The investigators obtaining a new skin are Azar, Charon, Huz, Pressel and Trisha, with Sizz slated to receive one in a future content update.

name: Chicken Game
summary: "What if I, an ordinary chicken delivery man, have a chance to win a 1-million-dollar prize?" What kind of ending can they reach in the battle over love and money?

name: Charlie the Steak
summary: Charlie the Steak was a mobile game developed by Dynamic Dust for iOS in 2013.

name: Chill Corner: Extras
summary:
This DLC added new characters (included outfits) and pets
- New male character Victor with two outfit
- New female character Emillia with three outfit
- New variants of Cat and Dog
- New exclusive decorator
- New room

name: Chrono-Shift
summary: Solve captivating time travel puzzles. Fight enemies with action-packed movement based combat. Explore a vividly rendered dystopian metropolis. Experience classic, action-packed platformer gameplay.

name: Chemist Wanted
summary: Chemist Wanted is a crafting game with a difference! In this lab simulator, you use practical chemistry to make compounds and sell them. Set up your equipment, run the experiments and create your products. But be careful who you cut deals with - you might get more than you bargained for!

name: Chronal Stasis
summary: Travel to the past and blast your way through to save the timeline in Chronal Stasis, a 2.5D time-traveling platformer-esque game that combines classic run and gun elements with time-based abilities. Join Henry as he fights to save his family and fix the timeline. Is it really that simple though?

name: Chroma
summary: Blast through an army of robots and take down their oppressive corporate empire. Master fast paced movement abilities, combine colors for explosive builds, and make every shot count to beat this back-breaking roguelike shooter.

name: Children of Saturn
summary:
A found footage coming-of-age story about a group of teenagers growing up under an orange sky.

CHILDREN OF SATURN blends first person adventure gameplay with real video recordings to tell an authentic slice of life story.

name: Choson Janggi
summary: Choson Janggi is a video game version of Janggi, a traditional Korean strategy board game, developed for PC by Korea Computer Center.

name: Chivalry 2: Regicide Update
summary:
Chivalry 2’s Regicide Update introduces the Team Objective Map – Regicide at Trayan Citadel, the new Goedendag weapon, a new Campaign, quality of life improvements, and more.
Update Highlights
New Team Objective map – “Regicide at Trayan Citadel”
New Campaign Pass – “Regicide”
New Character Bundle – “Agatha Rebel Knight”
New Weapon – “Goedendag”
Combat Changes
QoL Improvements

name: Cheese Co-op Clicker Simulator
summary: Cheese Co-op Clicker Simulator 100 players

name: Chimera
summary: Play as the mythological Chimera in this action-packed rogue-lite. Make your escape from a deadly tower filled with unrelenting enemies as you uncover its dark secrets. Enter this fantasy world and overcome intense challenges, find hidden lore, and discover the true reason behind your imprisonment.

name: Choice Matters
summary: A resource management card game where every decision impacts your journey. Navigate diverse events, balance resources, and uncover unique stories.

name: Child of Vision
summary: A short Yume Nikki-style RPG Maker game.

name: Church Simulator
summary: Manage your own church. Perform baptisms, hear confessions, collect donations, oversee weddings and funerals, sell souvenirs, and customize your church. Manage the church’s economy and work to expand your church.

name: Chotex Jam
summary: Mapping jam event based on a custom texture set created by Chris Holden: nine small to medium-sized levels including a start map. It comes with a skybox and a few new models.

name: Chasm
summary: This game casts you as a spirited long-haired girl on an adventure in a room brimming with treasures and traps.

name: Cheestrings: Mr. Strings' World Tour
summary: Draw a vehicle and join Mr Strings on his World Tour. You’ll meet hypnotic beavers, exploding pandas and maybe the elusive shycows! Amp up your vehicle with 24 power-up codes found on Cheestrings packs–try this 27684.

name: CH Retro Episode
summary: The summer of 2001 brought you CH Retro. A level filled to the rim with all that good John Romero episode 1 stuff we all know and love!

name: Chernobylite 2: Exclusion Zone
summary: Explore the mysterious open world of the Chornobyl Exclusion Zone in this post-apocalyptic action RPG adventure. Craft your story by facing sinister hazards and monsters. Survive furious encounters with the help of your crafted weaponry, developed skills, gathered teammates, and supported factions

name: Charisma
summary: Impress a recording studio in order to escape.

name: Cho Chabudai Gaeshi! 2
summary: A sequel to Cho Chabudai Gaeshi, which again sees the player flipping a table.

name: Champion Baseball 2
summary:
A one- or two-player baseball game. The umpire sounds really Japanese.

Champion Baseball 2 was produced by Sega in 1983.

Sega released 593 machines in our database under this trade name, starting in 1960. Sega was based in United States.

Other machines made by Sega during the time period Champion Baseball 2 was produced include: Character Cabinets, Oh Shou Serizawa 8dan no Tsume-Shougi, Zoom 909, Zektor, Tac/Scan, Astron Belt, Champion Baseball, Champion Boxing, Commando (Sega), and Congo Bongo

name: Chris: Luxury Getaway
summary: Chris: Luxury Getaway is a character special book with Chris. As of March 19, 2020 the book became free for everyone. It used to cost 30 diamonds to unlock this book.

name: Chatty's Bratty Tryst
summary: Chatty's Bratty Tryst (CBT) is a fan-made visual novel made in Ren'py centered around Lucy Pyre, the cringe femcel demon girl Chatty loves and adores.

name: Chick Room Escape
summary: Somehow you are locked in the room. Escape from here!

name: Christmas Escape
summary:
Though Christmas is coming soon, you have been shut in a cold room...
Let's escape from the room!

name: Charlie Charlie Challenge
summary: A 1-4 player CO-OP horror game, you have come to try and banish a ghost, or is it a demon? At the end of your venture you will just be trying to escape.

name: Chicken Strike: Cluck Ops
summary:
In a world where chickens have had enough of being served up on platters, one fearless fowl rises to lead the resistance against the fast-food giant known as FCK. Welcome to "Chicken Strike: Cluck Ops", the action-packed adventure where feathers fly and the claws come out!

Take control of a courageous chicken armed to the beak with an arsenal of weapons, from egg launchers to poultry-powered rockets. Embark on an epic quest through a variety of vibrant environments, from bustling city streets to the heart of the FCK empire. Prepare for intense battles against waves of crispy adversaries, including Major Fanders.

Join the resistance, cluck up your courage, and embark on an egg-citing adventure to save chicken-kind from the clutches of the fast-food industry. It's time to show FCK who is the boss!

name: Chicken
summary: Chicken is a clicker game, in which you click a Chicken! You click the Chicken to gain even more Chickens! Every 3 hour, random chicken drops. A community that's Chickens. All our Chickens are made with community effort and inspiration, come join the fun!

name: Chronicon: Survivors
summary: Fight a mix of familiar and new dangerous foes in this fast paced horde survival game! Upgrade your weapons, unlock new items & characters, advance in the permanent passive skill tree, and try to survive the horde! Based off the ARPG Chronicon by the same developer.

name: Chickaboom
summary: A game where you have to knock down chicks with bubble gum bubbles.

name: Chicken Party: Animal Farm
summary: Enjoy this charming graphic novel set on a magical and lively farm.The story follows the exciting adventures of Clara, a curious and intelligent hen, and her brave friends.

name: Chrono Ark: High Roller
summary:
Casino-themed DLC for Chrono Ark, featuring a new, optional boss with its own substory, new equipment and relics, as well as casino-themed skins for Lucy and 6 investigators, with accompanying VFX.

The investigators obtaining a new skin are Helia & Selena, Miss Chain, Momori, Narhan, and Silverstein.

name: Chronon
summary: The purpose of Chronon is to let the little yellow dwarf out of a center cage. The master of this house will come back at 7pm; you make the way to escape with moving and interacting with items in the house at each fixed hour until the master comes back.

name: Chaos Caster
summary: Cast spells, dash around hordes of enemies, and assemble powerful combos as you explore procedurally generated dungeons. Chaos Caster is an action roguelike focused on strategy, playstyle variety, and replayability.

name: Chrono Trigger: Prophet's Guile
summary: Chrono Trigger: Prophet’s Guile is a fan game following the story of Magus’s rise to power in the Kingdom of Zeal after arriving in 12000 B.C. thanks to the distortion at his lair. In his bid to stop Lavos at the Ocean Palace, Magus must gain the trust of Queen Zeal and abolish all opposition. It’s about two regular Chrono Trigger chapters long, and full of surprises.

name: Chaos Order
summary: A large level with two different paths. UV is much harder than the other difficulties.

name: Checkers: Playdate
summary: Checkers is the well known board game with four difficulties and a jump heuristic for the Playdate handheld

name: Chimp Test
summary: Chimp Test is an innovative and engaging memory challenge game designed to push the boundaries of your cognitive abilities and thoroughly test your short-term memory skills. Inspired by the exceptional memory feats of chimpanzees, who have demonstrated remarkable ability in recalling complex sequences with astonishing speed and precision, Chimp Test offers a unique and interactive experience for players of all ages. Whether you are a casual gamer looking for an entertaining challenge or a dedicated enthusiast aiming to sharpen your mental acuity, this game provides a dynamic platform to enhance memory, concentration, and mental agility.

name: Chorus of Carcosa
summary: Chorus of Carcosa is a psychological horror game inspired by the iconic book 'The King in Yellow' by R. W. Chambers. Test the limits of your mind and survive in the old, ever-changing building. Just don't get lost in the dark, twisted labyrinths... or in your own madness.

name: Cheezure
summary:
Game made for NoneJam 7 in which the player controls the ship of the great pirate captain Lespito and helps him face the dangers that await him on the seas.

Manage your cheese intelligently and improve your entire ship to reach the golden treasure, the great Cheezure.

Could you be the most fearless mouse on the seas?

name: Chromb
summary:
Chromb is a clicker game about... chromb (chromb-chan).

In chromb game you click chromb-chan's ahoge to gain more ahoge which you can spend on things in shop or gain a prestige levels after reaching a certain amount of them.

name: Chuzzo
summary: Drop pucks. Score points. It's Chuzzo time.

name: Chrono Crimes
summary: Mystery-Time Travel Deduction Game with Stealth & Puzzles

name: Children of the Flower
summary: You are Daisy — spunky, ambitious, and totally fed up with your town's local cult and their "deity": a giant sunflower. Under the gaze of your powerful father, a gang of anarchists send you on a secret mission with an unspeakable objective... to exterminate the Godflower.

name: ChromaZone
summary: ChromaZone is a game about a man just taking a casual walk around his home island Prismara Isle although suddenly an unfamiliar Robot native to the island appeared before him with his flying saucer-type machine he flew with. he morphed his body into a ball-like shape as he would fly away turning his friends into more or less puppets.

name: ChatBattlers
summary: ChatBattlers is a Twitch Integration game releasing on Steam in September. Steamers have get an interactive 3D set of both Idle, and engaging game mods. Both Transparency support as well as a Stream-Safe LoFi sound track are included. Users can download the app in order to customize their slime with weapons, skins, costumes, and accessories to appear in other streams. Join streams to compete and wind Gems to purchase customization.

name: Christmas Escape 2
summary:
Christmas is coming soon, somehow you are in a gray lab-like room.
Let's escape from here!

name: Christmas Escape 3
summary:
Even though Christmas is coming soon, you are alone on a cold night field...
Let's escape from this situation.

name: Churip
summary: "CHURIP" is a horror adventure game set in modern times. On the day of the funeral, her casket was beautifully adorned with many flowers. She often appears in my dreams as she was when she was alive.

name: Chick Room Escape: Xmas ver.
summary: A banner-sized Christmas-themed escape game

name: Christmas Escape Toy
summary:
Christmas is coming soon, but somehow you are locked in a room like children's room.
Escape from here before Christmas.

name: Change and Drop
summary: simple and casual ball drop game .

name: Children of Hell
summary: You've been called in for a mandatory general examination. You don't know what to expect. A visual novel about immortal monster hunters used by the government.

name: Championship Bowling
summary:
A bowling game from Romstar.

Championship Bowling was produced by Romstar in 1989.

Romstar released 9 machines in our database under this trade name, starting in 1987. Romstar was based in United States.

Other machines made by Romstar during the time period Championship Bowling was produced include: Sky Shark, Time Soldiers, Cal .50 - Caliber Fifty, Down Town, Fire Shark, Skeet Shot, and Popshot!

name: Chef Life: A Restaurant Simulator - Cooking Lab
Chase
summary: The chase is on!

name: Chroma Slayer
summary: Slay chromatically-attuned monsters in front of the city walls.

name: Chowder: Bookin' Cook
summary: Chowder Bookin Cooking is a cooking and serving game. It's one of those fun restaurant management games, even better with Cartoon Network characters like Chowder and friends! Let's keep people fed, and the money coming in!

name: Chior
summary: You had a pretty rough fall. Trying to regain your composure you try to look around before realizing you can't see anything. Hope that your other senses will serve you better.

name: Choujin Sentai Jetman
summary: An LCD game based on Choujin Sentai Jetman.

name: Chipwits
summary: You have to program a small robot named ChipWit.

name: Cheese: The Cheese Collector
summary: Cheese - The Cheese Collector is a grindy clicker game. Compete against friends or the globe to have the most cheese. Unlock upgrades, choose a theme that fits you, View a user's profile and statistics.

name: Cheetahs Are Meant To Be Fast
summary: An interactive storybook about how being a fat guy who eats a lot is very morally wrong and not at all awesome or attractive.

name: ChessRogue
summary: A chess themed roguelike featuring online high scores.

name: Chroma Zero
summary: Explore a unique and connected world. Understand its fragile balance, uncover its deepest questions, and find more than just the answers.

name: Chimp Memory
summary: A logical reasoning and memory game that allows you to solve the same logic tests that neurological test monkeys solve in real life and will make you question whether you are capable of being smarter than a monkey. Get your name in the rankings and compete for leadership.

name: Chroma Cross
summary: Chroma Cross takes Nonograms beyond the binary of black and white and brings them into a rainbow of color. Experience Picross in refreshing polychrome.

name: Chat Noir
summary: Can you keep the kitty from running off the game field?

name: Choices Matter: Mega City
summary: Explore Mega City in a post-apocalyptic card game. Choose, survive, and take control of your fate.

name: Chimney Man
summary: A MSX homebrew created by GameCast Entertainment.

name: Chica's Party World: Rebaked
summary: Chica's Party World: REBAKED is the official reboot / re-imagining of the original game from 2018 by PoisonousPastels and BonBun_Studios. The game sees you playing as a security robot designated with the task of watching over the building and running basic maintenance tasks until proper renovations begin. However (obviously) things aren't quite what they seem at first.

name: Chou Kousoku Mahjong Plus
summary: Choukousoku Mahjong Plus is a Mahjong game, published by Success, which was released in Japan in 2002. The game features a fast and strong Mahjong engine, over 40 sets of rules to choose from, record keeping ability, and a 2D or 3D perspective.

name: Chained in the Backrooms
summary: Chained in the Backrooms is a 1-4 player co-op, mission-based horror game. Trapped in a blurry subconscious and chained together, toy bears must solve puzzles, complete challenging missions, and survive against creatures trying to destroy them.

name: Chroma
summary: Short point and click game

name: Chi Vuol Essere Milionario?
summary: Chi Vuol Essere Milionario? is an Italian interactive DVD game based on the Who Wants to Be a Millionaire series.

name: Cherry Jump
summary: Cherry Jump is a 2D platformer where players race through levels, collecting cherries and aiming for the fastest completion time. The game features multiple paths, achievements to unlock, and various characters to discover. Players test their speed and skill in this fast-paced pixel art world.

name: Chess 'n' Blocks
summary: Have you ever considered playing Chess and Tetris simultaneously? Guess what? My strange brain did for years; I don't know why. But I finally took the time to create this game. And that's how chess 'n' blocks was born.

name: Chained Survive Together
summary: Chains Can't Hold You Back—Fight to Survive Together!

name: Christmas Hustle
summary: Christmas Hustle is a Christmas-themed hidden object game. Help Santa's elves to pack the presents to their respective reindeers.

name: Chained Climb Together
summary: Balance between you and your partner, survive together! One chain - one life, prove your ability to cooperate!

name: Chaos Entropy
summary: This RPG features a unique combat system! After obtaining the Chaos God's Ring, you must evade the Goddess's minions while exploring the world, collecting divine weapons, and awakening heroic spirits. Assemble a knightly order to battle powerful enemies and uncover the ancient secrets of Eusayard.

name: Chores in the Night
summary: "I want this apartment spotless!" shouts your mom before going to her night shift. Use your cleaning supplies and courage to have the house cleaned before your mom comes back. A first person short story about doing chores and avoiding evil forces to survive the night.

name: Choplifter
summary: Fly a helicopter on missions to rescue P.O.W.s. Four different levels featuring desert, sea, caves and city rescue. Avoid and shoot enemy jets, ships, tanks anti-aircraft fire. Digitized speech and catchy background music.

name: Chainsaw Juice King
summary: Fruit hunting meets an idle tycoon adventure. Equip your chainsaw, hunt quirky live fruits, and turn them into delicious juice to grow your juice empire.

name: Choko Loco 2
summary: A fairly linear action adventure game where you collect spam, extra lives and fight lovecraftian monsters. There is some exploration but it's more of an action game. I consider it of the "psychological horror" genre. It is also a 3d platformer, like Mario 64 but insanely twisted. You can also swim underwater, and you will have to to finish the game. There are other environmental hazards such as mud and slime.

name: ChronoVenture
summary:
ChronoVenture is a momentum-based Gameboy-style platformer shooter where the player controls a cat named Lizzy as she runs, jumps, claws and shoots her way to the end of the level where she'll encounter against a boss to unlock a new weapon or ability before she finds herself warping into the future.

Taking inspiration from Sonic CD, you start off in Act 1 during the present or past of a stage where you can either focus on completing an objective that changes the future in Act 2 for the better or reach to the end as fast as you can for a tougher challenge.

name: Chosen of God
summary: "Chosen of God" thrusts you into the heart of an ancient world, brutal and fraught with danger. You are David, a young shepherd destined to become king. Wield your weapons to face giants, ruthless warriors, and ferocious beasts.

name: Chuushaki: Hirasawa Nurse School
summary: A young girl named Mana is determine to become a good nurse. She plans to attend the Hirasawa Nurse School, which was also the place where her late mother studied. However, upon arrival Mana finds out that strange things are happening in the school. Not only some of the teachers are acting weird, but the fellow aspiring nurses seem to be more interested in sex than in actually learning their profession...

name: Chu x Chu Idol
summary: Kensuke is an ordinary uni student, living alone. One day, he happens to know Chiyu's secret. Chiyu transforms into a popular idol by kissing Chuchu, a vampire girl. Chuchu finds Kensuke knows their secret, and curses him not to stay away from them. As a result, they start to live together... Will he be able to get rid of the curse?

name: Cherish Pizza ha Ikaga Desu ka
summary: The story of a college student who was decides to work part-time at a pizzeria "Cherish Pizza". What kind of life will he have at this part-time job?

name: Chrysalis
summary: Experience fast-paced, sci-fi action in a top-down shooter where an outbreak of paranormal creatures turns a high-tech laboratory into a battleground. Fight your way through intense encounters using advanced weaponry and strategic movement. Powered by a custom game engine, this adventure combines chaotic combat with stunning visuals for an immersive experience.

name: Cheerwine Deluxe 3
summary: Prince Edward Island has been ripped out of the earth, and only Yoshi can save Canada from these vile forces!

name: Choose Love
summary: The steady boyfriend. The one who got away. The charming rock star. Who will Cami choose? In this interactive rom-com, her love life is in your hands.

name: Chained Towards Heaven
summary: Climb from hell to paradise, bound by chains and teamwork!

name: Chained Heroes
summary: Can you reach the top, or will the water pull you down?

name: Choujin
summary: Action top-down shooter for the exclusive Japanese home computer Sharp x68000. The player must eliminate all the enemies in order to progress, they can also encounters some bosses throught the stages.

name: Chakana
summary:
You planned for a quiet evening. The table is set, the atmosphere is warm, and the night seems to be unfolding just as you'd hoped. But as the meal progresses, something feels off.

In this atmospheric horror game, explore your home as strange events disrupt your date, leaving you to navigate through questions, confrontations, and your own dread. Each decision can bring you closer to unraveling the mystery or plunge you deeper into its grip.

The time is running out, manage the eerie silence, and tread carefully to keep your secrets hidden—or risk exposing yourself. Face a twisting psychological horror that questions how far you'd go to protect yourself from your fate.

name: Chalk River
summary:
Chalk River is a dynamic Wild West-themed metaverse that blends immersive storytelling, intense PvP action, and player-driven exploration. Set in an expansive frontier, players can forge their legacy as outlaws, lawmen, or entrepreneurs.

Engage in high-stakes deathmatches, craft powerful NFTs, trade rare items, and complete story-rich missions to uncover the secrets of the rugged Chalk River Valley. With evolving gameplay fueled by blockchain technology, Chalk River offers a unique mix of adventure, strategy, and community-driven content. Saddle up and carve your path in this ever-expanding digital frontier!

name: Chernobylite: Black Smoke Pack
summary: Transform your hideaway into a coal-powered command centre.

name: Christmas Tree Decorator
summary: Christmas Tree Decorator is a first-person simulator where you can unwind and decorate a Christmas tree. Whether you’re a casual fan or a dedicated celebrator, enjoy the cozy atmosphere free from pressures or perfectionism as you create your own unique holiday tree and decorations!

name: Children's Garden
summary: Welcome to a puzzle game where your goal is to guide young souls to peace. Set in Sai no Kawara, a hell for children, you’ll stack the divine toy "Gift" bestowed by the gods. Discover their memories and the stories they left behind.

name: Church of Shadows
summary: In a cursed, abandoned church, you must destroy six demonic spell books to weaken the evil & vengeful witch sealed away for centuries. Evade her twisted creations, burn the books, and survive her deadly traps before she claims your soul. Will you escape, or be bound forever?

name: Chernobylite: Complete Edition
summary: Chernobylite is a non-linerar, science-fiction survival horror RPG. Explore the Chernobyl Exclusion Zone and uncover the truth of your tortured past.

name: Chasing Sunsets
summary:
Follow the story of a young man returning home after years abroad, suddenly faced with the prospect of shouldering life-changing responsibility and stirring the embers of a repressed childhood love.

This sprawling tale will take you from the Boston suburbs to Russia, Sicily, Tunisia, and the fictional island nation of Tonalu, where you will cooperate (or compete) with your estranged sister to fulfill your parents' final wishes.

Against the backdrop of a looming lawsuit, a landmark medical breakthrough, and the sudden appearance of a beautiful and quirky investigative reporter with a keen interest in your family, you will make the choices and cultivate the relationships that will determine what kind of man you become...And what kind of woman you want by your side.

Experience an emotional adventure where choices matter, and branching paths lead to at least eight possible unique endings. And don't forget to enjoy the sexy company along the way!

name: Chip McCallahan in Sonic the Hedgehog 2
summary: This hack replaces the main characters, Sonic and Tails, with Chip McCallahan, the protagonist from the puzzle game Chip's Challenge.

name: Chilling Reign
summary: A wintery episode for heretic and narratively is a direct sequel to Lost and Forgotten.

name: Chicken Hill
summary: Find 250 Genjouin of various species and hundreds of items for brother KUN. Rescue your frustrated and devastated brother KUN in the KUN space. We are the most devout believers.

name: Chi Project
summary: Sci-fi fantasy visual novel that combines a turn-based combat system with murder investigation elements.

name: Chains of Freedom
summary: Embark on a thrilling journey in a high-stakes, turn-based tactics game. Lead an elite squad in a fictional, dystopian Eastern Europe as you unravel a sinister conspiracy threatening the nation. Navigate intense strategic battles and adapt to ever-evolving challenges to prevail.

name: Chosen Card Chronicles
summary: Chosen Card Chronicles is a fast-paced card-battling visual novel with over 900 cards to collect. Meet new friends, build the ultimate deck, and aim for the top of the world.

name: Chop Shop
summary: Feel the flow as you hunt, butcher, and cook at a blisteringly fast pace in this action shop-keeping game. Hunt adorable monsters, chop colossal carcasses, and power-slice through huge chunks of flesh to serve your customers even faster. Move fast and stay sharp if you want your shop to survive.

name: Championship Manager 2010 Special Edition
summary:
Championship Manager 2010 Special Edition is an updated version of the popular football management simulation game, Championship Manager 2010. It includes the full game along with additional content.

The Special Edition features extras such as
- Manager's Notepad
- Championship Manager pencil
- Large Poster showcasing the structures of over thirty national leagues.
- Additionally, it offers a subscription-based CM Live service that provides six updates during the football season, allowing players to manage their teams in real-time as the season progresses.

name: Chonkers
summary: Chonkers is a cozy and relaxing idle game. Adopt the cutest fur balls and watch them ramp up the chonk scale as you play with them. Find them a new family. They’ll pay A LOT for your hefty chonker! Complete your collection by finding all the breeds and the rarest space cats!

name: Chained Echoes: Ashes of Elrant
summary: Eldrea is calling once again. Eldrea needs you. One. More. Time. Ashes of Elrant is the official DLC for the highly acclaimed Chained Echoes, offering you more of what you enjoyed so much. Meet all your beloved characters and answer the call as the Crimson Wings are needed once again.

name: Chained Through Hell
summary: Escape the underworld, but don’t break the chain—or each other.

name: Chess Infinity
summary: Whether you're new to chess or a seasoned master, welcome to Chess Infinity—the art of timeless strategy. Immerse yourself in serene environments, sharpen your skills with an adaptive AI mentor, and connect with players worldwide. Embrace endless challenges that transcend eras and borders.

name: Chicken Run: Special Edition - Escape from the Pot-Pie Machine
Christmas Bazaar: Manager Simulator
summary: Christmas Bazaar - Manager Simulator is a relaxed first-person simulation game where every aspect of running a Christmas Bazaar comes to life.

name: Chumini: Tiny Army
summary: In this vampire survivor-like, summon an army of tiny Chuminis to battle waves of forest demons. Each Chumini has its own movement patterns: it's up to you to manage this merry mess to create an unstoppable force!

name: Chirashiiru
summary: A puzzle game where you have to follow the arranged themes.

name: CheckOut
summary: Checkout is a psychological horror walking simulator where players attempt to escape from endlessly looping hotel corridors. The game delivers an intense immersion with its tension-building soundtrack and realistic graphics. Unravel the hidden stories and find your way out of the hotel.

name: Christmas Drift: Delivery Simulator
summary: Christmas Drift - Delivery Simulator Experience the ultimate holiday challenge! Drift through snowy roads, deliver gifts on time, and conquer festive obstacles in this fun, fast-paced driving simulator. Customize your vehicle, master tricky routes, and spread Christmas cheer like never before!

name: Christmas Gift Catcher
summary: From the makers of The Jumping Food Games comes the perfect game for the holidays: "Christmas Gift Catcher"! After decorating the Christmas tree in our previous game, "Christmas Tree Decorating Simulator", now it's time to collect the presents.

name: Christmas Mutilator
summary: Inspired by 80s slasher films, Christmas Mutilator is an immersive horror and home invasion game. Your husband and children are trapped in the storm, you are stuck in a cabin for the holidays. Use every tactic you can to stay alive and get out of your house as a vicious psychopath breaks in.

name: Christmas Chaos
summary: Christmas Chaos is a multiplayer party game perfect for the holiday spirit! Team up with friends and dive into 2 exciting modes. Get ready for holiday fun and laughter!

name: Champion Simulator
summary: Start as a novice boxer training at home. Earn money and respect in street fights, then upgrade to a real gym for better results. With enough progress, get a pro card to enter tournaments. Your goal? To rise through the ranks and become the CHAMPION! Ready to prove yourself?

name: Christmas Store: Santa's Supermarket Simulator
summary: In the "Christmas Store: Santa's Supermarket Simulator", you run a holiday store. Fill the shelves with Christmas goods, set discounts, serve customers, hire staff and decorate the shop in a wintery style. Expand your store and create the perfect place for Christmas shopping!

name: Chisel
summary: Tunnel your way through the ground to reduce the planets to the target size.

name: Chisel 2
summary: Planet digging follow up to our former title, now with the power to rocket jump!

name: Cheese Dreams New Moon
summary: Bounce your way through the S.S Squeakstar and help save our solar system!

name: ChronoClock
summary: Next in line to manage a multi-million dollar corporation is our protagonist, Rei Sawatari. He inherited one very important heirloom from his late grandfather: a single pocket watch that grants him a mysterious power— The power to go five minutes back in time.

name: Christmas Jumper Jam
summary: A jam using Arcane Dimensions, with a focus on jump boots featuring 9 maps. Get on your holiday jumper!

name: Chinese Online Game
summary: The player will play the role of an older unmarried young man Lao Wang, because of the lack of money for marriage in thinking of ways to accidentally be attracted by the pop-up ads of an online game endorsed by a certain celebrity, and the gears of destiny began to turn at that moment.

name: Chiiku Drill Oshare Majo Love and Berry: Moji Kazu Chie Asobi
Chiikawa Phone
summary: Chiikawa Phone is an LCD game collection based on the Chiikawa manga seres

name: Chiikawa Pocket
summary:
The popular manga "Chiikawa" by illustrator Nagano is now available as a smartphone app!
Enjoy the world of "Chiikawa" to the fullest on your smartphone!

name: Chalga Killer
summary: Chalga Killer is a basic game with chalga idols. A cool idea, music, and performance. You'll have fun, even if you're a chalga fan! The game is made for entertainment and its sole purpose is just that! The trick in the game is to shoot as many folk guys as possible before you run out of bullets and bombs.

name: Chaos Ascension
summary: Survive relentless waves of monsters in this fast paced rogue lite action game. Choose your hero, defeat epic bosses, and unlock powerful upgrades in a dark, procedurally generated world.

name: Christmas Stories: The Adventures of Santa Claus
summary: Visual novels full of magic, snow and exploration where players immerse themselves in the wonderful world of the North Pole.

name: Christmas Puzzle Story
summary: Celebrate the magic of the holiday season with Christmas Puzzle Story, a cozy and addictive puzzle game where festive fruits and Christmas treats collide in delightful combos!

name: Chrono Gear: Warden of Time
summary: Turn back the clock and fight to repair Time itself in this cinematic action platformer with fast sword combat and time-based powers. You are the Warden of Time, Ouro Kronii - be proud and fight hard!

name: Chuck Nolemland: The Starving Kid
summary: Maybe the hardest RAGE horror game ever..

name: Chipped
summary:
Premise
In the very near future, humanity has finally discovered a way to sync the human brain with robots using a brain implant. Play as a volunteer in the test program.

name: Choose Cthulhu Files: The Call of Cthulhu
summary: Choose Cthulhu Files is a visual novel / adventure videogame adaption of the internationally acclaimed gamebook series Choose Cthulhu, based on the original works from H.P. Lovecraft and the Cthulhu Mythos, where you experience the story as the protagonist deciding how the story ends depending on your choices during the adventure.

name: Cho Aniki Collection
summary: The Cho Aniki Collection on Nintendo Switch marks the first time the beloved cult-classic shoot 'em up games Cho Aniki (1992) and Ai Cho Aniki (1995) have been officially translated and released in English. This collection compiles the iconic muscle-themed and surreal shooters originally by Masaya for PC Engine.

name: Chat is Real
summary: A short horror game of a few minutes, with elements of combat and fear. You play as a streamer known as "Gargamelovo let's play šílenství" He always felt like an outsider, whether at school or at work. So he started talking to chat.

name: Chess Ultimate
summary: Chess Ultimate reimagines the classic game of chess with draft-based strategy and colorful 3D visuals. Build your team from a roster of unique characters, each with special abilities, and face off against opponents in tactical battles. With online and cross-platform multiplayer, every match offers fresh challenges and endless strategic depth.

name: Chill Drive
summary: Welcome to Chill Drive, this game can provide a comfortable atmosphere for studying, working, or resting. Plan those long, difficult, or delayed tasks, then complete your goal in an undisturbed environment!

name: Chess Royale
summary: Whether you’re a complete beginner or a highly experienced player, Chess Royale has everything you could need to enjoy one of the world’s greatest board games on your mobile device. Play with the AI, with friends, or with millions of strangers all over the world, then train your chess skills with tutorials, puzzles, and post-game analysis. One of the greatest things about chess is that there’s always something new to learn, and this beautifully designed app will allow you to keep on discovering the magic of chess and enhancing your love of the game day after day.

name: Chaos Machina
summary: A fast-paced action RPG dungeon crawler with roguelike elements. Shoot, run, dodge, and upgrade your abilities to defeat enemies before Chaos consumes the level.

name: Chat Ragdoll Racing
summary: Chat Ragdoll Racing is fully physics-based ragdoll animated simulation game where Twitch Streamers can host games for their communities and have people race against each other in a wild physics-based world.

name: Cheaters Cheetah
summary: Everyone will be given ACTUAL CHEATS in this multiplayer shooter. Use wallhacks and aimbots to your advantage and dominate the other cheetahs. The winner will get to BAN all losers!

name: Chronostrike
summary:
Chronostrike is a Co-Op shooter that expands on the beloved “time moves when you move” formula.

Snatch weapons mid-air, deflect bullets, and synchronize temporal tactics to overcome a new set of foes. With groundbreaking co-op and singleplayer campaigns spanning 60 surreal,dream-like levels. Master Time. Defy Reality. Save Humanity.

name: Chalice of Highland
summary: Embark on an epic adventure inspired by Gameboy aesthetics. Explore the world and dive into six challenging dungeons to recover the Chalice of Highland.

name: Chip ‘n Clawz vs. The Brainioids
summary: An action-strategy game where you gather Brainium, build a base, and command your army of bots to defeat the freaky Brains-in-Jars aliens. Lead from the front with your hero, Chip or Clawz, or both in co-op. Look out for ejected alien brains, you can squish ‘em!

name: Chess Bomb
summary: Chess Bomb is a unique puzzle game where bombs take the shape of chess pieces. Strategically use these explosive chess bombs to fend off waves of invading monsters threatening the chess kingdom.

name: Chertovica
summary: All the cherts are getting married tonight, on a night called Chertovica. Grab your axe, chug down your last tankard, and kick them back to hell where they belong in this retro, melee-centric boomer shooter.

name: ChessFinity
summary: ChessFinity redefines chess in 3D! Play with 3+ players on custom boards across multiple layers. Dive into modes like Classic Chess, Mods, and Mana Chess, with features like obstacles and a-synchronous play. The future of chess starts here—endless possibilities await!

name: Chosen War
summary: " Chosen War" is a roguelike strategy game full of randomness. You'll take on the role of the Chosen One, build and lead your army to explore various islands. Through tactical deployment, you'll engage in battles with enemies, skillfully utilize abilities, and achieve victory with minimal losses.

name: Chrono Tales
summary: Chrono Tales is a Free 3D browser-based MMORPG. The new generation engine provides players with anime-styled 3D Graphics via browsers without huge downloads. Challenge immerse quests, tame mythological beasts, forge legendary gears and experience more! Chrono Tales is a free 3D browser-based MMORPG. The new generation engine provides players with anime-styled 3D graphics via browsers, without client download. Traveling through the time rift, players can explore in the fantasy world of Chrono Tales and save the realm from the resurgent evil. You can challenge immersive quest, forge legendary gear, tame mythological pets and experience much more mainstream MMO features in Chrono Tales.

name: Champions of Shond: Echoes of Faith
summary:
A low-resolution dungeon crawler created for LOWREZJAM 2023.

As two servants of the deity Shond, delve into the dungeons beneath the town of Willowbrook and discover the source of the demonic forces that rise from the depths.

name: Chaos Faction Legacy Collection
summary: Chaos Faction and Chaos Faction 2, both in their original format, return in the Chaos Faction Legacy Collection. Experience the frantic action that helped define the earliest generation of brawlers. Master arenas, outmaneuver foes, unlock new characters, and relive the legacy of Chaos Faction.

name: Chaos
summary: Chaos is a private server for S4League, a fast-paced online multiplayer game that combines third-person shooter action with sports elements. Set in a futuristic world, S4League features intense PvP battles where players can engage in various game modes, except Arena yet... The Chaos server offers a unique and customized experience with enhanced gameplay features, exclusive items, and balanced mechanics. Players can enjoy a vibrant community, regular updates, and special events, making Chaos a thrilling destination for both new and veteran S4League enthusiasts

name: Chlorofell
summary:
Chlorofell focused on mastering quick thinking and manual reloading. You play as a soldier of nature’s wrath, and fight through a factory of environments where plants and technology collide, and squads of enemies coordinate to stop you.

With a limited shield covering your fragile amount of health, you can be easily overwhelmed, but through mastering the speed of movement, manual reloading, and the specialized ammo you’ll find along the way, you just may make it all the way to the source of this scourge and have the chance to finish this fight.

name: Chains Of Reality
summary: Chains Of Reality is a solo-driven survival horror game taken place in various different liminal spaces and environments. You, and the optional 3 other players will take part crafting, building, exploring and surviving what harsh depths reality has to offer.

name: Chou Mentei Sherlock-chan: Okiteyaburi no Misdirection
summary: The famous detective Sarako Imai (Sherlock-chan) takes on a difficult case! Sherlock-chan and Watson-kun are on a comfort trip. Can they solve a murder case at a winter spa resort? A murder mystery with a challenge to the player.

name: Chess Grandmaster: Ancient Egypt Battle
summary: A classic board game for fans of strategy and logic in the style of ancient Egypt! Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of ancient pyramids and prove to everyone that you are a real pharaoh!

name: Chief Challenge
summary: Compete Against other tribe members to become the new chief, and win the heart of beautiful Princess Fabiola

name: Chill Out
summary: Chill Out is a cool little puzzle game about changing weather conditions and delivering packages

name: Chrono Cross
summary:
CHRONO CROSS is an RPG that transcends time and space, unfolding across two interlinked parallel worlds.
With over 40 party members to meet, people and dimensions will intertwine in this epic drama about the planet itself.
Utilising an innovative turn-based style battle system, CHRONO CROSS is a unique RPG that follows the protagonist “Serge” as he crosses time on his quest to save himself dying in a parallel universe.

New Features in the Remastered Edition
・3D models converted to HD
・Refined character illustrations
・Higher-quality background music
・Switch enemy encounters on or off
・Background filter feature
・Battle enhancement features to make combat easier
・Auto-battle function
・Switch between imitation pixel font and HD font
・Change screen resolution

name: Charge!
summary:
As you awake from stasis, you find your ship's autopilot has landed you on a derelict station. No human lifesigns for lightyears, but an automated message was picked up that states there is a stargate several lightyears away to take you to the last bastion of human civilisation - Utopia!

But your ship is low on power and you're hungry and everything's really horrible. Can you scavenge enough supplies to reach the stargate before you die/run out of power/starve? Probably not! But good luck anyway!

name: Chronocracy
summary: Build a unique civilization in a flat world! Explore, extract resources, expand, and battle enemies. Use your time management skills to fend off attacks and face a mysterious threat. Are you ready to create a world that can survive?

name: ChuSingura 46+1 Wacchi to Onii-chan no Love Love Nagaya Seikatsu
summary: Shinpachirou failed to stop the raid of the forty-seven ronin and returned to Naoto on the verge of death. Her injuries healed as they spent a quiet life together. As spring arrived, Suguha asked if she would like to live in Edo, to which she readily agreed. However, they were not samurai but rather ronin, and without money, they have no jobs. Still, they believed that they’ll be able to figure things out when they got there.They found a place in a cheap longhouse and she explained to him the various lifestyles and customs of the Edo period, much of which was a still a commonplace in the present age. Their loving cohabitation true story begins now.

name: ChuSinGura46+1 V
summary: The protagonist Fukami Suguha visits the historic graves of the forty-seven Akou rounin on New Year's Day, but suddenly blacks out while observing the solar eclipse. He wakes up in the body of an Edo period samurai with the same name and face. Suguha is forced to adjust to life in the year 1701 as history unfolds, while getting to know the forty-seven rounin, whose personal details closely match history--except that many of them are women.

name: Charmolypi
summary: After a young and mysterious girl named Castranom arrives at a small hut near a lake occupied by recluse Afeil, the two begin a friendship and find solace in each other. As Castranom learns to fish at the lake, watch as the two grow closer and their own past come to light in a short little fishing game.

name: Chernobyl: Escape from Pripyat
summary: Embark on a harrowing journey into the heart of darkness with Escape From Pripyat, a narrative-driven shooter that plunges you into a realm where fear and survival intertwine. You assume the role of a fearless investigative reporter, part of a specialized unit dispatched to document the unfolding horrors within the desolate ruins of Pripyat.

name: Chunithm Verse
summary: The latest version of Chunithm for 2024.

name: Chained Up Together
summary: The chain binds you… but can it save you?

name: Chitin
summary:
Very short horror game made for a bug themed jam

Wanted to explore a lot of things but alas, jams are finite. I put most points on atmosphere, as my main goal for this was to try and evoke what I felt going through the rot part of Dark Souls 3 snow DLC.

name: Chat Champions
summary: Chat Champions is an interactive pixel battle simulator built for live streaming on Twitch.

name: Christmas Horror Land
summary: A boy wakes up during Christmas eve and goes to get some milk out of the fridge. But their curiosity gets the better of them and decide to go have a look around and see something they wished they'd never seen... Join me on my journey of creating my first released game Christmas Horror Land a spine chilling horror game by us at Hungry Entertainment! Christmas Horror Land will have a new version every Christmas so stay for future Updates.

name: Chibi Reboot
summary: Guide Chibi through a total of 16 different levels with increasing difficulty. Collect various items and face your opponents. Keep an eye on your heart display, and don’t let Chibi end up in the junkyard. 8-bit background music.

name: Chupacabra Hunt
summary: Chupacabra Hunt is a Chupacabra hunting horror game, a vampiric creature that is feeding on the blood of animals in the region. Track the creature by following its footprints and listening to its screams, prepare your weapon and kill it.

name: Chaos Moon
summary: A classic style SHMUP in the tradition of 80's and 90's vertical scrolling shooters. Maximize your run and get to the top of the High-score Leaderboard. Can you achieve the rank of Fleet Admiral? It's a challenge.

name: Chippy's Stash
summary: Nature's Challenge Awaits You!

name: Christmas Fables: The Wishing Store - Collector's Edition
summary: When Mayor Greedy banishes all holiday cheer, you must join forces with toy maker Nicholas and Rudolf the reindeer to uncover the town's secrets, revive the festive spirit, and prove you're worthy of inheriting a toy empire.

name: ChessBlaze
summary: ChessBlaze is a strategy game based on Chess but with a major twist: TURNS DO NOT EXIST! Who needs turns if you can have energy instead. Every move costs energy, no need to wait for opponents response. Some game-modes feature "PowerTiles". They offer unique abilities for pieces entering them!

name: Chill Fishing
summary: Fish, upgrade, relax! Cast your hook, explore the depths, catch unique fish, and discover rare species. Upgrade your gear, unlock new biomes, and progress at your own pace in a simple, relaxing fishing experience.

name: Chess10
summary: This a full chess game with a proper engine in 10 lines of BASIC.

name: Chanter: Kimi no Uta ga Todoitara #
summary: A story of a seemingly ordinary high school student, Mikiya, whose uneventful life transforms during summer break. Surrounded by distinctive friends and new encounters, he experiences personal growth, joins a school band, and develops relationships that promise to change his perspective on life and future.

name: Cheerleader's Choice: New York Spirit
summary: A text-based adventure into the world of cheerleading!

name: Champi
summary: Prepare to defend your village in Champi, a captivating Tower-Defense where your mission is to repel a invasion of mutated mushrooms.

name: Chasers
summary: Chasers is an urban fantasy collectible RPG set against the conflict between the sky city of Aluna, which monopolizes the power of the sun, and the resistance forces of the surface, Line.

name: Chef Strikes Back
summary: Chef Strikes Back is a single player, Cooking Sim / Hack'n'Slash.

name: Chibi Reboot 2
summary: Chibi the little yellow robot returns to you on the monitor! Accompany Chibi the little robot again and this time guide him through even more dangerous dangers and enemies.

name: Chimken
summary: Gameplay is about going thru complex levels that can include parkour, cooperation and even sometimes some puzzles you will have to go thru. The level editor has a combination of different block for aestethics, building and even logic.

name: Chinese universities
summary: A game that simulates a Chinese university campus, where players must use scene props to survive in this modern university.

name: Choyo Girl Lilina: Complete Edition
summary: "Choyo Girl Lilina" is a role-playing game about the adventure story of a 15-year-old girl.

name: Christmas Fables: The Wishing Store - Collector's Edition
summary: Save Christmas from Mr. Greedy! Win over the Christmas-hating mayor, and bring the festive spirit back to Christmasshire.

name: Christmas Infinity
summary: Christmas is getting closer and Santa needs more gifts, always more gifts. Time to get the elves to do his bidding. But one Christmas after another, it'll never be enough.

name: Christmas Stories: Clara and the Guiding Star - Collector's Edition
summary: There's life behind a toy's eyes if you're really looking.

name: Chroma
summary: Chroma is a solo third-person narrative platformer game where you play as an artist exploring her creativity by restoring color and bringing life back to the environment.

name: Chromatic Odyssey
summary: Chromatic Odyssey is a real-time strategy roguelike where you command a rising Type II civilization. Conquer territories, harness advanced technology, and adapt to procedurally generated challenges. Deploy powerful abilities and shape the fate of your empire in an ever-changing galaxy.

name: Chromapix
summary: This is an extremely relaxing pixel art game. The operation is simple. Just hold down the mouse and drag to fill in the colors. It's easy to get started. Come and enjoy the fun of coloring and relieve your stress!

name: Chromatic Conundrum
summary: Chromatic Conundrum is a first person puzzle game where you manipulate light. Combine different colors and form shadows to illuminate your way through an enigmatic world.

name: Chronicles of Ultiria
summary: Chronicles of Ultiria is a classic strategy RPG where you command a diverse cast of characters through turn and grid-based battles. Strategize to overcome enemies, traverse dangerous maps, and unravel the dark plots of the Ultiran Emperor.

name: ChronoBabes
summary: Match3 adventure with 15 hot babes to undress. 5 unique eras, 28 skill deck building, interactive story and smart AI. Build your deck, find cool artifacts and enjoy epic battles!

name: Chibi Charger
summary: An orbital frame crashed on a faraway planet on its way back to earth. Help them come back to earth and save humankind.

name: Checkpoint Madness HD
summary: Checkpoint Madness is a game where you manage a security checkpoint, guiding passengers through various screening processes while monitoring their safety and detecting potential threats. Your tasks include directing passengers through different screening stations, overseeing baggage checks, and responding to security alerts.

name: Chess Force
summary: Chess Force! The wicked MAGNUS and his evil minions have taken taken over the moon with their dark chess powers. You, the KING, will earn PAWNS from each boss battle. Spend your hard-earned ELO to PROMOTE your pawns and add to your firepower. Can you become a GRANDMASTER and save the moon?

name: Chronicles of the Great Wilderness
summary: It is a multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG) that combines multiple gameplay, allowing you to experience the fun of hanging up easily in the cultivation world.

name: Chronicles of Albian 2: The Wizbury School of Magic
Chained Backrooms
summary: CHAINED BACKROOMS is a horror game where players are chained together, forced to survive and explore procedurally generated Backrooms levels. Only coordinated teamwork can help avoid dangers and find an escape. Co-op for 1-4 players.

name: Chuugen no Hasha: Sangoku Shouseiden
summary: Namco has tapped into its library and resurrected two classic Famicom titles for this PSP remake. Taking control of 400 different generals during the Sengoku era, your goal is to unite China as one by expanding your land through negotiations and war.

name: Chance's Lucky Escape
summary: Chance, the luckiest dog in the world, is called to the rescue by the evil genius, Snowball.

name: Chrono
summary: Challenge your history skills! Arrange historical events in the correct chronological order, test your knowledge, and learn as you play.

name: Chicken Rush Deluxe
summary: Hordes of savage meanies are invading, looking for the tastiest chickens around! Paula the hen needs to keep her fellow birds safe, and she needs your help. Guide Paula as she keeps these meanies at bay with her magic rifle that will turn her targets into cacti and stones. You'll need careful and swift reactions to keep these chickens away from becoming dinner in Chicken Rush Deluxe!

name: Chickenhare and the Treasure of Spiking-Beard
summary: Chickenhare and the Treasure of Spiking Beard offers action-adventure players of all ages a thrilling, humor-filled journey by providing dynamic 3D platforming, fluid combats, clever puzzles, and a real-world treasure hunt experience in the action-adventure genre.

name: Chill with You: Lo-Fi Story
summary: "Chill with You : Lo-Fi Story" is a sound novel game where you work alongside Satone, a girl who loves writing stories. Customize lo-fi music, ambient sounds, and landscapes to create a focused environment. As you deepen your bond with Satone, you may discover a special connection with her.

name: Chronicles of Middle Ages
summary:
CMA, Chronicles of the Middle Ages, is a simulation game that transports you back to the life in the Middle Ages.

When you start your journey, you will select the Capital of the Kingdom you have chosen and choose a skill that you would like to begin with.

As a simulation of life in the Middle Ages, the game is challenging. You cannot simply send items, traveling takes a lot of energy, you have to eat and drink, and you need to wear appropriate clothing in cold weather to avoid freezing and illness. The primary objective of the game is to survive, as you must eat and drink every day or risk losing health and eventually dying.

Once you have achieved this critical goal, you can start using your chosen skill, such as farming, breeding, or crafting, to build wealth. Wealth is crucial in the game, as buying shops and learning new skills is expensive. To advance, you will need to grind, but this is what makes the game motivating and keeps you logging in every day.

In CMA, you can be whoever you want to be - a farmer who wants a peaceful life, a merchant who buys items in one city and sells them in another, or a government official who rises through the ranks to become a governor or a king. It all depends on the skills you choose to learn and how you want to be remembered. Note that the number of skills is capped, so you cannot be a "Jack of all Trades."

We encourage you to role-play in our forum (coming soon) and reflect your role-play in real actions in the game, but this is not a requirement.

In this game, Kingdom and community collaboration is a key aspect. The staff organizes periodic events where Kingdoms compete and can earn bonuses for their citizens or for the entire Kingdom. In the future, wars may also be a part of the game.

If you want to become a King, you will need to be a skilled leader with strong organizational skills. You will need to convince others to help you and make tough decisions to achieve your goals.

name: Chemistower
summary: Learn about Chemistry in this science based Tower Defense game! Purchase atoms to create compounds with properties like explosions, acid, and freezing in an effort to destroy antimatter enemies.

name: Chessmaster
summary: This portable version of the game comes with 16 different skill levels along with multiple features incorporated including color and sprite choices for the board and pieces, a teaching mode, move automations, customizable game rules, a clock, chess board orientations, a move counter, and chess piece coordinates.

name: Chick Defender
summary: This is a shooting game in which you play as a funny chicken who shoots corn at bees to protect the chick while trying to collect all the keys before the countdown ends. It's a casual and simple game where you challenge yourself to see how far you can go.

name: Chicken Little: Galactic Traveler
summary: Chicken Little: Galactic Traveler is a small flash game where you fly a spaceship, collect letters in the right order, and try not to run out of fuel

name: Chicken Little: Batting Practice
summary: Chicken Little: Batting Practice is a simple flash game where you help Chicken Little hit baseballs by timing your swings. The goal is to score points by hitting well before time runs out.

name: Chasing Kaleidorider
summary:
"Hysteria," born from humanity's negative consciousness, have invaded reality, causing large-scale anomalies in "Terminus."
Fortunately, mysterious super-powered girls riding motorbikes bravely battle against them and are known as—Kaleido RIDER.
They search for traces of the "Navigator" throughout the city, hoping to obtain the power of "KALEIDO VISION."

name: Charlie and The Chocolate Factory DVD Games
summary:
The DVD featured several interactive games and activities These included:

"Oompa-Loompa Dance" Game:
Follow along and create your own Oompa-Loompa dance moves using your remote. A rhythm-based game where timing and coordination earn you higher scores.

"The Inventing Machine":
A mix-and-match game where you combine ingredients to invent your own wacky candy. The machine gives you fun (and sometimes gross!) results based on your combinations.

"The Bad Nut" Game:
Help the squirrels sort good nuts from bad ones like in the movie scene with Veruca Salt. A reaction game testing speed and accuracy.

"Search for the Golden Ticket":
A treasure hunt-style game where you explore different chocolate bars to find the hidden golden ticket.

These games were accessible from the “Special Features” or “Fun and Games” section of the DVD menu and were playable using the DVD remote control. Some versions also included DVD-ROM content with printable activities and desktop games when played on a computer.

name: Chaos Classroom
summary: Chaos Classroom is an action-roguelite, bullet-heaven where the player selects a team to fight hordes of make-believe enemies in an imaginative dream version of the school, with the option of swapping between different students as they try to make it to the end of each week.

name: Champions Tactics Reforged
summary: Champions Tactics: Reforged is a free-to-play tactical PvP game set in the dark and mystical world of Grimoria. Assemble a team of unique and powerful champions and engage in intense, turn-based duels. Outsmart your opponents, forge your strategy, and rise through the ranks.

name: Cheese is the Reason
summary: Enter the depths of Rat City and fix Chev Hampton's clogged bathroom pipe! Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 57

name: Choplifter
summary: Choplifter is a Master System port based on Sega’s arcade conversion of the original Apple II game.

name: Chessmaster
summary:
Chessmaster is the mobile version of the long running PC chess game series. It is similar to the Palm OS game released two years earlier but has some differences in available game modes and features. It is played from a simple top down perspective with 2D graphics but there are several different chess sets to choose from. Games can be played either human vs. human or human vs. computer with eleven different computer skill levels to choose from. During games it is possible to ask for a quick advice and the game then suggests the next move. It is also possible to show opening hints as well as info on legal squares and threatened pieces. There are also options to take back moves and to switch sides during a game.
In addition to the main game mode there is also a quiz mode and classic games. The quiz mode is a series of ten chess puzzles which has to be solved in the shortest time to give a good score. Classic games are recreations of real life chess matches.

name: Chroma Crush
summary: A new addictive puzzle game with play modes that require fast reaction or careful planning and many ways to score. Slide rows of blocks to create groups of 6 same colored blocks. More blocks fall as you match. If the stack reaches the top, it's game over. Simple-to-play, hard-to-master.

name: Cheating Tom
summary:
Help Tom get through school without studying! Quick, cheat and copy answers off other students before you get busted! Avoid angry teachers and nerdy students! Outsmart your teachers to receive high scores and advance levels.
Over 100 challenging and addictive levels! Over 100 cheating challenges! This game is easy to play, hard to beat! Compete with friends and check out their progress on the map!
Master the art of cheating and you’ll never have to study or worry about school again!

name: Chamber X
summary:
"CHAMBER X" is a gripping puzzle-based horror mystery game where every locked door holds a secret waiting to be uncovered.
As you navigate through eerie rooms and solve intricate puzzles, you'll uncover dark truths and hidden clues to escape an ever-tightening grip of danger.
Time is running out, and the only way to survive is to solve the riddles and escape before the walls close in.

name: Chronophobia
summary: You play as a father who has recently lost his son. Driven by grief, you embark on a time-bending journey in order to revive him back from the dead. But by the end of your journey, the horrors that you witness will make you question the credibility of your actions.

name: Chronoquartz
summary: In Chronoquartz, every move matters! You have 10 turns per loop: explore, solve puzzles, and use your past knowledge to progress. Strategy, critical thinking, and time management will be your allies in this unique temporal adventure. Will you succeed in saving time?

name: Charta Dungeon: Ambidextrous
summary: A deck-building Roguelike game! Fuse hundreds of skill cards with poker hands, wield myriad joker cards, and forge an unbreakable legacy. Brave treacherous paths, outsmart relentless foes, and rise as the ultimate card master in a shattered world!

name: Choco Clicker World
summary: Embark on a sweet journey with Choco Boy, an engaging idle clicker game. Craft the finest chocolates, maximize choc drops, and expand operations. Upgrade resources and uncover new processes as you tap to chocolate mastery. Enjoy endless fun and mouth-watering excitement!

name: Chained Beasts
summary: Chained Beasts is a 1-4 player co-op gladiator roguelite. Fight chaotic battles in the Colosseum while chained to your friends. Brave physical and mental injuries that change how you play. Entertain the blood-thirsty crowd by unleashing your inner beast.

name: Chess Hunt
summary: Chess Hunt is a rogue-like puzzle game. Use your cards to move your character and try to score as many points as possible by collecting matching chess pieces. Build your own deck and play endlessly!

name: Chessmaster Live: Calvert Chess Set
summary: A faithful 3-D reproduction of the Calvert style chess set for Chessmaster Live.

name: Chick Clicker
summary: Hatch chickens, collect eggs, and grow your farm in this addictive idle game. Level up your flock, improve skills, and watch your farm thrive while you relax. Regular updates keep the fun fresh — build your farm, grow your flock, and let the chickens take care of the rest!

name: Chico's Rebound
summary: A mysterious tower full of challenges has appeared. Launch Chico's walnut up at the blocks to break them all! Dash, dive, and tail-whip, while deploying an arsenal of creative power-ups. In between stages explore the Celestial Tower to solve puzzles, earn rewards, and uncover its secrets!

name: Chessmaster Live: Breaking the Lines
summary: Enjoy new ways to play chess with this original mini-game: with Breaking The Lines, move your knight and capture all the pawns. Beware! Your knight may also be captured!

name: Chessmaster Live: Chain Reaction
summary: Enjoy new ways to play chess with this original mini-game: in Chain Reaction you'll have to move so that three pieces of the same kind are connected by their movement paths… Don't make the wrong move or pieces may continue their invasion!

name: Cheating Tom 2
summary: Cheating Tom is back with a vengeance and ready to cheat his way through high school, all the way to prom! Quick, copy answers off other students before you get busted! Outsmart all new teachers, Principal Peters and the nerdiest students ever to receive high scores and advance levels. Beat Scam Sam, Tom’s arch-nemesis, in an epic cheating rivalry to the top of the class!

name: Chessmaster Live: Rayman Raving Rabbids
summary: Why don't you invite Rayman and his delirious Raving Rabbids friends to share your chess board? Those completely out-of-control bunnies will bring fun and absolute craziness to your contests… Featuring hilarous animations, this 3D chess set will rock your game!

name: Chronicles of Veldoria
summary: Chronicles of Veldoria is an epic tactical RPG where you’ll meet new allies, convince monsters to join you, do monster fusion, craft items, learn & upgrade skills, and gather strength to battle the malignant forces of an ancient evil, Ogre Muk, to save the majestic land of Veldoria!

name: Chambers & Crops
summary: Farm, fish, build, and craft in the casual aboveground area, or dive into dungeon levels to battle enemies in a bullet hell environment using crafted weapons and unique character upgrades.

name: ChuChu Pancake
summary: This is a high-speed puzzle action game for all ages, with a cute world view and stress-free controls.

name: Chef Niya
summary: Become the owner of the best food cart in chef Niya! Go on a life changing journey to the art district, cook mouth watering dishes, make new friends, and conquer the challenges of being a small business! In this wonderfully cozy, rhythm cooking RPG.

name: Checkmage!
summary: A chess-based strategy game with casual deckbuilding elements. Build your deck by trading cards and battling lovable, hand-drawn characters.

name: Chronicles from the Abyss
summary: Chronicles from the Abyss is a collection of 4 twisted Horror & Thriller stories that will play on the darkest corners of your mind, & every choice drips with dread. Twisted plots, haunting art, and chilling secrets await. Ready to uncover what lurks beneath?

name: Chess of Doom
summary: Chess of doom is a chess-based roguelike where you're outnumbered at every turn. Harness the dungeon's power to battle enemy hordes, familiar and strange. Die, learn, master, conquer!

name: Chained 2 Violence
summary: Bound by an unbreakable chain, you and a partner must survive waves of enemies in evolving arenas. Master teamwork, unleash chain-based powers, and upgrade your skills in this chaotic co-op roguelike. Will you fight in sync or fall to the violence? The arena is waiting.

name: Chaos of Destiny Remake
summary: Collect, craft, explore, defeat powerful enemies, forge your own weapons, customize your equipment, complete dungeons, solve puzzles and dominate the terrain in this grand open world RPG focused on a retro yet innovative experience.

name: ChainKit Builder
summary: Build, paint, and customize model kits in this immersive virtual workshop. Snap parts together, apply decals, paint with precision, and even kitbash for unique creations. Experience the satisfaction of model kit building without the mess.

name: Chantey
summary:
A rhythm RPG where music powers every spell. Story-driven, chill, and packed with original songs.

Stowed away on a Spanish merchant vessel, craving for adventure, riches and fame, your long and arduous voyage to the West Indies is about to come to an abrupt end...

Set in an alternate history where Golden Age pirate mythology and headbanging heavy metal riffs collide, embark on an epic journey to collect mystical sea chanteys, navigate treacherous waters, overcome enemies, and survive the horrors lurking beneath the ocean’s waves.

name: Chessmaster Live: Fork My Fruit
summary: Enjoy new ways to play chess with this original mini-game: learn or perfect your art of moving chess pieces in Fork My Fruit.

name: Chessmaster Live: Mushrooms Set
summary: Edible or not this set represent one of Chessmaster's most unconventional chess sets.

name: Chessmaster Live: Spheres Chess Set
summary: A chess set with nice and warm colors, with lots of appeal for kids who want to learn chess.

name: Chessmaster Live: Pyramids Chess Set
summary: Download this brand new 3D chess set and have more fun playing chess!

name: Chessmaster Live: Mongol Chess Set
summary: Download this brand new 3D chess set and have more fun playing chess!

name: Chessmaster Live: Egypt Chess Set
summary: Download this brand new 3D chess set and have more fun playing chess!

name: Chessmaster Live: Classic Set
summary: Download this brand new 3D chess set and have more fun playing chess!

name: Chronicles of the Celestial Way
summary: Action RPG: Battle, level up, enhance gear & challenge foes, dungeons, and players. Based on Chinese myths, ancient tribes warred. Five tribes unite against the mighty Chiyou. Nuwa plans to create humans using Wuxing power, but Chiyou attacks. Your adventure starts now!

name: Chessmaster Live: Mechanica Chess Set
summary: Download this brand new 3D chess set and have more fun playing chess

name: Chessmaster Live: Lewis Set
summary: Add this faithful 3-D reproduction of the earliest known European chess set to your collection.

name: Children of Mare
summary: Venture into the host's mind and extracts all its fears to feed Mare. Build, explore, mine and conquer ruins to please the goddess of nightmares.

name: Chronominion Idler
summary: Manage your party, develop skills, and shape the fate of a living world in this strategy-driven RPG.

name: Chicken Brother Guardian
summary: An exciting top-down dodge shooter.

name: Chronicles: Medieval
summary: Chronicles: Medieval lets you step into a vast, dynamic medieval sandbox. Create your character and forge your path from rags to riches. Engage in intense combat, fight for land, glory, and legacy, and lead massive armies into epic, large-scale battles.

name: Chunky Jump!
summary: Chunky JUMP! is a short horror platformer where you must survive through the night on your BIRD BOY. But beware... the Ghabbit is hunting.

name: Checkers Online Elite
summary:
Checkers board game (Draughts, dame, damas – various languages) is well-known ancient game, that still very popular over the world for its simple rules and addictive gameplay, which hide deep tactics and variability.

Play Checkers Online – a special mode where you can compete with other players. Gain new levels and ranks, climb up in leaderboards (daily, weekly and global) or play in special Tournaments with awards. Use your awards to obtain and customize design of your Checkers pieces. Checkers Online mode is completely free. It uses «energy» which can be obtained in many ways: as daily rewards, defeating your opponents or wining in the tournaments.

name: Chasing Her Light
summary: Chasing Her Light is a survival-adventure game about a grieving man who ventures into a snowy forest to find his missing dog, battling the cold and chopping through obstacles with his axe.

name: Chroma Blasters
summary: Blast your way through 120+ dynamic music-driven levels in this twin-stick arcade shooter. Defend against waves of color-coded enemies that spawn to the beat and use tight reflexes and precision color-matching to score big against the chaotic audio-fueled spirals.

name: Chubby Cats
summary: Welcome to Chubby Cats, a relaxing yet strategic island game! Place islands, grow ingredients, and feed hungry cats in time. Use rotation and combos to maximize your score. Every choice matters—can you become a legendary feline master chef?

name: Checkout Midnight
summary: Checkout Midnight is an atmospheric horror game where you work the night shift as a cashier. What begins as a simple job scanning groceries in an almost empty supermarket slowly turns into a true nightmare.
