name: Chopcremental
summary: Short incremental game about man conquering nature. Log and Load.

name: Choppy Cuts
summary: Welcome to Choppy Cuts! In this light-hearted multiplayer co-op game, you'll become hair salon employees, working together to meet the diverse needs of various customers. Through teamwork, you'll complete a series of hairdressing tasks, earn bonuses, and challenge your skills.

name: Chainsaw Snuff Shots
summary: Trapped in a deranged killer’s domain, you must outsmart the nightmare. The chainsaw-wielding psycho hears everything—every step, every breath. Use camera, tools, stealth, and your wits to survive. One wrong move, and the hunt begins. Will you escape, or become another gruesome trophy?

name: Choose
summary:
A puzzle game where you collect offerings in a world where heaven and earth are connected to each other.
Stepping on clouds high in the sky, you look up at the earth you've been walking on.
In the mysterious world of Mobius, you can only rely on your inspiration.

name: Chroam
summary: Chroam is an Escape Room style adventure game, where you will be asked to try your hand at numerous and original puzzles. Explore the rooms, look for clues, solve the puzzles until you reach the flag at the top. It won't be easy!

name: Chainer
summary: Chainer is a 2D action game in which heroines "Yua" and "Maki" cooperate to reach the goal using the technique "Chain" that throws a partner forward.

name: Chaos Zero Nightmare
summary: Chaos Zero Nightmare is a cosmic loop RPG. The official has announced that Chaos Zero Nightmare will come to us soon. Some glimpses of character animations were shown in the teaser, evoking a similar 2D art and animation style to Epic Seven.

name: Chronos Shift
summary: Chronos Shift is a puzzle-platformer as a young adventurer who stumbles into a time-twisting adventure. Solve puzzles, fight enemies, and navigate dangerous environments.Find your way home and escape a reality warping time paradox!

name: Chains of Lukomorye
summary: A WWI soldier journeys into Slavic folklore to reclaim his lost love. Third-person action, dark mythology, and a story of love and fate in a fractured world.

name: Choppy Waters
summary: Choppy Waters is a quirky, sushi-themed roguelite deckbuilder. Gather fresh ingredients, craft powerful sushi cards, and engage in turn-based tactical battles as you navigate a procedurally generated map. Discover clever synergies to outwit pirates, cultists, and all manner of monstrous foes!

name: Chinchón
summary: Enjoy the classic Chinchón card game with the Spanish deck. Play solo or with friends, online or offline. HD graphics, multiple game modes, customizable rules, and a full tutorial to learn or improve your strategy.

name: Chalet
summary: You drive home unaware, when a sudden accident leaves your car broken. Stranded and searching for help, you stumble upon a remote chalet deep in the woods. Alone and uncertain, you must uncover the secrets of this place to survive and escape.

name: Chain Corp
summary: A single-player deck-building strategy game where you assemble a 20-card deck, play characters and corporate cards, and battle against ruthless corporate C.E.Os.

name: Chaosborn
summary: Team up with friends in a roguelite adventure! Fight enemies, collect loot, and power up your character to take on harder maps. Each run is unique, and the stronger you get, the deeper the challenge goes. How far can your team go?

name: Chain Letter
summary: Persuade your friends, unlock their skills, and fight through rhythm battles. Chain Letter is a story-driven rhythm-defense roguelike combining key combo mechanics, tactical positioning, and emotional narrative progression.

name: Chinese Chess Way
summary: "Yidao VR Chinese Chess" is a virtual reality tabletop chess game set against the backdrop of ancient Chinese wars. It adopts the classic Chinese chess gameplay rules. Players will be placed in a virtual ancient battlefield and compete in chess skills with virtual ancient generals.

name: Cheems Bonk
summary: Cheems Bonk is a casual single-player zone-denial arcade game. Defeat an endless wave of Evil Cheems.

name: Christmas Dropini
summary: 20 levels of falling tile action in a Christmas themed action puzzle game.

name: Chess Mess
summary: The chess pieces you know, but with an addictive, puzzle game twist! Get the highest score possible while staying ready to capture the King. Featuring daily challenges, rogue-like elements, and more!

name: Chrono Commander
summary: Chrono Commander is a real-time strategy wargame (RTS) with time travel in 3.5 dimensions.

name: Chaos the Devil
summary: A Ps1 era inspired 3D platformer. Run, jump and spin your way through a new adventure, done the old way.

name: Chicken Flight
summary: A fun game where you fly around as a chicken, trying to survive an onslaught of enemy attacks and bosses.

name: Chipmatic
summary: Chipmatic is a factory building game where you control a mining robot on a mission to reach Earth’s core. Explore deep underground, research new tech and create the best (and only) factory on Earth! Can you discover what mysteries lie beneath the surface in this ruined planet some used to call home?

name: Chunk
summary: In the vibrant lands of Lutum, where everything is made of clay, darkness once again rises and threatens to consume the world! Chunk must set out on a perilous adventure and morph his form to become powerful enough to vanquish the evil and save the day in this 3rd person action adventure game.

name: Chicken Jump, Puppy Jump
summary: An online party game with up to 4-8 players. Build your crew of robo-animal thieves, roam across insane locations to snatch treasures, or simply STEAL goodies from rival players — all to become the MOST WANTED crew on the Bounty Board!

name: Chase & Escape
summary: "Chase & Escape" is a single-player horror game about Chen Lin, a construction worker. After his night shift, his girlfriend Jiayi vanishes, strange dolls appear, and he’s chased by her. What’s behind these eerie events? Discover the truth!

name: Channel Surfing
summary: You’ve always been watching, but what happens when the screen watches back? Channel Surfing is a mysterious desktop idle game disguised as a retro TV. Click, spin, pop, and discover unique gameplay on each channel as you progress.

name: Chemical Combat
summary: A chemistry-themed roguelike in which you fight your way through procedurally generated dungeons, splashing enemies with highly reactive potions.

name: Chushpan Simulator
summary: A game in which you have to go from an insignificant person to the king of the world.

name: Chou Jikuu Yousai Macross: Another Dimension
Chaos Agents
summary:
Chaos Agents is the world’s first autobattler-royale, a genre-defying strategy game from Richard Garfield, creator of Magic: The Gathering, and the debut title from Popularium. In Chaos Agents, players coach a globally unique superhero—known as a Chaos Agent—through intense auto-battling skirmishes against dozens of others in a large-scale battle royale.

Using strategic card play, players power up their Agent between rounds, then watch their choices unfold in action-packed, hands-off combat. With every Agent being one-of-a-kind and globally exclusive, mastery becomes personal—and competitive. Combining the tactical depth of auto-battlers with the high-stakes scale of a battle royale, Chaos Agents invites players to discover, upgrade, and dominate in a new genre born from community-driven development.

name: Chess Quest: From Pawn to Master
summary: "Learn chess from scratch and become a master! Chess Quest is a step-by-step adventure that makes chess fun and accessible for everyone—from complete beginners to future grandmasters.

name: Chess of Mana
summary: Now Celts and Orcs face off in a chess battle where fallen warriors can be revived by the Mana of the Kings! Choose your side of the battlefield—uh, we mean the board—plot the best strategy, use your mana, and defeat the enemy to claim glory!

name: Chess of Fortune
summary: A unique and casual chess experience with new rules and luck-based mechanics which requires fresh strategies, tactics, and ingenuity to conquer.

name: Challenging Land
summary: A Idle-based simulation game. Place objects in unique rooms to collect and process them! Make full use of the functions to meet the demands of the land and move on!

name: Chaos Rush: Tower Defense
summary: A tower defense game that follows the story of Kalidos, a mercenary nation during the sixth period of chaos.

name: Château Royale Jigsaw
summary: Step into the enchanting world of "Château Royale Jigsaw"—a puzzle adventure celebrating the grandeur of European castles. Piece together stunning scenes of majestic spires, lush gardens, and royal estates, uncovering the opulence and history of Europe’s iconic palaces with every puzzle.

name: Château Royale Jigsaw: Expansion Pack 1
summary: Expand your journey through European grandeur with the latest Château Royale Jigsaw - Expansion Pack 1! Dive deeper into the world of opulence with 16 brand-new puzzles, each more enchanting than the last.

name: Château Royale Jigsaw: Expansion Pack 2
summary: Expand your journey through European grandeur with the latest Château Royale Jigsaw - Expansion Pack 2! Dive deeper into the world of opulence with 16 brand-new puzzles, each more enchanting than the last.

name: Château Royale Jigsaw: Expansion Pack 3
summary: Expand your journey through European grandeur with the latest Château Royale Jigsaw - Expansion Pack 3! Dive deeper into the world of opulence with 16 brand-new puzzles, each more enchanting than the last.

name: Choco Puzzle
summary: Inset Puzzle

name: Chess Infinity: Mate in 2 Puzzle Pack
summary: Key Features:30 challenging Mate in 2 puzzles to sharpen your speed and accuracy.Ideal for players aiming to enhance their rapid checkmate game.Test yourself with the same sharp calculations that have taken over chess streams and social media.

name: Chess Infinity: Mate in 3 Puzzle Pack
summary: Key Features:30 bite-sized Mate in 3 puzzles to test your strategic depth and foresight.Ideal for players seeking to improve their calculation skills and long-range planning.The next step in mastering chess puzzles—pushing you beyond Chess Infinity’s Mate in 2 pack.

name: Cha-no-Ma
summary: Introducing the ultimate mind game! A simple game in which players choose a Samurai, Ninja, Bosan, Akindo, or Murabito and try to guess the character selected by their opponent. Use three types of commands: conversation, yawn, and tea to get closer to the character selected by your opponent.

name: Chinese Style School
summary: Dean Simulator, a walking simulation game of looking for anomalies in a school full of bugs. The scene is a Chinese middle school campus. Experience the scenery and abnormal events of a Chinese campus. There are more than 200 anomalies, which is dozens of times the volume of the same type.

name: Chillin' by the Fire
summary: Campfires. Humanity's oldest social network.

name: Chronicles IV: Ebonheim
summary: A turn-based dungeon-crawling CRPG with nuanced character building and brutal, turn-based tactical combat. Explore a fully non-procedural world that changes when you die. Progress on the backs of your past-slain heroes by using their gear and memories to carry onward.

name: Chess, Texas
summary: A Wild West chess adventure where every duel is settled on the board—explore towns, solve themed puzzles, and defeat the hall bosses to become a legend.

name: Chop It Down
summary: Grandma's cat is stuck in the tree and you need to help her get it down. So grab your axe and start chopping that tree!

name: Chud Logic's: Gockbound
summary: Chud Logic is isekai’d into a cursed commentary world. To escape, he must recover his leaked DMs and reach the elusive Princess Gock. A darkly comedic, turn-based RPG parody with retro pixel art and internet drama.

name: Chunithm X-Verse
summary: Upgrade for CHUNITHM's 10th anniversary! New Linked VERSE mode is here to celebrate every entry in the series.

name: Changelog
summary: In 2016, a group of ambitious students got together to make the best adventure game ever — but they failed. Discover their story by playing through different builds of their game and reading their development logs.

name: Church Crew
summary: An online and local party game of 4-12. Prepare for teamwork, betrayal and lots of penguins!

name: Chaos Rocks
summary:
Chaos Rocks is a physics-based puzzle game where every level challenges you to bounce a rock into the final bucket using gadgets, angles, and sheer stubbornness. Upgrade your tools, automate your points, and master trick shots in a stylized, cartoony world.

You play as Corbin, a young kid forced to go outside and touch grass; yet he touches a rock instead and now you are forced to throw it in a bucket.

name: Chumaky
summary: Chumaky is a game about traveling, trading, farming, and building your own homestead. Discover mysterious locations and enjoy atmospheric landscapes.

name: Chess Empire
summary:
Chess Empire is a fast-paced, tactical twist on chess where gold, upgrades, and fog of war change every move.

The core rules are familiar-you command the classic board and pieces-but now every turn earns you gold: 1 for moving, 2 for captures, and 3 for taking down upgraded pieces. Spend it in the shop to recruit new units or unlock powerful upgrades that transform how pieces play.

Fog of war hides anything outside the vision range of your farthest pieces, making information as valuable as material. Position smartly, scout aggressively, and strike when your opponent is blind.

name: Chivalry Quest: Sword and Flame - Collector's Edition
summary: Awaken in a war-torn realm where knights and dragons are bound by a forgotten pact. Search for relics, battle the Ashen Knights, and decide the fate of Camelot in this epic hidden-object adventure.

name: Chou Shogi
summary: A game that combines physics calculations with Shogi.

name: Chesstris
summary: Chess meets Tetris in a series of handcrafted puzzles. Drop chess pieces to checkmate rival kings while avoiding checkmating your own. New to chess or a grandmaster, it doesn’t matter. The only way you’ll prevail is thinking outside of the board.

name: Chickens Don't Fly
summary: In this tough-as-nails physics-platformer, swing to freedom as a rooster whose only hope of escaping a harsh pit of hopelessness lies in a pair of plungers and his own strength. Grapple your way to freedom, but be careful—one wrong move can send you back to the start.

name: Chiseler
summary: Use logic to uncover artifacts in this casual picture puzzle game. With over 150 puzzles spread throughout a full story mode campaign, you'll have plenty of puzzles to keep you busy. Make and share your own levels with others with the included puzzle editor to keep the fun alive forever.

name: Children's Sandbox
summary: A simple interactive, touch-screen supported, game targeted to younger children to help build up early motor and logic skills

name: Christmas Holiday Celebration
summary: A hidden object game with christmas and winter scenes. Search for snowmen, christmas trees, elves, santa, rudolph, presents and more.

name: Cheese Rolling
summary: Chase a cheese wheel down a steep hill! Tumble with friends in this ragdoll recreation of an English tradition.

name: Chaotic Cats
summary: Chaotic Cats is a 2-4 player local multiplayer paw-ty game where players go paw to paw to collect the most fish through a series of fast-paced minigames.

name: Choco Kiosk Simulator
summary: Manage chocolate and cookie kiosks. Restock shelves, handle queues, complete tasks, upgrade your storage, and research new flavors. Fulfill B2B orders — or take the risk of illegal trade and lose everything.

name: Charon's Obol
summary: Play a high stake game of head or tails against a mysterious opponent, trapped under the ocean in a claustrophobic, eldritch & Lovecraftian horror atmosphere.

name: Children of the Spring
summary: Embark on a quest to find your missing family in a world slowly being consumed by disaster. Explore the unknown, fight dangerous enemies in real time, utilizing variety of unique equipment to your advantage. Upgrade your ship and face the dangers of a boundless ocean.

name: CheeseCatToe
summary: Basically tic-tac-toe games from classic 3x3 three-in-row to challenging 11x11 five-in-row. Designed for kids and adults to develop logical thinking while playing relaxing game.

name: Chrono Stranded
summary: Chrono Stranded is an adventure action game where you battle through a shattered world where past, present, and future collide. Survive encounters against humans, aliens, beasts, and robots as you uncover the truth behind a cataclysmic temporal collapse.

name: Chaos Coin
summary: Your coins are your actions in this roguelike coinbuilder. Plan your turns to shove, evade, and attack your foes in tactical lane-based combat. Upgrade coins with new faces unique to every character to build complex combos. The forces of Chaos are coming…so use your heads (and tails)!

name: Chrono Space 7
summary: An isometric twin stick shooter where the player has only seven minutes to defeat the entity that is going to destroy the solar system. Level up, unlock new powers and win against the clock... and the cosmic dangers.

name: ChickOut!
summary: Chickout is a co-op puzzle platformer for 2-8 players, playable locally or online! Team up as cute chicks, overcome obstacles, and enjoy chaotic fun together.

name: Chopsticks Online
summary:
Chopsticks is an online version of the classic hand game that has been played for generations in Japan and other Asian countries.

Chopsticks Game, also known as the Finger Battle Game, is a traditional Japanese game typically played in person using fingers. However, if you're not physically together to play, there's no need to worry, Chopsticks Online brings the experience to you virtually!

name: Chaos among Realms: Reborn The Game
summary: A game inspired by Minecraft Dungeons, Astro Bot and classic adventure RPG’s, but with our own personal taste. With a simple and charming chibi style, we expect the player to dive in this world, have fun in co-op with friends and enjoy of:

name: Chemical Plant Worker Simulator
summary: Play as “牛大胆” in the “胆大牛化工厂”. You’re not the hero—just a worker on shift. But every chat, every task, carries a story.

name: Chainsaw Dodge
summary: Being a tiny log creature in a giant, hostile world isn’t easy - especially when vicious lumberjacks won't stop trying to turn you into their new coffee table. Run, jump and dodge an onslaught of airborne chainsaws in this chaotic arena as you fight to survive and chase the highest score possible.

name: Changgwi
summary: First-perspective Co-op horror game (up to 4 online players). A terrible incident has struck a Joseon-era village. Become an investigator and survive the cursed night.

name: Childhood Friends
summary: This is a casual puzzle game, where the position of each game image is random and can be repeated.At first, it may be very chaotic,Then gradually place the image in the corresponding position,The image gradually becomes complete,Come and give it a try!

name: Chicklet
summary: Cute chick falls from the real world into a pixelated, multi-dimensional machine. Pull levers, solve unique puzzles, and guide it to freedom. Challenge your mind as you navigate the pages and help the chick escape!

name: Childhood's End
summary: Childhood's End is a fan-made kriselle (the ship between the characters Kris and Noelle) visual novel based on Deltarune covering stories following the ending of that game's weird route as of Chapter 4. It was originally released in Korean, but has since received an English translation.

name: ChronoForge
summary: Players gear up with 12 combat classes to battle exotic foes through time - from dinosaurs to space raiders. Raiding and open world mini-games are used to upgrade community-governed airships known as ‘trading companies’ for top tier crafting.

name: Chromacore
summary: A top-down arena shooter set in a futuristic super soldier training facility. Match your neon lights to the enemies in flow-inducing combat. Your task is simple: kill, adapt, survive, respawn.

name: Chrono Flux
summary: Chrono Flux is a rogue-like top down shooter with time switching mechanics. Equip two eras per run and switch mid combat to your advantage. Enemies outside their timeline become glitched and stronger as you fight enemies, and bosses in a procedurally generated dungeons.

name: Choo Choo Survivor 2
summary: Drive your train through the zombie apocalypse, gather resources, rescue survivors, and upgrade your train strategically into a powerhouse of destruction. Defeat the boss and get to the end to win, or complete the survival challenge!

name: Chirax's Fortress
summary: Play as a hydra in this classic-inspired 16-bit 2D platformer with Super-FX-style 3D visuals!

name: Chair Debiti
summary: A chairbuilder roguelike where flipping a chair is your only means of paying off your life's debt. Craft lucrative combos with your chair by simultaneously fishing, mining, playing blackjack, casting spells, manipulating stocks, and fighting monsters!

name: ChessXpanse
summary: ChessXpanse is a game that captures the intensity of chess and pits one player against another in the midst of battle. In ChessXpanse, a player faces varying front lines as the starting positions of each game board differ.

name: Champions of the Cosmos
summary: Champions of the Cosmos is a retro sci-fi RTS inspired by 80's action figures, comics and movies. Play heroes with the power to reshape the landscape around them and other unique abilities to take over the cosmos and choose whichever side you sympathize with most - light or darkness.

name: Checked Out
summary: Checked Out is a casual action game where you race against the clock as a mischievous shopping cart - collect groceries, dodge damage fees, and wreak comedic havoc in physics-based challenges.

name: Childhood Watermelon
summary: This is a casual puzzle game, where the position of each game image is random and can be repeated.At first, it may be very chaotic,Then gradually place the image in the corresponding position,The image gradually becomes complete,Come and give it a try!

name: Chrono Port: Heroes of All Time
summary: Travel through time, recruit legendary heroes, and battle an ancient evil in this strategic turn-based RPG. Explore 60 unique worlds, unlock 60 heroes, and face off against powerful villains in 3v3 combat. Customize your team and shape the fate of all timelines.

name: Chain-Em
summary: If you like movement shooters, CHAINS, slowmo, speedrunning, parkour... aand getting paralyzed??? ...Well then just buy the game...Chain-em is an FPS movement "boom" shooter where you move at insane speeds, dodge bullets in slowmo and CHAIN your enemies in a retro style setting. CHAINCHAINCHAINCHAIN

name: Choirsaintess
summary: 「choirsaintess 」talk about a teenager YI-CHA-SI accidentally travelled through a different world, Because of an opportunity to embark on a journey to find a way to go home.

name: Chaos
summary: You have crash landed on the most intriguing mysterious alien world you have ever seen! Look around, see 10 different alien creatures each with their own unique personalities, find clues that keep you immersed in the story right up until you solve the mysteries behind your crash on this alien world.

name: Christmas Sort Puzzle
summary: In this captivating puzzle game, your objective is to sort and arrange various Christmas items such as ornaments, gifts, snowflakes, stockings, and more. The objects are scattered on the screen, and it's up to you to slide and swap them to find the perfect arrangement. Your keen eye and logical thinking will be crucial in solving each level.

name: Chamber no. 5
summary: Short itch.io puzzle game about the song Mambo no. 5

name: Chasing the Universe
summary: Chasing the Universe is a light fast FPS platformer. Slide and teleport to gather the stars as fast as you can !

name: Chrono Ark: Deluxe Edition
summary: Chrono Ark, the deck-building roguelike RPG. Recruit companions with distinct personalities, build a party that maximizes skill synergies, and save the Twisted World!

name: Chromadi
summary: Mix and match colors and blast your way through waves of Chromies in this fast-paced retro arcade shooter. Play as the Hue-Men to defend the Rainbar and restore color to the fading planet of Chromara!

name: Chroma Deluxe: Sexy Hentai Girls
summary: Each girl have 5 images (5 levels) : Girl fully dressed, half dressed, wearing a bikini / underwear, topless, fully naked. BUT it's not all: you have a 6th category in which you'll play for amazing hentai sex scenes ! (all characters are over the age of 18).

name: Checkers & Pawns
summary: Checkers & Pawns is a minimalist and relaxing puzzle game that combines elements of checkers and chess. With more than 50 challenging levels, unique mechanics, and a balanced difficulty curve, it's perfect for casual players looking for a relaxing and challenging experience.

name: Chill
summary: Chill is a relaxing, minimalist maze game.

name: Chén Mò Chuán Qí
summary: This is a business - simulation game. The in - game graphics feature a layout of Chinese - style ancient architecture. Players own a place similar to an inn or a shop. The game offers functions such as quests, construction, crafting, and farming, allowing players to experience a rich rural life.

name: Cherry Hill
summary:
Cherry Hill is a small sandbox game about driving trucks. Cruise the open road hauling your cargo, deliver the load on time, keep your truck fueled up and maintained, and occasionally meet other truckers on the road. Take contracts, plan your route on the map, then put it in gear!

Earn job bonuses based on your driving- stay in your lane, avoid collisions, travel at the speed limit, and park the trailer neatly at its destination. As you earn more money, you can unlock new License Endorsements to haul new and interesting cargo from frozen pizza to kerosene gas.

In the world of Cherry Hill, there are 9 truck stops, 10+ characters to meet, 11 unique depots, and over 2,000 miles of scale* highway. Most of the game can be experienced in a couple hours but the game can be played endlessly!

name: Cho Aniki: Bakuretsu Ranto-hen
summary: This Nintendo Switch port of Cho Aniki: Bakuretsu Ranto-hen is the first official English localization of this 1995 Super Famicom installment in the Cho Aniki series. Shifting from shoot 'em up to a floating fighting game style, it features intense battles in the Tenkaichi Budokai tournament on planet NCS Super Masayan.

name: Chill Fox
summary: Just Fox n’ Chill! Play as a clever fox exploring a peaceful farm and beautiful garden. Sneak around, catch the chickens, but beware... two guard dogs are on duty, and they take their job way too seriously. Can you outfox them all?

name: Charm King
summary: A charming match-3 puzzle adventure set in a fantasy world filled with castles, dragons, fairy tales and magic! Capture and collect colorful charms while conquering fun challenges.

name: Chrono Impact
summary: Portal meets Superhot - A revolutionary FPS puzzle with time manipulation Wield two time-control guns, red and blue, to rewrite the laws of physics. Master deceleration and acceleration to solve seemingly impossible puzzles.

name: Chukgwi
summary: A slightly special incomplete shaman with a voice that drives out evil, crosses fate and confronts the past.A PC•VR Voice-contolled Korean Folk Horror Experience.

name: Chinese Mythology: Journey to the West
summary: This is a casual lawn mowing game with Journey to the West as the backstory and rogue elements. Grow by killing monsters, gaining upgrade options, challenging bosses, fighting your way out, and unlocking more levels, characters, and magic weapons!

name: Challenge from the Black Cat
summary: Old-fashioned block crumbling with a cat motif. Simple controls allow a wide range of players from small children to adults! It also comes with an ending! The volume has been increased to play up to a total of 10 stages! Can you win the challenge from the black cat?

name: Christmas Slots: Casino Game
summary: Step into a world of festive cheer and excitement with Christmas Slots, the ultimate casino game that combines the thrill of spinning reels with the joyous spirit of the holiday season. Get ready for a merry gambling experience filled with colorful symbols, jingle bells, and the chance to win big.

name: Cheat Death
summary: Cheat Death is a horror rogue-lite game where you gamble with the Grim Reaper. The dice are loaded, the deck is stacked against you, and the only way to win is to CHEAT. Use cards, dice, and every trick in the book to survive this high-stakes encounter.

name: Chakan GG2SMS
summary: Chakan GG2SMS it's a hack that allows the Sega Game Gear game Chakan: The Forever Man to be played on a Sega Master System console

name: Choyo Girl Lilina 2
summary: Choyo Girl Lilina 2 is an RPG game about the training journey of a 16-year-old magical girl. Embark on an adventure through various villages, hunt monsters, and purchase better items from shops.

name: Chante: Fortress of Spores
summary: In this third-person, tower defense/ puzzle game, you play as the adventurous little fungus, Chante! Explore, gather, and craft to uncover resources that will fortify your defenses, while surviving waves of enemy attacks. Join us in discovering the oddities of Chante: Fortress of Spores.

name: Chark
summary: CHARK is a chess roguelike about risk, synergies, and precise calculation.

name: Chronoscript: The Endless End
summary: Chronoscript: The Endless End is an exploration-based action-adventure game where you, an editor trapped within a manuscript, must unravel a thousand-year story that writes itself beyond its endacross 2D pages and a 3D manor.

name: Changeling VR
summary: ChangelingVR is a virtual reality first-person interactive mystery. Enter the thoughts of each one you touch: A different memory, a different world, a different story.

name: Chronal Chain
summary: "TIME CONTROL" bullet hell action. Overcome impossible odds by slowing, stopping and rewinding time!

name: Chimera Circuit
summary: Chimera Circuit is a pixel-art tactical racing simulator where you splice hybrid creatures from over 100 species, train stats, shop for items, bet on outcomes, and deploy stamina-based skills during grid-based races. Forge optimal builds across 10 Clades with 200 traits to conquer the career!

name: Chaos on Wheels: Deluxe Edition
summary: Deluxe edition of the game Chaos on Wheels. Get a base game with extra bonuses, new cars, and a sweet new ride at the beginning of the Chaos Career.

name: Chronigma
summary: Master time in this story-rich time-bending puzzle game. You travel back in time to be in two places at once, to solve puzzles impossible to complete alone. Your success hinges on your ability to collaborate with yourself. Can you learn to manipulate time to save humanity?

name: Cheapskate
summary: cheapskate is a passion project to make a highly accessible skate toy for the action sports gaming community. The ultimate goal is to provide offline singleplayer, serverless / account-free multiplayer, easy mod support, Steam Deck compatibility, and one low price forever.

name: Chronicle of Scarlet
summary: Chronicle of Scarlet is a WWA-like role-playing game (RPG) created by Charge Piggy Studio and the Touhou Project. In the game, you play Flandre Scarlet, the second daughter of the True Red bloodline. In this fantasy world, you activate your talents, build equipment, defeat enemies, and make your own decisions as the story progresses.

name: Chaos Squad
summary: Chaos Squad is a turn-based tactics game with Cthulhu, rouge-lite and survival elements. Build your squad with 10 unique heroes. Embark on 12 levels in a snowy mountain, grassland and more. Defeat monsters, collect treasures and eventually unveil the truth behind the disaster of ruptured continent.

name: Chronosurge: Echoes of the Void
summary: Chronosurge Echoes of the Void is an intense roguelite survival game where you forge insane builds to resist infinite hordes of anomalies in a collapsing universe. Master the Chronosurge, adapt your strategy, and test your reflexes to survive the Void and etch your name onto the cosmic leaderboards.

name: Chess With Idiots
summary: Shape the turn order in a speed-based tactical roguelike. Adapt to shifting battlefields, overcome unique bosses, and unlock powerful new abilities as you guide a band of idiots through four perilous and distinct regions!

name: Chains on Sand
summary: Enter the blood-soaked arenas of Chains on Sand, a brutal turn-based roguelike where every strike counts. Build a unique gladiator, survive tactical grid-based combat, and rise through fame, death, and legacy — or die forgotten beneath the sand.

name: Chessemble
summary: Customize your board with a host of new pieces. Start with an aggressive forward assault, Or perhaps a defensive fortress designed to weather the storm. Will you outwit, outmanoeuvre, or out-explode your way to victory?

name: Chornobyl Breakout
summary: Chornobyl Breakout is a first-person shooter where you become a survivor pilot whose helicopter has crashed in the Chornobyl Exclusion Zone. You must find a way to safe place. Will you overcome all obstacles and escape from Chornobyl, or will you become just another lost soul in this dead world?

name: Channel 51
summary: A first-person psychological horror thriller. Explore glitched channels, solve puzzles with your remote, and uncover clues about your missing son. Retro sitcoms, post-apocalyptic landscapes, and haunted mansions draw you into a tense, immersive narrative.

name: Chronicles of Childhood
summary: A story-rich, platform, side-scroller in the coming of age genre. Travel around the Fantasy World of "Chronicles of Childhood", with your slingshot at hand. Fight and avoid imaginative creations, to finish all the levels and discover what does it really mean to grow up.

name: Christmas Soul
summary: Santa and his helpers have been kidnapped! Mysterious aliens are plotting to destroy the holidays. Fortunately, all is not lost. Take on the role of a brave Snowman – the last defender of Christmas in a dynamic 2D platformer with arcade combat. Bring back the magic of Christmas!

name: Chicken Craft
summary: Chicken Craft is a management game where you hatch cute chicken monsters on a fantasy science farm. Discover unique breeds, unlock various mutations, brew potions and create your very own chickens!

name: Chihuahua Controller
summary: Help the Chihuahua reach the flag with the Chihuahua Controller! Controlling the Chihuahua will become increasingly difficult! How many flags can you collect?

name: Chess 2048
summary: Chess 2048 – Classic chess moves meet fresh puzzle-strategy twists: watch the board reshape, adapt on the fly, and master piece combos. Then escape poison gas, jump between water tiles, use portals, and pull off clever tricks.

name: Chief Miner
summary: Chief Miner is a space mining simulation / incremental adventure about blowing up space rocks, becoming overpowered, and uncovering a universal mystery

name: Checkmate in the Wild West: Chess Adventure
summary: Saddle up for a Wild West chess puzzle adventure! Will you become an outlaw or a deputy? Your choices matter. Test your wits, cross paths with bandits, sheriffs, helpers, and hustlers. Solve puzzles, challenge characters, buy powerups, and determine your destiny.

name: Chameleon: DYH - Season Finale
summary:
Chameleon - DYH: Season Finale brings all gamers' choices to a conclusion.
Exploring multiple endings
affected by strategy, emotional level, and skills.
Pushing forward all characters through their biggest challenges yet.

name: Chess Arena
summary: 40-player real-time chess battle royale on a massive chessboard. Outplay enemies with chess tactics and game-changing ability kits. Master the chaos as the storm closes in to be the last King standing!

name: Chicken Defense
summary: Plant, harvest, and defend your farm! Build turrets, gather resources, and fight off waves of enemies. And most important defend your CHICKEN!

name: Chick Game
summary: Chick Game is a boomer shooter, survival game where you care for the flock, get upgrades and craft defenses during the day to defend the coop from waves of predators as a powerful, shotgun-wielding rooster at night. Survive all 7 nights in Normal mode or see how long you can survive in Chaos mode.

name: Chernobots
summary: Chernobots is a retro 3D roguelite, allowing endless exploration of the horrific and procedurally generated Chernobyl Exclusion Zone. Search for highly radioactive targets via remote controlled robots to get the job done or pay the price. Are you up for the gig?

name: Choices & Chances
summary: In Choices and Chances, every move counts. Inspired by the old table-top classics with a splash of strategy mixed with luck and hard-to-predict outcomes all in one game. Roll the dice - choose your path, build a career, make careful investments, work your way to the top, or just wing it.

name: Chaos Hero
summary: Dive into bullet-hell auto-combat! Fight through hordes of monsters and experience the thrill of going from barely scraping by to tearing through everything!

name: Chronicles of Albian 3: The Vanishing Village - Collector's Edition
summary: High in the mountains of Albian, something very strange has happened.

name: ChloroLink
summary: In ChloroLink, a cute and cozy management game, guide Lux the plant of life as she spreads her rootweave to connect charming plants. Use each plant’s growth pattern to explore, reinforce the links between plants, overcome gentle challenges, and help Lux bloom the world back to life!

name: Chip by Chip
summary: Piece your memories back together in a cozy platforming adventure about finding home where you least expect it; chip by chip.

name: Chain Shotgun
summary: Chain Shotgun is a fast paced movement shooter where your only weapon is the multi-barrelled CHAIN SHOTGUN. Two barrels are way too few! With an up-to-infinite amount of barrels, it can shoot anything from sniper rounds, rockets, slime - LEGS? Why not even load it with yourself?

name: Charoite Into the Deep
summary: This is an action RPG in which Charois, a little witch, goes underground with her golem. Using skills such as “dowsing” and items found in the game, players can safely reach the deepest part of the basement by avoiding traps and threats from powerful enemies.

name: Childish Life Prologue
summary: This game tells the story of a girl with a special fate who meets a cat and a mysterious talking body in a different world, and the body and cat help the girl return to the real world. Players need to control the girl to pass through each level. Due to her special fate, the girl has special skills in a different world, which can help players better avoid monsters and traps.

name: Chicktionary
summary:
Join millions of fans. Discover the endless wordplay of Chicktionary!

Master your skills or learn English in a fun way!

Try two fresh ways to enjoy this award-winning word game: Journey across the farm in a spelling adventure, or race the clock in Quick Play. If you’re feeling nostalgic, give Classic mode a try!

name: Chopping Hour
summary: Chopping Hour is a tension-driven restaurant game where you rush to fulfill orders while evading enemies that hunt you. Buy supplies, stock shelves, cook, and deliver the right dishes as you survive the threats and push toward the ending.

name: Chess v Checkers
summary: Chess v Checkers is a mashup of two popular games Chess and Checkers. Play as either side on the game board through three distinct game modes.

name: Chefware
summary:
CHEFWARE is a game where you try to get hired as a chef through intense Warioware inspired micro-games.
Meet Magnus, the rough and tough head chef of one of the highest, most prestigious restaurants around. There's no other jobs hiring, so may as well give his place a shot, right?

name: Chill Planet
summary: On this planet destined to perish, let's embark on the ultimate chill journey. This deck-building adventure game depicts girls traveling leisurely toward Hokkaido in a world doomed to destruction by an impending meteor strike.

name: Children of Kronos
summary: In this fast-paced retro FPS, you awaken in a Daedalus Industries mining facility near the moon Titan with nothing but the gun in your hand and a barcode on your wrist. Manipulate gravity while exploring mind-bending levels as you fight to escape with the help of a mysterious ally known only as 'Z'.

name: Chou Crème Collect Whip
summary: A pop-style 3D sandbox action adventure in a world of sweets! Use your “Sweets Change” mode to blast chocolate or freeze it with ice for slippery chain reactions. Collect over 200 Super Chocolates and explore a relaxing, sugar-filled world full of sweet surprises!

name: Chakana
summary: Bound to a brutal loop of murders, you are forced to clean up every crime scene and wipe the evidence. Investigate the origin of the mysterious pocket pet that controls your fate.

name: Chip 'n Dale SNES Port
summary: A straight port of Chip 'n Dale: Rescue Rangers (NES) for the SNES. The game works the same, but with additional support for MSU1 enhancement for audio.

name: Chicken Evolution
summary: Their ancestors are giant dinosaurs but they ended up as birds... that can barely fly. Chickens sure have reasons to be angry! But it's all about to change when mutations start taking place in an egg farm. The poultry is ready for takeoff! Combine chickens to evolve them and discover their most curious, exotic and bizarre forms!

name: Chivalry is Not Dead
summary: Chivalry Is Not Dead is a video game published in 2007 on Windows by Squinky. It's an adventure game, set in a fantasy and comedy themes.

name: Chiaroscuro Imago
summary: A short piece of horror fiction about honey and lies; entomology and etymology; murky secrets and stark realities. Find out what happened to the moths.

name: Chain Reaction
summary: Chain Reaction is a roguelike deckbuilding game about creating chain reactions. Plan and make choice to create explosive chain reactions, achieve objectives, and score high.

name: Christmas Story
summary: Christmas Story is a horror game filled with Christmas warmth and coziness, where every festive light hides darkness, and the sense of comfort fades with every step you take.

name: Chronostasis
summary: Play as Shion, a mysterious battle-hardened android, in this high-intensity character action game to defeat waves of enemies with stylish scythe attacks and time-stopping abilities!

name: Chess & Chapter
summary: Chess & Chapter is a 2D turn-based tactical strategy game.In a fictional sci-fi world, players take on the role of Pan, a commander of the Courier Foundation.The game allows players to navigate through levels in turn-based battles while gradually uncovering the full story.

name: Chamberlore
summary: Join the learning process of an artificial intelligence. A mysterious experiment awaits, where two people are sent to help it evolve.

name: CheeseLords
summary: An RTS where you fight, build, and recruit on faraway planets. Decadent aristocrats will pay a fortune for the delicious cheese from the most alien of worlds. Armed with modern controls and your trusty army, bring home the cheddar 🧀

name: Chained
summary: Break your chains and challenge the abyss in this high-precision platformer. Chained is a game about a special prisoner who wakes up in a mysterious dungeon. Uncover the truth behind your imprisonment by discovering the logs and final moments of your failed predecessors.

name: Chesscape Room
summary: Chess variant where you have to escape custom boards through a door with your king while you opponent hunts you! Play through a campaign, create custom boards or challenge others locally or online.

name: Chronicles of Immortality in the Cloud Abyss
summary: Cloud Chronicle is a 3D third-person action Roguelike. Fly through a procedurally generated world, battle in mid-air with assist aiming, and build your own combat style with 100+ skills and items. Includes core content: aerial combat, random stages, enemies, bosses, and upgrades.

name: Chunithm X-Verse-X
summary: Chunithm's 10th anniversary celebration continues with the Chunithm New series coming to Linked Verse.

name: ChatPlay
summary:
ChatPlay is an interactive party-game platform featuring a collection of fast-paced, viewer-driven mini-games inspired by titles like Taboo and Gartic. It includes multiple game modes such as Guess It, Find The City (Turkey-only), Flag Game, and Draw & Guess.

The platform is fully integrated with Twitch and Kick, allowing streamers and their audiences to play together in real time. Viewers participate directly through chat, submitting answers, competing with others, and influencing the game’s progress. ChatPlay is designed to enhance live broadcasts with dynamic, social, and highly engaging gameplay experiences.

name: Chicky Blocks
summary: A fresh twist on block puzzle games. Quick rounds, smart moves, instant fun! This is not your grandma tetris!

name: Chrono Seoul
summary: Chrono Seoul’s unique Turn Table combat lets you use the hero’s mechanical arm and future-reading ability to predict enemy actions and respond with precise attacks, defense, and evasion. Each run offers new patterns, and at every chapter’s end, an Existence corrupted Seoul awaits.

name: Chill Fishing
summary: Chill Fishing is the ultimate laid-back desktop fishing experience!

name: Chicken Fren
summary: Chicken Fren is a desktop pet that struts across your screen while you work or play. Every mouse click and keypress is a chance to spawn an egg: crack the egg to reveal hats and cosmetics ranging from common to legendary. Collect items, equip them, or trade them on the Steam Marketplace!

name: Chimera
summary: A fast paced bullet hell roguelike where you assemble and combo your abilities together, in a hexagonal gene pool.

name: Cherry Blossom
summary: The game "Cherry blossom" is about a cute little bear who went to save a wise tree from darkness.

name: Chicken Defense War
summary: Chicken Defense War - Tower Defense is a left-to-right tower defense roguelike game， where you play as a chicken commander. Use up to 15 skills and equipment to fend off waves of enemies. Create strategies and survive until rescue arrives in each randomly generated battle!

name: Chicken Chasers
summary: Master the unique movement mechanic of your pogo stick and chase chaotic chickens across unique environments. Casually progress through the levels or get competitive by aiming to climb the time-challenge leader board. Play alone or with others!

name: Charge!
summary: Light it up in CHARGE!, the laser tag-inspired sport of the future! Let loose in arena-style first-person shooter action to bounce around buildings, modify your laser weapons to bend light, and take on your friends in quick matches for territory dominance.

name: Chaser
summary: Slide, slam, grapple, and wallrun through retrowave-inspired levels, chasing the ghost of your past runs. Control your music and momentum to achieve each level's highest rank and lowest time.

name: Champion of Lore
summary: The Guardians have failed. Myths crumble into chaos. Become the Champion of Lore the world needs. Battle through corrupted myths and lost worlds in this turn-based, card-driven tactical adventure forged on hexes and ancient lore.

name: Chrono CCG
summary: A digital collectible card game involving a war between rival time-traveling syndicates over the fate of history. Built by CCG veterans, incorporating favorite mechanics from a variety of beloved games as well as some new twists like Divers, Timeline Shifting, and Immortalization. Crowdfunded in 2024. Built for the CCG community, by the CCG community.

name: Chainsaw
summary: Become a God in this real-time turn-based combat RPG with non-stop brawling. Chainsaw is a game where you must create strategies and prepare your team before each battle, because once combat begins, enemies will keep attacking without stopping.

name: Christine's Care
summary: Christine cares for disabled Hannah while meeting free-spirited Marlon and Liz. Torn between them, she faces love and life-changing choices.

name: Christmas Fables: Nutcracker's Tale - Collector's Edition
Chained Sun
summary: Chained sun is a 3d singleplayer action survival with a tiled randomly generated world. Npcs exist that can assist you on your journey following precisely in and out of combat and using their abilities when ordered. Battle, command, loot and gather!

name: Chaos Claw
summary: You are the claw. Chaos is the goal. Fulfill increasingly ridiculous cat orders in a physics-fueled claw machine meltdown. Grab, toss, and scramble your way through waves of impatient cats, random items, global leaderboards, and pure, contained chaos. Nuclear Kitty Minis Tiny games. Pure chaos

name: Cho Noi
summary: A Monopoly-like RPG where you fight inanimate objects and sell its remains to unsuspecting shoppers – on boats. Inspired by Vietnam's floating markets, players move around the board via dice to gather collectable stamps, fight enemies for goods, and build storefronts to sell gained goods.

name: Christmas Yarn 4: Blessing Star
summary: Unravel a Christmas mystery in Christmas Yarn 4. The town's Blessing Star is missing, and a magical thread of yarn is your only clue. Solve match-3 puzzles, discover family secrets, and expose a conspiracy. Can you find the star and save the holiday?

name: Chef's Van
summary: Travel the world in an RV, heal hearts with cuisine! In 'Chef's Van', manage your food truck in an idyllic seaside town, fulfill international orders, unlock authentic recipes, and team up for hilarious cooking challenges. Savor culinary freedom and friendship - whether solo or with friends!

name: Chronosmith's Saga
summary: Travel across the time-bending world of Tempora, master and plan routes through a branching static map, manage energy, grind and hunt exclusive drops as you face Vexar in a rougelike RPG designed for strategy and replayability.

name: Chart Weaver
summary: Break the board with powerful synergies, discover game-defining relics and alter your deck in this market-inspired roguelike! Chart Weaver is a mesmerizingly simple but deep score-attack deckbuilder where you create magnificent combos and weave intricate patterns.

name: Christmas Incident
summary: Christmas Incident is a short horror game inspired by SCP-4666. The Yule Man and created for the Christmas Miracle Horror Jam.

name: Childwood
summary: Childwood is a survival management horror game in which you help a group of children survive in a hostile environment. Keep the campfire burning to protect them from night creatures, but your kind won’t hesitate to demand immoral sacrifices in exchange for rewards.

name: Christmas Across America Collector's Edition
summary: Immerse yourself in the holiday spirit! Journey into the heart of winter America to create traditions, find hidden treasures, and experience the magic of the coziest time of year.

name: Chaturanga
summary: Chess-variant mixed with roguelite elements

name: Christmas with Father Ben
summary:
Hidden beneath the rotting floorboards of an abandoned house in a forgotten village in the dead of winter. A videotape that simply reads “Christmas with Father Ben.” Let curiosity take hold and experience what might be the darkest Christmas Special ever made.

"Christmas with Father Ben" is a short interactive experience that draws inspiration from Rankin/Bass stop-motion Christmas specials and real-life disturbing events.

name: Chaos in the Harem
summary: You play a beautiful girl with magic. Defeat all kinds of enemies, enemies are beautiful but also very powerful. Don't be attracted by their beauty. Pick up your weapon and don't let it crush them.

name: Christmas With My Family: Jigsaw Puzzle
summary: In Cristmas With My Family you'll find jigsaw puzzle challenges that show you incredible moments I spent with my family.

name: Cheeseland Mistery
summary: Cheeseland Mystery is a retro-style puzzle adventure where a sneaky rat steals cheese under cover of night. Solve clever, room-based challenges across 30 levels, inspired by classic Lolo gameplay, with pixel art visuals, dynamic sound, and Xbox controller support.

name: Chainbound
summary: Chainbound is a brutal co-op climbing game where one mistake can pull everyone down.

name: Chymera Chronicles: The Great Lush Forest
summary:
An RPG-Adventure game centered around a magical world ruled by chimeric creatures known as "chymera beasts", made in RPG Maker MV.

Explore a lush overworld! Mix 'n Match the DNA and abilities of your chymera! Meet and bond with quirky chymera friends. Brave treacherous dungeons together! And take down fierce chymera beasts with the power of fusion!

name: Chess Tales
summary: Chess Tales is a puzzle board game that expands the chess mechanics beyond the regular 8x8 board. It is Beginner friendly! All you need to know is the basic rules of Chess and how the pieces move. Complete chapters by defeating enemy Kings using various pieces and powers at your disposal!

name: Chef Knight
summary: Cook what you kill in this cozy fantasy incremental. Slay monsters, turn them into delicious meals, and build your dungeon food business!

name: Chasm Shift
summary: A 2D pixelated platformer journey through a mysterious and vast maze of puzzle box dungeons. Solve puzzle-infused platforming challenges and uncover new abilities as you plunge into an atmospheric adventure.

name: Christmas Holidays
summary: Join Willi the elf on an adventure through Finland to collect the 9 pieces of a shooting star and save Christmas.

name: Chess Up! Checkmate With Friends
summary: Outsmart, outplay, and checkmate your way to victory!

name: Chambered
summary: Chambered is a 4-player online co-op adventure where you and your friends are trapped inside a chaotic maze of cube chambers. Work together, avoid deadly traps, use strange items, and try to make it out alive.

name: Channel 4 Midnight
summary: A bite-sized psychological horror game about a wayward soul who seeks transformation through a sinister ritual.

name: Charmcraft Idle
summary: Charmcraft Idle is a cozy, witchy idle shop simulator where you gather magical resources, craft enchanted goods, and slowly automate every part of your spellbound business. Click, craft, study, and hire staff as your humble witch shop grows into a magical enterprise.

name: Chill & Reel
summary: A cozy idle fishing game where you play as an adorable alligator angler. Designed to run in the corner of your screen, it's the perfect companion for work or study—featuring rich animations that make every moment feel like watching a charming short film.

name: Chilling Devotion
summary:
A peaceful winter retreat becomes an unexpected adventure when a snowstorm leads you to the wrong cabin in the mountains.

Originally a submission for the Winter Visual Novel Jam 2024!

name: Chained Wheels
summary: Embark on a chaotic co-op drive in Chained Wheels, where two vehicles are chained together and every move turns into a shared adventure or a DISASTER.

name: Chapolin X Drácula 2
summary: A fan-made game imagining a sequel to Chapolin X Dracula for Master System, but inspired by Castlevania.

name: Chop Chains
summary: Chop Chains is a relaxing incremental game where you chop, gather, and upgrade to become the ultimate lumberjack through trees, axes, and skills.

name: Chasing the Dawn
summary: Chasing the Dawn is a joyous pixel-art strategy game, designed for families. In this vibrant, ever-shifting fantasy world, every playthrough is a unique new journey.

name: Chromascape
summary: Step into a gentle, hand-drawn world in Chromascape. As Luna the hedgehog, you hold the power to absorb and share colors in a land fading into gray. Use warm hues to light fires, cool tones to freeze paths, and restore vibrancy to this heartwarming 2D adventure.

name: Chance
summary: The property-trading deckbuilder. Chance is strange, dusty board game where you steal land from the bourgeoisie, bankrupt the proletariat, break the rules with unfair chance cards, and discover strategies worthy of an antitrust lawsuit.

name: Chinami Holic
summary: A heartwarming "menhera" horror adventure where reality and fiction intertwine, starring VTuber Chinami Dokugai as herself in a fully voiced role.
